The Atlanta Hawks ( 46 - 12 ) defeated the Orlando Magic ( 19 - 41 ) 95 - 88 on Wednesday at Philips Arena in Atlanta . The Hawks were able to hold off the Magic in this one , despite being out - rebounded 42 - 40 by the Magic . The Magic were the superior shooters in this game , going 45 percent from the field and 35 percent from beyond the arc , while the Hawks finished at 44 percent from both the floor and 45 percent on their end . Despite the loss , the Hawks were still able to force the Magic into 17 turnovers , which may have been the difference in the game . Paul Millsap led the Hawks in scoring , finishing with 20 points ( 8 - 17 FG , 4 - 7 3Pt , 0 - 2 FT ) , four rebounds , three assists , one steal and one blocked shot , in 35 minutes . Al Horford recorded a double - double , with 17 points ( 7 - 9 FG , 3 - 4 FT ) and 13 rebounds , along with four assists and two steals , in 31 minutes . DeMarre Carroll chipped in 15 points and eight rebounds , while Jeff Teague added 17 points and seven assists , in 33 minutes . Nikola Vucevic led the way for the Magic , with 21 points ( 10 - 16 FG ) and 15 rebounds , in 37 minutes . Victor Oladipo was the only other Magic player to reach double figures , as he finished with 19 points , three rebounds and six assists , while Tobias Harris added 15 points , four boards , one assist , two steals and one block , in 36 minutes . Channing Frye struggled shooting the ball , going 3 - for - 10 from the floor , but still finished with 10 points and three rebounds . Up next , the Magic will head home Friday to take on the 76ers , while Atlanta will stay at home Friday and go up against the Heat .
The Milwaukee Bucks ( 18 - 17 ) defeated the New York Knicks ( 5 - 31 ) 95 - 82 on Wednesday at Madison Square Garden in New York . The Bucks came out strong in this one , out - scoring the Knicks 31 - 18 in the first quarter and out - rebounding them 48 - 36 in the second half to secure the victory in front of their home crowd . Giannis Antetokounmpo led the way for the Bucks , scoring 16 points ( 6 - 9 FG , 1 - 1 3Pt , 3 - 6 FT ) , to go along with 12 rebounds , two assists , two blocks and one steal , in 30 minutes . Zaza Pachulia recorded a double - double with 16 points and 14 rebounds , while Brandon Knight chipped in 17 points and five assists , in 32 minutes . Tim Hardaway Jr. led the Knicks in scoring , with 17 points , four assists , three rebounds and one block , in 38 minutes . J.R. Smith finished with 15 points , seven rebounds and four assists in 37 minutes , while Cole Aldrich added 12 points and seven rebounds , in 20 minutes . The Knicks shot 41 percent from the field and 36 percent from three - point range , while the Bucks shot 46 percent ( 25 - 78 ) from the floor and 25 percent from long range , as they were able to get the job done on the defensive side of the ball . Up next , the Bucks will head home to take on the Nets on Friday , in what will be the second game of a back - to - back for both teams . New York , on the other hand , will stay home and go up against the Pacers on Friday .
The Memphis Grizzlies ( 5 - 5 ) defeated the Phoenix Suns ( 3 - 2 ) 102 - 91 on Wednesday at the US Airways Center in Phoenix . The Grizzlies were able to hold off the Suns in this one , despite being out - scored 30 - 19 in the fourth quarter . Memphis was able to out - shoot the Suns 50 percent to 46 percent from the field and 53 percent to 38 percent from three - point range , while also out - rebounding them 37 - 35 . Mike Conley led the way for the Grizzlies , scoring 24 points ( 9 - 14 FG , 3 - 4 3Pt ) , to go along with 11 assists , two steals and one block , in 29 minutes . Marc Gasol finished with 18 points ( 6 - 12 FG , 6 - 6 FT ) , five rebounds , six assists and four steals , in 35 minutes . Courtney Lee was the other starter to reach double figures in points , as he finished with 22 points , three rebounds and three assists , in 39 minutes . Zach Randolph chipped in 10 points ( 4 - 9 FG , 2 - 3 FT ) and six rebounds , while the only other player to score in double digits for Memphis was rookie Zach Randolph , who finished with 10 points . The Suns were led by Eric Bledsoe , who went 9 - for - 12 from the floor to score 23 points , while adding five rebounds and four assists . Markieff Morris finished with 20 points ( 8 - 13 FG ) and five rebounds in 33 minutes , while Mirza Teletovic came off the bench to score 15 points in 26 minutes . Up next , the Grizzlies will head to San Antonio to take on the Spurs on Friday , in what will be the second game of a back - to - back for both teams . Meanwhile , the Suns will stay home and go up against the Golden State Warriors on Friday .
The Toronto Raptors ( 29 - 15 ) defeated the Detroit Pistons ( 17 - 28 ) 114 - 110 on Wednesday at the Air Canada Centre in Toronto . The Raptors got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Pistons 26 - 25 in the first quarter . They were able to hold off the Pistons in the second quarter , where they out - scored Detroit 31 - 26 , to eventually pull away and secure the victory in front of their home crowd . The Pistons were led by D.J . Augustin , who scored a game - high of 35 points ( 12 - 20 FG , 5 - 9 3Pt , 6 - 6 FT ) , to go along with eight assists and four rebounds in 37 minutes . It was a season - high in points for Augustin . Greg Monroe was the other big contributor for the Pistons , as he finished with 21 points ( 9 - 17 FG , 3 - 5 FT ) and 16 rebounds in 35 minutes . Andre Drummond finished with 14 points ( 7 - 11 FG ) and eight rebounds in 27 minutes , while Kentavious Caldwell-Pope chipped in 16 points ( 6 - 18 FG ) , three rebounds , two assists and two steals in 42 minutes . Jonas Valanciunas led the way for the Raptors , scoring 20 points and grabbing 11 rebounds in 28 minutes . DeMar DeRozan finished with 25 points ( 8 - 14 FG , 8 - 10 FT ) of his own , while also adding six rebounds and four assists . He 's now averaging 22 points and 8 rebounds on the year . Amir Johnson was the only other player to score in double figures for the Raps , as his 17 points ( 5 - 10 FG , 1 - 3 3Pst , 2 - 2 FT ) were a season high . The only other Raps player to reach double figures was Greivis Vasquez , who finished with 13 points ( 4 - 10 3Pts ) , seven assists and three rebounds in 24 minutes . Kyle Lowry added 11 points and eight assists , while Terrence Ross came off the bench to score 12 points , while adding two rebounds , one assist and four steals in 22 minutes . For the Raptors ' next game , they 'll travel to New York to take on the Knicks on Friday , while the Pistons will head to Brooklyn to play the Nets on Friday .
The Detroit Pistons ( 30 - 29 ) defeated the Milwaukee Bucks ( 24 - 35 ) 102 - 91 on Monday at the BMO Harris Bradley Center in Milwaukee . The Pistons were able to hold off the Bucks in this one , despite being down by as many as 20 points in the fourth quarter . The Bucks were able , however , to out - rebound the Pistons 46 - 46 , giving them just enough of an advantage to pull out the victory . The key for the Pistons was their ability to shoot the ball , as they went 42 percent from the field and 40 percent from beyond the arc , while the Bucks finished at 49 percent from both the floor and 58 percent from three - point range . Despite being out - rebounded , the Bucks were still able to force the Pistons into 21 turnovers , which may have been the difference in the game . Andre Drummond recorded yet another double - double , as he finished with 15 points ( 7 - 17 FG , 1 - 6 3Pt , 7 - 10 FT ) , 17 rebounds and four steals in 34 minutes . He 's now averaging 17 rebounds on the season . Reggie Jackson was the only other Piston to reach double figures in points . He finished with 22 points ( 6 - 10 FG ) and eight assists , while also adding two rebounds and two steals in 31 minutes . It was a season - high in points for Jackson , who 's averaging 17 points and 5 assists on the year . Marcus Morris also had a solid game , finishing with 20 points and eight rebounds in 41 minutes . Tobias Harris and Kentavious Caldwell-Pope each scored 15 points of their own , with Harris adding four rebounds , four assists and one steal , and Caldwell Pope adding 12 points and three rebounds . Khris Middleton led the Bucks with 26 points ( 11 - 20 FG ) , seven rebounds , two assists , one steal and one block in 40 minutes . Giannis Antetokounmpo struggled with his shot , but still finished with eight points ( 3 - 11 FG , 2 - 2 FT ) and 12 rebounds in 38 minutes . The only other player to score in double figures for the Bucks was Jabari Parker , who finished with 13 points ( 5 - 10 ) , five rebounds and three assists . The bench was led by O.J . Mayo , who had nine points and two assists in 25 minutes . Greg Monroe had a nice game off the bench , scoring 10 points and grabbing seven rebounds in 27 minutes . Up next , the Pistons will head home to take on the Nets on Wednesday , while Milwaukee will travel to Chicago to play the Bulls on Wednesday .
The Milwaukee Bucks ( 8 - 8 ) defeated the Cleveland Cavaliers ( 13 - 3 ) 118 - 101 on Wednesday at the BMO Harris Bradley Center in Milwaukee . Giannis Antetokounmpo was the star of the show for the Bucks on Wednesday , as he scored a game - high of 34 points on 13 - for - 19 shooting from the field and 7 - of - 10 from the free - throw line to go along with 12 rebounds , five assists , five steals and two blocks in 35 minutes . It was a season - high in points for the Greek Freak , who has now scored at least 30 points in each of his last three games . The Bucks were also able to shoot 54 percent from the floor and 37 percent from beyond the arc , giving them enough of an advantage to pull out the win . The Cavaliers , on the other hand , shot just 43 percent as a team and were out - rebounded by the Bucks 43 - 35 . LeBron James was the high - point man for the Cavaliers , finishing with 22 points on top of four rebounds , four assists and four steals in 33 minutes . Kyrie Irving followed up with 20 points , three assists and two rebounds in 31 minutes . Kevin Love recorded a double - double with 13 points and 13 rebounds , while Tristan Thompson added eight points , five rebounds , two assists , two steals and three blocks in 30 minutes . The only other player to score in double digits for the Cavs was Channing Frye , who chipped in 12 points in just 11 minutes off the bench . For the Bucks , it was Jabari Parker who led the way with 18 points , four rebounds and two steals , while Malcolm Brogdon added 17 points and two assists in 26 minutes . John Henson started in place of the injured Michael Beasley , who sat out with an ankle injury . Henson finished with seven points and nine rebounds in 21 minutes . Matthew Dellavedova played 25 minutes and finished with three points , seven assists , three rebounds and a pair of steals . The Cavs ' next game will be on the road against the Chicago Bulls on Friday , while the Bucks will be at home against the New York Knicks on Friday .
The Cleveland Cavaliers ( 40 - 21 ) defeated the Boston Celtics ( 0 - 4 ) 101 - 93 on Wednesday at the TD Garden in Boston . LeBron James and Kyrie Irving led the way for the Cavaliers with 27 points and 24 points , respectively . James added 10 rebounds and eight assists , while Irving added 11 rebounds and three assists . Timofey Mozgov had a double - double with 12 points and 11 rebounds . The Celtics were led by Marcus Smart , who had 21 points ( 4 - 17 FG , 1 - 7 3Pt , 12 - 12 FT ) , nine assists and five rebounds in 37 minutes off the bench . Avery Bradley chipped in 16 points ( 6 - 13 FG ) , five rebounds and one steal in 40 minutes . The Cavaliers shot 40 percent from the field and 21 percent from three - point range , while the Celtics shot 39 percent ( 13 - 65 ) from the floor and only 13 percent from long range . Kevin Love was limited to seven points ( 1 - 3 FG ) and one rebound in seven minutes , while J.R. Smith had eight points ( 3 - 8 FG ) in 16 minutes . Despite the loss , the Celtics were able to out - rebound the Cavaliers 50 - 45 and out - assist them 14 - 13 . The Cavs will look to get back on track on Friday when they play the second game of a back - to - back when they host the New York Knicks . Boston will have a couple days off before hosting the Philadelphia 76ers on Saturday .
The Oklahoma City Thunder ( 8 - 13 ) defeated the Milwaukee Bucks ( 11 - 12 ) 114 - 101 on Wednesday at Chesapeake Energy Arena in Oklahoma City . The Thunder got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Bucks 26 - 21 in the first quarter . The Bucks were able to make a run in the second quarter , but the Thunder responded with a 35 - 23 run of their own to put the game out of reach . Despite being out - rebounded 54 - 31 by the Bucks , the Thunder were still able to out - score them 50 - 31 in the fourth quarter , giving them just enough of an advantage to pull out the win . Russell Westbrook was the player of the game , as he led the way for the Thunder , finishing with 28 points , seven assists , five rebounds and three steals in 32 minutes . Kevin Durant finished with 23 points ( 7 - 11 FG , 1 - 5 3Pt , 8 - 8 FT ) , nine rebounds and seven assists in 29 minutes . He 's now averaging 27 points , 9 rebounds and 8 assists on the season . Enes Kanter was the other big contributor off the bench , scoring 18 points and grabbing seven rebounds in 30 minutes . The only other player to score in double digits for the OKC was Serge Ibaka , who finished with 15 points ( 5 - 5 FG , 5 - 6 FT ) . The win brings the Thunder up to fifth place in the Western Conference standings , and they 'll look to keep it going against the Memphis Grizzlies on Friday . Giannis Antetokounmpo did everything he could to keep the Bucks in this game . He went 4 - for - 11 from the field to score 17 points , while also adding seven rebounds and two blocked shots in 26 minutes . It was his second double - double in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 17 points and 10 rebounds on the year . Jabari Parker also had a solid showing , scoring 15 points on 7 - of - 13 shooting . He was able to get to the free throw line a game - high 15 times , converting on all of those attempts . O.J . Mayo was the only other Bucks player to reach double figures in points . He finished with 18 points ( 6 - 13 FG , 0 - 4 3PT , 6 - 6 FG ) , four rebounds and a pair of steals in 28 minutes . Despite the loss , the Bucks still have a chance to get their first win of the season on Friday , when they take on the New Orleans Pelicans on the road . The loss snapped a three - game winning streak for the Bucks . They 'll hope to get back on track on Friday in a home matchup against the Charlotte Hornets .
The Atlanta Hawks ( 28 - 20 ) defeated the New York Knicks ( 21 - 28 ) 142 - 139 on Wednesday at Philips Arena in Atlanta . The Hawks got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Knicks 30 - 37 in the first quarter , but the Knicks battled back to make it a one - point game heading into the fourth quarter . However , the Hawks were able to out - score the Knicks 21 - 16 in the final quarter to seal the win . Paul Millsap led the way for the Hawks , as he finished with a game - high 37 points ( 13 - 29 FG , 3 - 8 3Pt , 8 - 10 FT ) , to go along with 19 rebounds and seven assists , in 60 minutes . He 's now averaging 27 points and 12 rebounds on the year . Dennis Schroeder also had a big game , finishing with a double - double of his own , with 23 points ( 9 - 25 FG , 1 - 4 3PT , 4 - 7 FT ) and 15 assists , while shooting 9 - for - 25 from the field . It was a season - high in assists for Schroeder , who 's averaging 8 per game over his last five . Kent Bazemore also had one of his best games of the year , finishing the game with 24 points and 10 rebounds , in 50 minutes , while Tim Hardaway , Jr. added 19 points ( 5 - 20 FG , 0 - 9 3PT ) , five rebounds and eight assists . The Knicks were led by Carmelo Anthony , who finished with 45 points ( 18 - 36 FG ) , six rebounds , four assists and one block , in 46 minutes . Brandon Jennings was the only other player to score in double figures for the Knicks , with 18 points , while Kristaps Porzingis chipped in 15 points , along with five rebounds , three blocks and one assist , in 30 minutes . Courtney Lee finished with 17 points , nine rebounds , two assists , two steals and one blocked shot , in 52 minutes . Up next , the Knicks will head home to take on the Wizards on Friday , while the Hawks will stay home and play the Nets on Friday .
The Golden State Warriors ( 43 - 7 ) defeated the Los Angeles Clippers ( 31 - 19 ) 133 - 120 on Wednesday at the Staples Center in Los Angeles . The Warriors were the superior shooters in this game , going 53 percent from the field and 41 percent from beyond the arc , while the Clippers finished at 50 percent from both the floor and 40 percent from deep . The assist - to - turnover ratio was the difference in the game , with the Warriors recording 38 assists to just 11 turnovers and the Clippers committing 15 turnovers to just 24 assists . The Clippers were also out - rebounded by the Warriors 46 - 37 , which may have been the difference , as they were out - scored in the paint 46 - 34 . The Golden state Warriors were led by their dynamic duo of Kevin Durant and Stephen Curry . Durant finished with 26 points ( 8 - 18 FG , 2 - 7 3Pt , 8 - 8 FT ) and 10 assists , while Curry added 29 points ( 11 - 23 FG , 3 - 10 3PT , 4 - 4 FT ) , 11 assists and three steals . It was Durant 's second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 61 points and 22 rebounds over those two games . Klay Thompson was n't far behind , finishing with 21 points ( 9 - 19 FG ) , seven rebounds and two assists . JaVale McGee chipped in with 11 points ( 5 - 6 FG ) and eight rebounds . The only other player to score in double figures for the Warriors was Marreese Speights , who finished with 10 points ( 4 - 5 FG , 0 - 5 3Pts , 5 - 5 FT ) . The win gives the Warriors a three - game lead over the Oklahoma City Thunder for the top spot in the Western Conference . Blake Griffin did all he could to keep the Clippers in this one . He went 10 - for - 19 from the floor to score a game - high of 31 points , while also adding eight rebounds , three steals and one blocked shot . He 's now averaging 27 points and 8 rebounds on the season . Austin Rivers also had a solid game , finishing the game with 18 points ( 7 - 15 FG , 4 x 4 FT , 0- 3 3PT ) , four rebounds and six assists . He was the only other Clipper to reach double figures in points . J.J. Redick finished with 17 points , three assists , two rebounds , two steals and two blocked shots . Jamal Crawford was a nice spark off the bench , as his 21 points and four assists were a season - high . The loss snapped a four - game winning streak for the Clippers , as it was their first loss in that stretch . Up next , the Warriors will head to San Antonio to take on the Spurs on Friday , while Los Angeles will travel to Sacramento to play the Kings on Friday .

The Knicks came out strong in this one , out - scoring the Lakers 18 - 11 in the first quarter and out - rebounding them 45 - 45 in the second quarter alone . For New York , they will look to keep their playoff hopes alive , as they play host to the Golden State Warriors on Saturday .

Memphis shot 52 percent from the field and 27 percent from beyond the arc , compared to Minnesotaâ€™s 45 percent shooting from the floor and 50 percent from three - point range . The Nets came out firing on all cylinders in this one , out - scoring the Wizards 31 - 14 in the first quarter and 42 - 21 in the second . They were the superior shooters in this game , going 51 percent from the field and 60 percent from three - point range , while the Wizards went just 39 percent from beyond the arc and 33 percent from long range . Meanwhile , the Wizards will stay home and play the Pistons on Friday .

The Wizards were the superior shooters in this game , going 54 percent from the field and 39 percent from beyond the arc , while the Lakers finished at just 38 percent shooting from the floor and 25 percent from deep . The assist - to - turnover ratio was the difference in the game , with the Wizards recording 23 assists to just 18 turnovers and the Lakers committing 18 turnovers to just 15 assists . Russell shot 8 - of - 20 ( 3 - 7 3PT , 3 - 3 FT ) from three - point range and added three steals , three assists and three steals in 31 minutes , while Bryant shot 6 - 15 FG , but only 3 - For - 7 from long range . Julius Randle finished with 14 points ( 7 - 11 FG , 0 - 1 3PT ) and seven rebounds , while Nick Young added 11 points ( 1 - 7 FG ) and three assists in 20 minutes off the bench . Up next , the Wizards will head home to take on the 76ers on Friday , while Kobe Bryant will head to San Antonio to play the Spurs on Friday . This marks the Lakers ' fifth loss in their last six games , as they continue to slide towards the bottom of the NBA standings .
The Cleveland Cavaliers ( 53 - 29 ) defeated the Washington Wizards ( 46 - 36 ) 113 - 108 on Monday at Quicken Loans Arena in Cleveland . The Cavaliers came into this game as a double - digit favorite and they left no doubt who the better team was , as they did just that . In fact , they led for the entirety of the second half , as the Wizards never led by more than seven points in the entire game . The assist - to - turnover ratio was the decisive statistic , with the Cavaliers recording 29 assists to just 16 turnovers , while the Wizards committed 13 turnovers to just 26 assists . The Cavs shot 47 percent from the field and 53 percent from three - point range , while holding the Wizards to 43 percent shooting from the floor and 36 percent from long range . The Wizards were led in scoring by Ramon Sessions , who finished with 14 points ( 4 - 8 FG , 2 - 2 3Pt , 4 - 6 FT ) , six assists and two rebounds in 37 minutes . Rasual Butler was the only other Wizard in double figures , as he finished with 17 points ( 7 - 19 FG , 3 - 8 3PT ) , seven rebounds , two assists , two steals and one block in 45 minutes . Kelly Oubre , Jr. led the team in scoring off the bench with 20 points ( 5 - 9 FG , 7 - 8 FT ) and two steals in 36 minutes . Kris Humphries finished with 12 points and five rebounds in 29 minutes . On deck for the Wizards is a home matchup against the Philadelphia 76ers on Wednesday . For the Cavaliers , it was the return of Kyrie Irving to the court after he sat out the last two games with an ankle injury . He played 18 minutes and finished with nine points and seven assists in that time , but it was n't enough to get the win . The bench was huge for Cleveland , as Kyle Korver , Tristan Thompson and Iman Shumpert all scored 18 points or more . Thompson added 12 rebounds and 12 assists in the win , while Iman totaled 18 points , three rebounds , 12 assists and three steals in 33 minutes . Kevin Love led the starters with 19 points ( 6 - 12 FG , 5 - 6 3 Pt ) and three rebounds in just 18 minutes . Cleveland 's next game will be on the road against the New York Knicks on Wednesday , in what will be a crucial matchup for the Eastern Conference playoff race .

The Lakers came out strong in this one , out - scoring the Nuggets 34 - 26 in the first quarter and 32 - 16 in the second quarter to take a 20 - point lead heading into the half . The Nuggets were able to make a run in the third quarter , but the Lakers responded with a big fourth quarter to pull away and steal the victory . Kobe Bryant led the way for the Lakers , scoring 31 points ( 10 - 22 FG , 2 - 9 3Pt , 9 - 11 FT ) , to go along with five assists , three rebounds and one block , in 32 minutes . Jordan Clarkson added 19 points ( 6 - 14 FG , 7 - 9 FT ) and eight rebounds , while Lou Williams chipped in 17 points , five assists and four rebounds , in 37 minutes . Larry Nance Jr. finished with 10 points and two assists , in 19 minutes , while D'Angelo Russell added 11 points ( 4 - 5 FG , 3 - 3 FT ) six rebounds and four blocks , in 31 minutes off the bench . For the Nuggets , it was Gary Harris who led the team in scoring , as he finished with 21 points ( 9 - 15 FG ) , while also adding one rebound , one assist , one steal and one blocked shot , in 35 minutes . Jamal Murray was the high - point man for Denver , with 25 points ( 8 - 21 FG , 1 - 6 3Pts , 3 3Ptt ) , along with eight rebounds and two steals , in 38 minutes off of the bench , while Will Barton added 15 points ( 5- 7 FG , 5 - 6 FT ) with 10 rebounds and five assists . Kenneth Faried finished with 14 points , nine rebounds and three assists , while Jameer Nelson added five points , eight assists and three rebounds . Next up , the Nuggets will head to Minnesota to take on the Timberwolves on Friday , in what will be the second half of a back - to - back for both teams . Meanwhile , the Lakers will look to continue their winning ways against the Phoenix Suns on Friday .
The Dallas Mavericks ( 20 - 30 ) defeated the Portland Trail Blazers ( 22 - 29 ) 108 - 104 on Wednesday at the Moda Center in Portland . The Mavericks were the superior shooters in this game , going 47 percent from the field and 55 percent from beyond the arc , while the Trail Blazers finished at 46 percent shooting from the floor and just 30 percent from deep . The Trail Blazers were also out - rebounded by the Mavericks 44 - 36 , giving the Mavericks just enough of an advantage to pull out the victory in front of their home crowd . With Dirk Nowitzki sitting out with an illness , Yogi Ferrell stepped up to lead the Mavericks with 32 points ( 11 - 17 FG , 9 - 11 3Pt , 1 - 2 FT ) and five assists in 39 minutes . Wesley Matthews also had a solid showing , going 8 - for - 17 from the three - point line to score 27 points , while also adding six rebounds and three assists in 40 minutes . Seth Curry was the only other Maverick to reach double figures in points , finishing with 19 points ( 7 - 12 FG ) , three rebounds and two assists in 29 minutes . Harrison Barnes chipped in 13 points ( 6 - 14 FG ) and seven rebounds in 38 minutes . For the Blazers , C.J . McCollum had one of his best games of the season . He finished with 28 points , seven rebounds and six assists in 35 minutes . Evan Turner was the other Trail Blazer to reach the 20 - point mark , scoring 24 points in 32 minutes . Damian Lillard struggled shooting the ball , going just 4 - of - 20 ( 20 percent ) , but still finished with 13 points , nine rebounds , six assists and one block . The only other player to score in double figures for Portland was Allen Crabbe , who finished with 14 points ( 5 - 10 FG , 4 - 8 FT ) , eight rebounds and one assist in 37 minutes off the bench . Up next , the Mavericks will head home Friday to take on the Timberwolves , while Portland will stay home Friday and go up against the Nuggets .
The Miami Heat ( 30 ) defeated the Toronto Raptors ( 2 - 1 ) 107 - 102 on Wednesday at American Airlines Arena in Miami . The Heat got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Raptors 31 - 26 in the first quarter . They were able to hold the lead for the majority of the rest of the game , but the Raptors battled back in the fourth quarter to make it a one - possession game with just over a minute to go . However , Dwyane Wade was able to hit a clutch three - pointer to put the Heat up by two with just under a minute left in the game to seal the win . Wade finished with 19 points ( 7 - 11 FG , 1 - 1 3Pt , 4 - 6 FT ) , 11 rebounds , seven assists and two blocked shots in 31 minutes . Chris Bosh recorded a double - double with 21 points ( 5 - 13 FG , 10 - 13 FT ) and 11 rebounds in 38 minutes . He also had four assists and one steal in that time . Luol Deng chipped in 18 points ( 8 - 14 FG ) , four rebounds , three assists , one steal and one block in 37 minutes , while Shawne Williams added 16 points and five rebounds in 28 minutes . The Raptors were led by DeMar DeRozan , who finished with 30 points ( 11 - 22 FG ) and four steals in 41 minutes . Kyle Lowry finished with 22 points , two rebounds and three assists in 36 minutes . Jonas Valanciunas added 14 points and eight rebounds in 29 minutes , and Terrence Ross had six points and one rebound in 17 minutes . Up next , the Heat will stay home to take on the Wizards on Friday , while the Raptors will head home to play the Trail Blazers on Friday .
The Los Angeles Clippers ( 17 - 7 ) defeated the New Orleans Pelicans ( 7 - 17 ) 133 - 105 on Wednesday at the Staples Center in Los Angeles . The Clippers got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Pelicans 35 - 31 in the first quarter and 35 - 25 in the second quarter to take a double - digit lead heading into the locker room . They were able to hold on to that lead for the rest of the way , as they went on to out - score the Pelicans by 16 points in the fourth quarter to secure the win . The Pelicans were led by Tim Frazier , who went 6 - for - 13 from the field to score 20 points , while also adding 11 assists . It was his second double - double in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 17 points and 11 assists per game . Terrence Jones also had a strong showing , finishing with 18 points and five rebounds in 26 minutes . He 's now averaging 16 points and 6 rebounds on the year . Buddy Hield was the only other Pelican to reach double figures in points , as he finished with 15 points ( 6 - 13 FG , 2 - 5 3Pt , 1 - 1 FT ) , five assists and three rebounds in 36 minutes . DeAndre Jordan was the high - point man for the Clippers , with 19 points ( 9 - 11 FG ) , to go along with nine rebounds and one steal , in 23 minutes . Chris Paul finished with 20 points ( 8 - 16 FG ) and 20 assists , while J.J. Redick chipped in 16 points of his own , in 34 minutes . Marreese Speights came off the bench to score a team - high of 22 points ( 10 - 13 ) , while adding two assists and two steals , in 25 minutes . With the win , the Clippers improved to 10 - 4 at home and are now 2 - 1 in their last three games . Next , they 'll head to San Antonio to take on the Spurs on Friday , in what will be the second half of a back - to - back for both teams . Meanwhile , the Pelicans will look to get back on track on the road against the Golden State Warriors on Friday .
The Indiana Pacers ( 5 - 6 ) defeated the Orlando Magic ( 4 - 7 ) 88 - 69 on Wednesday at the Bankers Life Fieldhouse in Indianapolis . The Pacers were able to use a strong second half where they out - scored the Magic 30 - 12 to pull away for the win . They shot 39 percent from the field and 32 percent from three - point range , while the Magic shot just 32 percent ( 20 percent ) from the floor and a meager 20 percent from beyond the arc . They were also out - rebounded 52 - 49 , giving them just enough of an advantage to secure the victory . Paul George led the way for the Pacers , scoring 13 points on 5 - of - 16 shooting , to go along with six rebounds , five assists , two steals and one block , in 34 minutes . Monta Ellis added 13 points ( 6 - 11 FG , 0 - 4 3Pt , 1 - 1 FT ) , two rebounds and two assists , while Jeff Teague chipped in 11 points , eight rebounds and three assists , in 29 minutes . Thaddeus Young added 11 points and five rebounds , in 30 minutes , while C.J . Miles added 16 points and four rebounds off the bench , in 23 minutes . For the Magic , Evan Fournier was the only starter to score in double figures , as he finished with 14 points , while Elfrid Payton finished with 12 points , seven rebounds , two assists and two steals , in 28 minutes . Nikola Vucevic had a tough night from the center position , scoring just two points ( 1 - 10 FG , 10 ) , but he did grab 12 rebounds and recorded an assist and blocked one shot , in 25 minutes . The only other Magic player to reach double figures in points was Jeff Green , who finished with three points in 22 minutes . Up next , the Pacers will stay home to take on the Nets on Friday , while Orlando will head home to go up against the Bulls on Friday .
The Memphis Grizzlies ( 8 - 7 ) defeated the Dallas Mavericks ( 9 - 6 ) 110 - 96 on Monday at Fed Ex Forum Arena in Memphis . The Grizzlies got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Mavericks 21 - 17 in the first quarter and 36 - 24 in the second quarter to take a 20 - point lead heading into the half . They were able to hold on to that lead for the rest of the way , as they went on to finish the game shooting 43 percent from the field , while the Mavericks shot just 39 percent . Mike Conley led the way for the Grizzlies , going 8 - for - 17 from the floor to score a team - high of 21 points , while also adding six assists and three rebounds . He 's now averaging 20 points and 6 assists on the season . Jeff Green was also a big factor in the win , going a perfect 8 - of - 14 from the free - throw line to score 19 points . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 40 points and 20 rebounds over those two games . Marc Gasol recorded a double - doubles as well , finishing with 15 points ( 4 - 12 FG , 7 - 7 FT ) and 10 rebounds . It marked his third straight double - digit rebound game . Matt Barnes chipped in 14 points ( 5 - 14 FG , 3 - 9 3Pt , 1 - 2 FT ) , seven rebounds and three assists as well . The Mavericks were led by the duo of Dirk Nowitzki and Zaza Pachulia , who each scored 14 points and grabbed 10 rebounds a piece . Nowiztizki has now scored 20 or more points in three of his last four games , while averaging 17 points and 9 rebounds over that span . The only other player to score in double figures for the Mavericks was Devin Harris , who came off the bench and finished with 16 points and four rebounds in 27 minutes . Harris has been a nice surprise for this team this season , averaging 15 points and 5 rebounds over his last three games . The other three Mavericks to reach double figures in points were Deron Williams , Wesley Matthews and Wesley Matthews , who all finished with 11 points each . Chandler Parsons struggled shooting the ball , going 3 - for- 9 from the three - point line and 0 - for 4 from beyond the arc to score six points , but he did grab five rebounds and dish out two assists in 25 minutes of action . The Grizz were led in scoring by Zach Randolph , who finished with 13 points and six rebounds in 17 minutes off the Grizzlies bench . Randolph has been one of the few bright spots for this Grizzlies team , averaging 16 points , 5 rebounds and 3 assists over his past three games , as the Grizzlies have been playing better than their record would indicate coming into Monday 's contest .
The Houston Rockets ( 24 - 9 ) defeated the Dallas Mavericks ( 9 - 23 ) 123 - 107 on Wednesday at the American Airlines Center in Dallas . The Rockets were the superior shooters in this game , going 53 percent from the field , while the Mavericks finished at just 41 percent . The assist - to - turnover ratio was the difference in the game , with the Rockets recording 23 assists to 16 turnovers and the Mavericks committing nine turnovers to just nine assists . James Harden led the Rockets in scoring , going 9 - for - 16 from the floor and 4 - of - 7 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 34 points , while also adding 11 rebounds and seven assists . Ryan Anderson was second on the team , finishing with 22 points ( 7 - 12 FG , 4 - 7 3Pt ) and three rebounds of his own . He 's now averaging 20 points and 6 rebounds on the season . Nene Hilario was the only other starter in double figures , finishing the game with 12 points ( 5 - 8 FG , 2 - 5 FT ) and seven rebounds . The Mavericks were led by Harrison Barnes , who went 7 - for 16 from beyond the arc and finished with 21 points . He was able to get to the free throw line six times , converting on six of those attempts . Wesley Matthews also had a nice game , as he finished with 19 points and one assist . The only other Maverick to reach double figures in points was Devin Harris , who finished with 13 points ( 4 - 6 FG , 1 - 1 3 Pt ) , two rebounds and three assists in 21 minutes off the bench . Dirk Nowitzki was held to just seven points , three rebounds and one steal in 15 minutes of action . Deron Williams and Andrew Bogut combined for just nine points , six rebounds and two assists , as they were both held scoreless . Up next , the Rockets will look to keep rolling on the road against the Golden State Warriors on Friday , while Dallas will head home to take on the New Orleans Pelicans on Friday .

The Portland Trail Blazers defeated the host Washington Wizards , 108 - 98 , at Verizon Center on Wednesday . The Trail Blazers ( 19 - 25 ) checked in to Wednesday 's contest with a record of 8 - 9 on the road , while the Wizards ( 18 - 21 ) had won four of their last five games away from home . However , that streak was short - lived , as the Blazers were able to pull away in the fourth quarter on the backs of strong play from their bench . C.J . McCollum led the way with a game - high 25 points , which he supplemented with two rebounds and two assists . Damian Lillard was right behind him with 16 points , six assists and two rebounds . Allen Crabbe led the second unit with 18 points , four rebounds , two assists and a pair of steals . Mason Plumlee posted a 10 - point , 11 - rebound double - double that also included seven assists , a steal and a block . Al-Farouq Aminu supplied eight points , five rebounds , an assist , a block and a steal . Meyers Leonard led the bench with 14 points , three rebounds , three assists , two steals and two steals . The Wizards were paced by Garrett Temple 's 18 points . Marcin Gortat was next with a 16 - point effort that also featured a 13 - rebound , two - block performance . Kelly Oubre , Jr. was notably held scoreless over 12 minutes before exiting with a sprained ankle . Jared Dudley was the only other member of the first unit with double - digit scoring , supplying 10 points , a rebound and four assists . John Wall was only able to muster a modest nine points but did dish out 10 assists , haul in four rebounds and haul in three steals . Bojan Bogdanovic paced the reserves with a bench - leading 16 points . The Blazers head back home to face off with the Minnesota Timberwolves on Friday night , while Washington remains home to tangle with the Philadelphia 76ers on Friday evening as well .

The Knicks were able to make a run in the third quarter though , cutting the deficit to just four points , but the Thunder were n't done there , as they went on to out - score the Knicks 28 - 20 in the fourth quarter to seal the win . He finished with 38 points ( 13 - 22 FG , 3 - 5 3Pt , 9 - 13 FT ) , 14 rebounds and 12 assists , to go along with three steals and one blocked shot , in 38 minutes . He 's now pushed his season averages to 24 points , 10 rebounds and 9 assists per game . The Oklahoma City Thunder defeated the Memphis Grizzlies , 114 - 102 , at Chesapeake Energy Arena on Wednesday . The Grizzlies ( 30 - 22 ) came in to Wednesday 's contest on the second night of a back - to - back , having dropped their previous two contests by a combined 20 points . Memphis was able to make a run in the fourth quarter , however , outscoring the Thunder 34 - 20 , but it was not enough to overcome the Thunder ( 29 - 22 , currently in third place in the Western Conference ) . Russell Westbrook 's 38 - point , 13 - rebound , 12 - assist triple - double led the way for Oklahoma City , and he added three steals and three blocks . Steven Adams posted a 16 - point and 12 - rebound double - double , while Enes Kanter led the bench with 16 points and eight rebounds . The Thunder shot 48 percent from the field and 50 percent from three - point range , while holding the Grizzlies to 48 percent shooting and 16 percent from long range . Marc Gasol 's 31 points led the Grizzlies , a total he supplemented with eight assists , four rebounds , two steals and a block . Mike Conley was next with 18 points , two assists , a rebound and three steals . Chandler Parsons supplied 12 points , three rebounds , an assist and a steal . Tony Allen and Zach Randolph led the second unit with matching 11 - point efforts , with the former adding four boards , a steal and two blocks , and the latter supplying 10 rebounds , three assists and a rebound . Zach Randolph was productive in a reserve role as well with 16 - points , 10 rebounds and three assists . The only other player to score in double digits for the Grizzlies was Tony Allen , who supplied 11 points , four boards and a pair of blocks . The win brings the Grizzlies within two games of the eighth - place Thunder in the West , and they remain in second place in a tight race for the eighth seed in the conference . They head to Dallas to take on the Mavericks on Friday night . Westbrook added 12 assists , 13 rebounds and a trio of steals to his game - high scoring total . Victor Oladipo and Andre Roberson were only able to combine for 13 points on 3 - of - 14 shooting , and Domantas Sabonis went scoreless over 11 minutes before exiting with a sprained ankle . The loss snapped a three - game winning streak for the Thunder , and it was the first time since the All-Star break that Westbrook failed to reach the 20 - point mark . The victory brings the Thunder within a half - game of the eight - seed , but they still hold the tiebreaker over the Grizzlies . They remain home to face off with the Houston Rockets on Friday evening .

DeMarre Carroll started in place of the injured Kyle Korver , who finished with 10 points ( 4 - 10 FG , 1 - 6 3PT ) , seven rebounds and two assists , in 31 minutes . The Pistons were led by Josh Smith , who went 8 - for - 19 from the free throw line and finished with 16 points ( 8 - 19 FG ) , eight rebounds , five assists and one blocked shot , in 35 minutes . Andre Drummond recorded a double - double with 13 points and 16 rebounds , along with one steal and one block , in 38 minutes . Jon Leuer was the only other Piston to reach double figures , as he finished with 14 points , five rebounds and one assist , in 25 minutes off the bench . Up next , the Hawks will stay at home to take on the Hornets on Friday , in what will be the second half of a back - to - back set . Detroit will look to get back on track Friday , when they travel to Charlotte to play the Hornets . This was the second game in as many nights for the Pistons , as they 'll be in Charlotte on Friday .

McCollum were the only Trail Blazers to score in double figures , as they finished with 22 points each . The Charlotte Hornets defeated the host Miami Heat , 109 - 106 , at American Airlines Arena on Wednesday . The Hornets ( 39 - 29 ) checked in to Wednesday 's contest as the Eastern Conference 's hottest team , having won four of their last five games . They were led by a pair of 21 - point efforts from Kemba Walker and Nicolas Batum , with the former adding seven rebounds and seven assists , and the latter posting five rebounds , seven assists and a steal . The latter also supplied seven rebounds , three assists and two steals . The backcourt duo of Courtney Lee and Marvin Williams followed with matching 13 - point tallies , while Courtney Lee added three rebounds and an assist . Marvin Williams also pitched in with five boards , an assist , two steals and a block . Marco Belinelli led the second unit with a 21 - points , 10 - rebound double - double that also included an assist and steal . Charlotte managed a 47 percent success rate from the field overall , and a 50 percent mark from beyond the arc . The Heat were led in scoring by Luol Deng 's 22 points , which he complemented with nine rebounds and three assists . Goran Dragic was right behind him with 16 points , eight assists , seven boards and two blocks . Joe Johnson was next with 13 points , four rebounds , four assists , a steal and a blocked shot . Dwyane Wade and Amar'e Stoudemire combined for just nine points on 3 - of - 13 shooting , but Tyler Johnson led the bench with 18 points and four rebounds . Wayne Ellington was productive in a reserve role as well , posting 17 points , a rebound , a block and a game - high seven rebounds . Miami fell to 39 - 28 but remains in second place in the Eastern Conferences ' Southeast Division . They head to Orlando to take on the Magic on Friday night . Meanwhile , the Hornets remain home and await the Toronto Raptors for a Friday night showdown as well .
The Los Angeles Clippers ( 49 - 25 ) defeated the Boston Celtics ( 32 - 41 ) 119 - 106 on Wednesday at the TD Garden in Boston . The Clippers came out firing on all cylinders in this one , out - scoring the Celtics 34 - 20 in the first quarter and 37 - 14 in the second quarter to take a 20 - point lead heading into the half . The Celtics came out strong in the third quarter though , as they out - scored the Clippers 32 - 14 , but it was too little , too late as the Clippers ran away with the game in the fourth quarter . The assist - to - turnover ratio was the difference in the game , with the Clippers recording 28 assists to just 12 turnovers , while the Celtics committed 10 turnovers to just 10 assists . Despite being out - rebounded 53 - 40 , the Clippers were able to force 29 turnovers from the Celtics , while committing just 10 of their own , which allowed them to coast to the victory . Chris Paul led the way for the Clippers , as he tallied 21 points ( 5 - 9 FG , 3 - 4 3Pt , 8 - 8 FT ) , 10 assists , three rebounds , two steals and one block in the win . J.J. Redick was second on the team , finishing with 27 points ( 11 - 15 FG , 5 - 6 3PT ) , five rebounds and three assists . Matt Barnes finished with 18 points ( 7 - 18 FG , 4 - 13 3PT , 0 - 1 FT ) of his own , to go along with seven rebounds , one assist , one block and one steal . Tyler Zeller led the Celtics in scoring , dropping 16 points and five rebounds in 21 minutes . Marcus Smart struggled shooting the ball , going 0 - for - 6 from the field and scoring zero points in 18 minutes . Kelly Olynyk led the team in scoring off the bench , dropping 19 points ( 4 - 12 FG , 2 - 7 3 Pt , 9 - 10 FT ) to go with seven assists and two steals in 26 minutes . Evan Turner recorded nine points , seven rebounds and 10 assists in 30 minutes , while Marcus Smart went scoreless over 18 minutes , but did dish out four assists and grab four rebounds in that time . The only other Celtics player to score in double figures was Brandon Bass , who finished with 13 points . Up next , the Celtics will look to extend their winning streak to four games on Friday , when they travel to Philadelphia to take on the 76ers . Meanwhile the Clippers will head home to face off with the Toronto Raptors on Friday .

Despite the loss , the Suns were still able to out - rebound the Hawks 51 - 50 and out - assist them 24 - 16 , giving them just enough of an advantage to pull out the victory . The only other player to score in double digits for the Pacers was Jordan Hill , who added seven points ( 3 for 15 FG ) . The Cavs will look to keep rolling on Friday , when they play the second game of a back - to - back , in Indiana . The Celtics are also on the road Friday , as they travel to Indiana to play the Celtics .
The Houston Rockets ( 20 - 7 ) defeated the New Orleans Pelicans ( 9 - 19 ) 122 - 100 on Wednesday at the Toyota Center in Houston . The Rockets were the superior shooters in this game , going 45 percent from the field and 39 percent from beyond the arc , while the Pelicans finished at 41 percent from both the floor and 33 percent from deep . The Pelicans were also out - rebounded 57 - 47 , giving the Rockets even more of an advantage . James Harden led all scorers with 29 points ( 7 - 15 FG , 6 - 12 3Pt , 9 - 11 FT ) , to go along with 11 rebounds and 13 assists , in 34 minutes . He 's now averaging 27 points , 8 rebounds and 6 assists on the season . Eric Gordon came off the bench to score a career - high of 29 points , in 28 minutes , while Trevor Ariza added 20 points , five rebounds and three steals , in 30 minutes . Patrick Beverley recorded a double - double with 13 points ( 5 - 10 FG , 3 - 8 3PT ) and 11 rebounds , along with eight assists and one steal , in 33 minutes . For the Pelicans , Anthony Davis was the only starter to reach double figures in points , as he went 9 - for - 17 from the floor to score 19 points , while also grabbing five rebounds , in 23 minutes . The only other player to score in double figures for the Pelicans was E'Twaun Moore , who finished with eight points , three rebounds and one assist , in 25 minutes . Tyreke Evans was the high - point man for New Orleans , with 16 points , eight rebounds , one assist and one block , in 29 minutes . Jrue Holiday struggled shooting the ball , going just 5 - of - 15 , but still finished with 11 points and five rebounds . Up next , the Rockets will stay home to take on the Timberwolves on Friday , in what will be the second game of a back - to - back for both teams . New Orleans will look to bounce back , as they go on the road to play the Spurs on Friday .
The Sacramento Kings defeated the San Antonio Spurs , 94 - 91 , at Golden 1 Center on Wednesday . The Kings ( 6 - 4 ) were expected to win this game easily , but it took a late run to do so . In fact , Sacramento outscored San Antonio by 12 in the fourth quarter and overtime to pull out the win . The key for the Kings was their defense , as they held the Spurs to 43 percent shooting from the field and 29 percent from three - point range . The assist - to - turnover ratio was decisive as well , with Sacramento recording 19 assists to nine turnovers , while San Antonio committed 14 turnovers to just 24 assists . The Spurs ( 5 - 3 ) had to play this game without Tony Parker and Kawhi Leonard and it clearly hurt them down the stretch . Manu Ginobili was the lone bright spot for San Antonio , as he led the team with 21 points , four rebounds and five assists off the bench . Danny Green was second on the team in scoring , dropping 16 points on 6 - of - 9 shooting . Tim Duncan recorded a double - double , totaling 15 points and eight rebounds . Tony Parker finished with 11 points , six assists and two rebounds of his own . On deck for the Spurs is a road matchup against the Los Angeles Clippers on Friday . This marks Sacramento 's fourth win in a row and they continue to be a force to be reckoned with in the Western Conference . DeMarcus Cousins did all he could to keep the Kings in this game , tallying 25 points , 10 rebounds and a block . Darren Collison and Rudy Gay were the only other Kings players in double figures , as Collison accumulated 19 points , five assists and three rebounds , while Gay amassed 18 points , three rebounds and six assists . Sacramento will look to keep rolling on Friday against the Phoenix Suns on the road .
The San Antonio Spurs ( 55 - 16 ) defeated the Memphis Grizzlies ( 40 - 32 ) 97 - 90 on Wednesday at the AT & T Center in San Antonio . The Spurs were able to hold off the Grizzlies in this one , despite being out - rebounded 42 - 42 . They were the superior shooters in this game , going 48 percent from the field and 31 percent from beyond the arc , while the Grizzlies went 44 percent from both the floor and 35 percent from deep . The Grizzlies were led by Mike Conley , who finished with 22 points ( 7 - 18 FG , 1 - 8 3Pt , 7 - 7 FT ) , six assists and two rebounds in 36 minutes . Marc Gasol recorded a double - double with 13 points ( 6 - 15 FG ) and 10 rebounds , while also recording three assists and one block in 39 minutes . The only other player to score in double digits for the Grizzlies was Vince Carter , who chipped in nine points ( 3 - 10 FG , 3 - 8 FT ) in 25 minutes . LaMarcus Aldridge led the way for the Spurs , as he went 10 - for - 16 from the floor to score 23 points , while adding seven rebounds and three blocked shots . He 's now averaging 23 points and 8 rebounds on the season . Kawhi Leonard was also a big factor in the win . He finished with 19 points , seven rebounds , four assists , one steal and one blocked shot in 38 minutes . It was his second straight game with at least 19 points and seven rebounds . Tony Parker was the only other Spur to reach double figures in points , recording 13 points , two rebounds and seven assists in 30 minutes . Manu Ginobili came off the bench to score 15 points ( 5 - 8 FG , 4 - 6 3PT , 2 - 2 FT ) and hand out five assists in 23 minutes . Despite the loss , the Grizzlies are still in the thick of things in the Western Conference playoff race , as they 're just a half - game behind the Oklahoma City Thunder for the eighth and final playoff spot in the West . They 're currently slotted in the seventh seed in the conference as well , so they 'll look to keep things rolling in the final two games of the regular season . Up next , the Spurs will look to extend their winning streak to six games on Friday , when they take on the Golden State Warriors in a rematch of last year 's Western Conference Finals . The Grizz will look for their first win of the season when they play the Los Angeles Clippers on Friday .

In fact , Memphis held a double - digit lead for the majority of the game , as they led by double - digits for the final 30 - plus minutes . Defense was key , as the Grizzlies held the Jazz to 39 percent shooting from the field and 39 percent from three - point range . Memphis also dominated the rebounding , winning that battle , 37 - 43 . The Jazz ( 23 - 15 ) had to play this game without Derrick Favors and Rudy Gobert and it clearly hurt them down the stretch . Despite the loss , the Heat were still able to force the Cavaliers into 15 turnovers , while committing just 11 of their own , which may have been the difference in the game . Luol Deng also had a nice all - around game , as he finished with 25 points ( 11 - 16 FG ) , eight rebounds and eight assists , in 40 minutes . Chris Andersen recorded 12 points ( 4 - 5 FG , 4 - 6 FT ) and eight rebounds , in 29 minutes . Mario Chalmers struggled shooting the ball , going 2 - for - 12 from the three - point line , but still finished with five points , six assists and two steals , in 31 minutes . LeBron James and Kyrie Irving were the only other Cavaliers to reach double figures in points , as they finished with 30 points ( 9 - 15 FG ) and 25 points , respectively . Irving added four rebounds , three assists and one steal , in 42 minutes , while James added eight assists and four rebounds . Kevin Love finished with 14 points ( 5 - 13 FG , 0 - 4 3PT ) , five rebounds and three assists , while Tristan Thompson chipped in eight points ( 3 - 8 FG ) in 28 minutes off the bench . Up next , the Cavaliers will head home Friday to take on the Trail Blazers , while Miami will stay home Friday and go up against the Nets .

However , the Warriors were unable to hold off the Grizzlies in the final minutes , as they outscored them 24 - 16 in the last 12 minutes to seal the win . The Grizzlies were led by Marc Gasol , who recorded his second double - double of the season , finishing with 18 points ( 8 - 22 FG , 2 - 2 FT ) and 12 rebounds , to go along with six assists , one steal and one block , in 36 minutes . Zach Randolph finished with 13 points ( 6 - 12 FG , 1 - 1 3Pt ) and 10 rebounds , in 34 minutes , while Mike Conley chipped in 13 points , five assists and three steals , in 33 minutes . The only other player to score in double figures for the Grizzlies was Jeff Green , who finished with 10 points ( 5 - 13 FG , 0 - 2 3PT ) , four rebounds and one assist , in 28 minutes . For the Warriors , Klay Thompson led the way with 21 points ( 7 - 16 FG , 3 - 4 3PT , 4 - 4 FT ) , while Stephen Curry added 18 points , seven rebounds and five assists , in 32 minutes . Marreese Speights came up big off the bench , with 16 points on 7 - 10 shooting , in 25 minutes . Draymond Green struggled shooting , going 3 - 9 from the field , but still finished with seven points , nine assists and five rebounds , along with one steal , in 31 minutes . Harrison Barnes added 14 points ( 4 - 8 FG ) , three rebounds , one assist and one blocked shot , while Andrew Bogut added six points and nine rebounds , before fouling out in 24 minutes . Up next , the Grizzlies will head to San Antonio to take on the Spurs on Friday , while the Warriors will head home to play the Clippers on Friday .
The Memphis Grizzlies defeated the Portland Trail Blazers , 102 - 98 , at FedEx Forum on Wednesday . The Grizzlies ( 29 - 11 ) have now won four of their last five games , as they continue to battle for a playoff spot in the Western Conference . Memphis has now won five of its last six games , with Wednesday 's win over the Trail Blazers being the most impressive of the bunch . Zach Randolph led the way for the Grizzlies with 20 points , 15 rebounds and two assists , while Beno Udrih added 17 points , seven rebounds , three assists and one block in 29 minutes . Memphis shot 51 percent from the field and 53 percent from three - point range , while holding Portland to 39 percent shooting and 36 percent from long range . The Trail Blazers ( 30 - 10 ) , meanwhile , have now lost three straight games . LaMarcus Aldridge was the high - point man for Portland with 32 points on 11 - of - 22 shooting , to go along with nine rebounds , two assists and three blocks in 39 minutes . Damian Lillard added 23 points , six rebounds and six assists , but shot just 9 of 26 on his way to a team - high 23 points . Wesley Matthews was the only other Blazer in double figures with 25 points , which he supplemented with four rebounds and one assist . Chris Kaman was limited to just four points but did haul in 11 rebounds and record a steal and block in 30 minutes . The Blazers will look to bounce back on Friday in a road matchup against the Los Angeles Clippers . Memphis will look for their fifth straight win when they take on the New Orleans Pelicans on Friday .
The Toronto Raptors ( 41 - 19 ) defeated the Portland Trail Blazers ( 33 - 30 ) 117 - 115 on Wednesday at the Air Canada Centre in Toronto . The Raptors were the superior shooters in this game , going 51 percent from the field and 50 percent from beyond the arc , while the Trail Blazers finished at 47 percent from both the floor and 41 percent from deep . The Trail Blazers were also out - rebounded by the Raptors 38 - 36 , giving them just enough of an advantage to pull out the win . The Blazers were led by Damian Lillard , who went 16 - for - 28 from the floor , 6 - for- 13 from the three - point line and 12 - for from the free throw line to score a game - high of 50 points , while also adding five assists and three rebounds . It was his second 50 - point game in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 31 points , 6 rebounds and 5 assists per game . C.J . McCollum was the only other Blazer to reach double figures in points , as he finished with 24 points ( 8 - 17 FG , 4 - 5 3Pt , 3 - 7 FT ) , five assists , one rebound and two steals . He 's now averaging 17 points and 6 assists on the season . The only other player to reach the 20 - point mark for the Raptors was DeMar DeRozan , who finished with 38 points ( 7 - 19 FG , 24 - 25 FT ) and three assists . He was able to get to the free throws at will , converting 24 - of - 25 attempts from the line . Kyle Lowry was the other starter to reach 20 points , adding 28 points , five rebounds and six assists . It marked his second straight game with at least 20 points and five rebounds . Jonas Valanciunas recorded a double - double , finishing with 17 points , 10 rebounds and one blocked shot . He also added one assist and one steal in 27 minutes . Norman Powell started in place of the injured Terrence Ross ( ankle ) and finished with 10 points ( 3 - 5 FG , 2 - 3 3PT ) and six rebounds in 22 minutes . With the win , the Raptors extended their winning streak to three games , as they 're currently in second place in the Eastern Conference 's Atlantic Division . They 're home again on Friday , when they 'll take on the New York Knicks on the second night of a back - to - back .

The Grizzlies got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Magic 31 - 33 in the first quarter alone . The Magic were able to make a run in the second quarter , but were out - scored 32 - 16 in the third quarter , giving the Grizzlies the lead for good in the fourth quarter . With this win , the Grizzlies have now won three of their last four games , while the Magic have now lost three in a row . This marks the Magic 's fifth loss in their last six games , as they continue to slide down the standings . Tobias Harris led the Magic in scoring , finishing with 16 points ( 6 - 9 FG , 3 - 4 3Pt , 1 - 1 FT ) , four rebounds and three assists , in 39 minutes . Nikola Vucevic recorded a double - double , as he totaled 16 points and 14 rebounds , along with three assists and two blocked shots , in 38 minutes . Aaron Gordon finished with 10 points and nine rebounds , in 24 minutes , while Victor Oladipo went just 1 - of - 10 from the field and 0 - for - 4 from the three - point line , to finish with five points , six assists and four rebounds . Elfrid Payton was the only other Magic player to score in double figures , as his 14 points and five assists were both season - bests . Mario Hezonja came off the bench to score 16 points , to go along with five assists , three rebounds and one steal , in 35 minutes . Zach Randolph led the way for the Grizzlies , with 18 points ( 8 - 16 FG , 2 - 4 FT ) and 13 rebounds in 34 minutes . Marc Gasol finished with 17 points ( 7 - 20 FG ) , five rebounds , five assists and three steals , in 42 minutes . Vince Carter was the player of the game , with 30 points ( 11 - 18 FG ) and eight rebounds , while Mike Conley finished with 12 points , nine assists , six rebounds , two steals and one blocked shot , in 40 minutes . Courtney Lee chipped in 16 points on 6 - 12 shooting , including 3 - 6 from deep , in 33 minutes . Despite the loss , the Magic shot 47 percent from the floor and 36 percent from long range , while they out - rebounded the Grizzlies 54 - 46 . Up next , the Grizz will stay at home to take on the Spurs on Wednesday , in what will be the second half of a back - to - back for both teams , in a rematch of last season 's Western Conference Semifinals . Orlando will look to get back on track on Wednesday in a home matchup against the Spurs .
The Washington Wizards ( 31 - 21 ) defeated the Brooklyn Nets ( 9 - 44 ) 114 - 110 on Wednesday at the Barclays Center in Brooklyn . The Wizards came into this game as a double - digit favorite and they left no doubt who the better team was in this one . The Nets came out firing on all cylinders in the first half , out - scoring the Wizards 66 - 52 , but the Wizards came back in the second half to out - score the Nets 61 - 48 , giving them just enough of an advantage to pull out the win . The key for Washington was their defense , as they held the Nets to 42 percent shooting from the field and 27 percent from the three - point line . They also forced the Nets into 16 turnovers , while committing just 12 of their own , which may have been the difference in the game . Bradley Beal led the way for the Wizards , as he tallied 31 points ( 12 - 25 FG , 3 - 6 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) , six rebounds and two assists in the victory . John Wall finished with 23 points ( 7 - 24 FG , 1 - 4 3PT , 8 - 10 FT ) and 12 assists of his own , to go along with six rebounds , six steals and two blocked shots . Otto Porter , Jr. recorded his first double - double of the season , totaling 20 points and 10 rebounds . Marcin Gortat recorded a 14 - point ( 5 - 10 FG ) and 14 - rebound double double as well , while the only other player to score in double figures for the Wiz was Nene Hilario , who finished with 15 points and eight rebounds off the bench . Bojan Bogdanovic led the Nets in scoring with 21 points ( 6 - 18 FG , 2 - 9 3PT ) , five rebounds , four assists and two steals . Brook Lopez finished with 20 points ( 8 - 17 FG , 0 - 4 0Pt ) , seven rebounds and four assists , while Rondae Hollis-Jefferson recorded a 13 - point , 11 - rebound triple - double . Sean Kilpatrick was the only bench player to reach double figures in points with 14 , while also adding 10 rebounds , two assists and one block in 28 minutes . Up next , the Wizards will head home to take on the Toronto Raptors on Friday night while the Nets will travel to Philadelphia to play the 76ers on Friday evening .
The Miami Heat ( 14 - 30 ) defeated the Milwaukee Bucks ( 20 - 23 ) 109 - 97 on Wednesday at American Airlines Arena in Miami . The Heat were able to pull away in the fourth quarter after a strong fourth quarter from the Bucks , as they out - scored them 58 - 46 in the final 12 minutes . Dion Waiters led the way for the Heat , as he finished with a game - high of 33 points ( 12 - 18 FG , 5 - 7 3Pt , 4 - 8 FT ) , to go along with three rebounds and three assists , in 33 minutes . Goran Dragic followed up with 25 points ( 8 - 13 FG , 3 - 5 3PT , 6 - 7 FT ) and six assists , while Hassan Whiteside chipped in 16 points ( 7 - 8 FG , 2 - 4 FT ) with 15 rebounds , two blocks and one steal , in 30 minutes . The Bucks were led by Giannis Antetokounmpo , who finished with 24 points , 10 rebounds , three assists and two steals , in 38 minutes . Matthew Dellavedova added 15 points and seven assists , along with two rebounds and one assist , in 36 minutes . John Henson finished with 11 points and nine rebounds , while Malcolm Brogdon added 16 points , seven rebounds , four assists , one steal and one block , in 32 minutes off the bench . The only other player to score in double digits for the Bucks was Mirza Teletovic , who added nine points , in 17 minutes . Up next , the Heat will stay home to take on the Wizards on Friday , while the Bucks will head home to go up against the Trail Blazers on Friday .
The Chicago Bulls ( 14 - 8 ) defeated the Portland Trail Blazers ( 17 - 6 ) 115 - 106 on Wednesday at the United Center in Chicago . Derrick Rose led the way for the Bulls , scoring a game - high 31 points on 14 - of - 24 shooting from the field . He also added five assists , three rebounds and one steal in 32 minutes . Pau Gasol recorded a double - double of 13 points and 10 rebounds in 33 minutes , while Jimmy Butler chipped in 11 points and eight rebounds in 44 minutes . The Bulls shot 50 percent from the floor and 33 percent from three - point range , while the Trail Blazers shot 49 percent from beyond the arc . The Trail Blazers were led by LaMarcus Aldridge , who finished with 35 points ( 15 - 24 FG , 1 - 1 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) , nine rebounds and two blocked shots in 39 minutes . Damian Lillard added 35 points of his own , going 13 - for - 21 from the point guard position , while also adding six assists and five rebounds in 38 minutes . Wesley Matthews finished with 10 points and four rebounds in 37 minutes . Up next , the Bulls will stay home to take on the Pistons on Friday , while Portland will head home to go up against the Heat on Friday .
The Los Angeles Clippers ( 32 - 16 ) defeated the Chicago Bulls ( 26 - 20 ) 120 - 93 on Wednesday at the Staples Center in Los Angeles . The Clippers got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Bulls 24 - 22 in the first quarter . They went on to out - score the Bulls 36 - 20 in the second quarter , giving them enough of an advantage to coast to a comfortable victory in front of their home crowd . They shot 54 percent from the field and 53 percent from beyond the arc , while the Bulls shot just 43 percent and 33 percent , respectively . The assist - to - turnover ratio was the difference in the game , with the Clippers recording 26 assists to 11 turnovers and the Bulls committing nine turnovers to just 19 assists . The Bulls were led by Jimmy Butler , who finished with 23 points ( 8 - 22 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt , 5 - 7 FT ) and one assist , in 37 minutes . Derrick Rose finished with 20 points ( 10 - 17 FG ) , five rebounds and four assists , in 33 minutes . Pau Gasol finished with 15 points ( 7 - 10 FG , 1 - 1 FT ) , 14 rebounds and five assists , while Taj Gibson recorded a double - double with seven points ( 3 - 8 FG ) and 11 rebounds , in 30 minutes . The only other player to score in double digits for the Bulls was E'Twaun Moore , who chipped in 10 points ( 4 - 7 FG ) . The Clipper 's bench was huge in this game , as Austin Rivers led the team in scoring with 26 points ( 11 - 15 FG ) in 26 minutes off the bench . Chris Paul finished with 19 points and seven assists , to go along with two steals and one rebound , while DeAndre Jordan finished with 17 points and 20 rebounds , along with four blocked shots , in 36 minutes . J.J. Redick finished with 21 points and four rebounds , while Marreese Speights added 16 points in 21 minutes . Up next , the Clippers will stay at home to take on the Nuggets on Friday , in what will be their second game in as many nights . Meanwhile , the Bulls will head home to go up against the Kings on Friday .
The Atlanta Hawks ( 47 - 12 ) defeated the Miami Heat ( 25 - 33 ) 93 - 91 on Wednesday at American Airlines Arena in Miami . The Hawks came out strong in this one , out - scoring the Heat 17 - 12 in the first quarter and out - rebounding them 37 - 37 in the second quarter alone . The Heat were able to make a run in the third quarter though , as they out - scored the Hawks 29 - 20 , but it was n't enough as the Hawks held on for the win . The assist - to - turnover ratio was the difference in the game , with the Hawks recording 23 assists to just 18 turnovers , while the Heat committed 23 turnovers to just 17 assists . Paul Millsap led the Hawks in scoring , as he tallied 22 points ( 8 - 15 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt , 4 - 5 FT ) , five rebounds , four assists and two steals . Dennis Schroeder finished with 16 points ( 5 - 14 FG , 1 - 1 3 Pt , 5 - 6 FT ) and 10 assists , giving him his second double - double in a row . He 's now averaging 17 points and 8 assists on the season . Kent Bazemore was the only other starter in double figures , finishing with 15 points ( 6 - 10 FG ) , two rebounds , one assist and three steals . Hassan Whiteside was the star of the show for the Heat . He finished with 14 points and 24 rebounds in 34 minutes . He was able to get to the free throw line a game - high 24 times , converting on 16 of those attempts . Dwyane Wade was second on the team with 22 points , four rebounds and four assists . The only other player to reach double figures in points was James Johnson , who scored 16 points in 35 minutes off the bench . Despite the loss , the Heat still hold the Eastern Conference 's sixth best record . Up next , the Hawks will head home to take on the Wizards on Friday , while Miami will stay home and play the Nets on Friday .

They were able to hold the lead for the majority of the game , but the Nets battled back to make it a one - point game by the end of the third quarter . The Nets made a run in the fourth quarter though , cutting the Blazers ' lead to one point , but Damian Lillard answered with a layup of his own to put the game out of reach . Lillard finished with 28 points ( 8 - 14 FG , 4 - 6 3Pt , 8 - 9 FT ) , 10 assists and five rebounds in 38 minutes . He 's now averaging 28 points and 10 assists on the season . The Houston Rockets defeated the host Los Angeles Clippers , 109 - 105 , at Staples Center on Wednesday . The Rockets ( 4 - 3 ) came into this game as a double - digit favorite and they left no doubt who the better team was . In fact , the Rockets led for the entirety of the second half , as they held the lead for the final 30 - plus minutes . The assist - to - turnover ratio was decisive , with Houston recording 16 assists to just 16 turnovers , while the Clippers committed 29 turnovers to just 12 assists . Free-throw shooting was the difference in the game , with the Rockets hitting 90 percent of their free - throws to the Clippers 68 percent . Houston was led by James Harden , who tallied 46 points , four rebounds and two assists . Dwight Howard recorded a 20 - point , 20 - rebound double - double , adding three assists and a block to his tally . Marcus Thornton was the only other starter in double figures , totaling 16 points , five rebounds and three steals . The bench was huge for the Rockets , as Eric Gordon , Nene Hilario and Lou Williams combined for 40 points , nine rebounds and seven assists . The Clippers ( 4 2 ) have been dominant on the boards this season , but this was easily their worst performance of the year . Blake Griffin led the team in scoring , as he dropped 35 points , 11 rebounds and five assists on 14 - of - 22 shooting . J.J. Redick was second on the team , totaling 19 points , two rebounds and four assists . DeAndre Jordan recorded an 11 points , 14 rebounds , three blocks and two steals . Austin Rivers and Marreese Speights each scored 10 points a piece off the bench . Los Angeles will look to bounce back on Friday in a road matchup against the Golden State Warriors . Houston will be in action again on Friday , when they host the San Antonio Spurs for their next game .

This was a big win for the Spurs , who have now won five of their last six games . The Pacers came out firing on all cylinders in this one , out - scoring the Magic 26 - 19 in the first quarter alone . They shot 53 percent from the field and 50 percent from three - point range , while the Magic shot just 37 percent from beyond the arc and 24 percent from long range . They also out - rebounded the Pacers 49 - 45 , giving them a huge advantage in that category . The Magic were led by Tobias Harris , who scored 22 points ( 8 - 17 FG , 1 - 4 3Pt , 5 - 6 FT ) , to go along with six rebounds and two steals in 30 minutes . He 's now averaging 16 points and 6 rebounds on the season . Coming off the bench , C.J . Miles had a monster game . He scored a game - high of 34 points ( 13 - 19 FG , 6 - 9 3PT , 2 - 2 FT ) and grabbed six rebounds , while also adding seven assists , six steals and one blocked shot in 31 minutes . It was a season - high in points for him and a nice surprise for the Pacers . Damjan Rudez also had a nice game , scoring 17 points and grabbing five rebounds in 27 minutes . The only other Pacer to reach double figures in points was Rodney Stuckey , who recorded a double - double with 15 points and 10 rebounds in just 20 minutes . George Hill had a solid all - around game as well , scoring 13 points and dishing out six assists in 25 minutes . Both teams play on Friday , as the Pacers will travel to Charlotte to take on the Hornets and the Magic will go on the road to Boston to play the Celtics .

The Magic were also out - rebounded by the Hawks 40 - 39 , giving the Hawks even more of an advantage . Up next , the Hornets will stay home to take on the 76ers on Friday , in what will be the second half of a back - to - back for both teams . The Pistons will head home to go up against the Heat on Friday .

Up next , the Spurs will head home Friday to take on the Timberwolves , while Milwaukee will stay home Friday and go up against the Pistons .

The Chicago Bulls defeated the Indiana Pacers , 102 - 100 , at United Center on Wednesday . The Bulls ( 18 - 12 ) came in to Wednesday 's contest on the second night of a back - to - back , having dropped their previous two contests by a combined nine points . However , they were able to prevail with a much - needed victory , as Jimmy Butler and Doug McDermott led the way with 28 and 29 points , respectively . Butler added four rebounds , four assists , two steals and one block , while McDermott added five assists , one rebound and one steal in 41 minutes off the bench . Pau Gasol posted a 13 - point , 11 - rebound double - double that also included one assist and three blocks . Taj Gibson and Kirk Hinrich were the only other Bulls players to score in double digits , as they combined for just 11 points on 4 - of - 14 shooting . The Pacers ( 18 13 ) were led by George Hill 's 20 points , which he supplemented with seven rebounds , three assists and four steals . Paul George was right behind him with 19 points , five boards , four dimes , four steals and four assists . Lavoy Allen was next with a near triple - double with 10 points , 12 rebounds , and one assist . Monta Ellis went for 13 points , while C.J . Miles led the bench with 13 points . Ian Mahinmi and Rodney Stuckey were productive in reserve roles as well with matching eight - point efforts , with the former adding seven boards , one assist , one steal , one block and one three - pointer , and the latter supplying five rebounds and one blocked shot . The only other Pacer to reach double figures was Al Jefferson , who posted eight points , three rebounds and three assists in 20 minutes . Indiana remains in last place in the Eastern Conference 's Central Division . They head to Milwaukee to take on the Bucks on Friday night . Jimmy Butler 's 28 points paced the Bulls , a total he complemented with four boards , five assists and two steals . McDermott followed with a second unit - leading 16 points , seven rebounds and a block . Gasol and Gibson posted matching six - point tallies , while Gibson hauled in 14 boards , dished out two assists , recorded two steals , and recorded two blocks . The bench was led by Nikola Mirotic 's 0 - for - 2 tally from the field , but he did haul in four rebounds and dish out one assist over 20 minutes on the court . Kirk Hin Richrich and Taj Gibson were only able to muster a pair of three - point totals , but Bobby Portis led the second unit with seven points and seven rebounds in 27 minutes . Chicago remains in second place in both the Eastern Conferences ' Central Division , and is currently slotted in the sixth seed in the conference as well . They 're home again on Friday evening to face off with the Toronto Raptors .

The Hornets were able to hold off the Wizards for a much - needed win to keep their playoff hopes alive in the Eastern Conference playoff race , as they are now just a half - game behind the Atlanta Hawks for the final projected playoff seed in the East . The Wizards , on the other hand , have now lost four of their last five games and are just a game and a half ahead of the Miami Heat for the eighth and final playoff spot . With the loss , the Wizards are now tied with the Hornets for the last projected playoff spot in the Southeast Division , while the Heat sit just one game ahead of them for the seventh spot . The loss snapped a three - game winning streak for the Wizards , but it was n't for a lack of effort , as the team shot just 37 percent from the field and 33 percent from three - point range . John Wall and Bradley Beal led the way for Washington , scoring 19 points each . Wall added eight assists and four rebounds , while Beal added three rebounds , two assists , one steal and one block . The San Antonio Spurs ( 36 - 9 ) defeated the Toronto Raptors ( 28 - 17 ) 108 - 106 on Wednesday at the Air Canada Centre in Toronto . The Raptors came into this game as a double - digit favorite , but the Spurs were able to pull out a big road win to keep their playoff hopes alive . The Spurs were the superior shooters in this game , going 45 percent from the field and 29 percent from beyond the three - point line , while the Raptors finished at 45 percent shooting from the floor and just 24 percent from deep . Despite out - rebounding the Spurs 45 - 36 , the Raptors were out - scored in the paint 45 - 32 , which may have been the difference in the game . LaMarcus Aldridge led the team with 21 points ( 6 - 14 FG , 9 - 11 FT ) and seven rebounds , while also adding two assists and one steal . He 's had a nice stretch of three games where he 's averaging 24 points and 10 rebounds .
