He continues to be one of the most consistent scorers in the NBA , averaging 25 points over his last five games . It was his second 30 - point game in a row , a stretch where he has averaged 27 points and 8 assists . Norman Powell had a solid game as well , finishing with 16 points and four rebounds . The only other player to score in double digits for the Raptors was Terrence Ross , who finished with 21 . Ross has been a huge part of the Raptors ' offense over recent weeks , averaging 17 points and 6 rebounds over his past four games . Jonas Valanciunas recorded a solid double - double with nine points and 13 rebounds , but it was n't enough to keep up with the Spurs ' big men . Toronto 's next game will be on the road against the New York Knicks on Friday , while San Antonio will be at home against the Brooklyn Nets on Friday .

The Detroit Pistons ( 4 - 19 ) defeated the Phoenix Suns ( 12 - 12 ) 105 - 103 on Wednesday at the US Airways Center in Phoenix . The Pistons were able to hold off the Suns in this one , despite being down by as many as 20 points in the fourth quarter . The Suns were up by as much as 12 points in this game , but the Pistons came back and took the lead in the final seconds . The key for Detroit was their defense , as they held the Suns to 47 percent shooting from the field and 32 percent from the three - point line . They also forced the Suns into 17 turnovers , while committing only 16 of their own , which may have been the difference in the game . Andre Drummond was the player of the game , as he tallied 23 points ( 10 - 14 FG , 3 - 4 FT ) and 14 rebounds in the win . He 's now averaging 23 points and 12 rebounds on the season . Kentavious Caldwell-Pope was second on the team with 14 points ( 5 - 9 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt ) , while adding five rebounds and three steals . Josh Smith recorded a double - double with 12 points and 11 rebounds . The bench was huge for the Pistons , as Tobias Harris , Jon Leuer and Ish Smith all scored in double figures with 12 and 11 points respectively . The only other Piston to reach double figures in points was Stanley Johnson , who finished with 11 points and six assists in 24 minutes off the bench . Goran Dragic was the high - point man for the Suns . He finished with 18 points ( 8 - 12 FG , 1 - 3 3PT ) , five rebounds , five assists and two steals in 32 minutes . Markieff Morris finished with 17 points ( 7 - 13 FG ) , eight rebounds , two assists , two steals and two blocked shots . Eric Bledsoe and P.J . Tucker were the only other Suns to score in double digits with 16 and 16 points , respectively . Up next , the Pistons will head home to take on the Trail Blazers on Friday , while the Suns will travel to San Antonio to play the Spurs on Friday .
The Houston Rockets ( 30 - 9 ) defeated the Toronto Raptors ( 24 - 13 ) 129 - 122 on Wednesday at the Air Canada Centre in Toronto . The Rockets came into this game as a double - digit favorite and they left no doubt who the better team was , as they took care of business in this one . In fact , the Rockets led for the majority of the game , as the Raptors never led by more than seven points in the second half . The shooting was the difference , with the Rockets shooting 52 percent from the field and 29 percent from three - point range , while the Raptors shot 54 percent on their end . The assist - to - turnover ratio was decisive as well , with Houston recording 27 assists to 15 turnovers , while Toronto committed 17 turnovers to just 19 assists . James Harden led the way for the Rockets , as he tallied 40 points ( 13 - 26 FG , 4 - 9 3Pt , 10 - 10 FT ) , 10 rebounds and 11 assists in the win . He also recorded two steals and two blocks in the victory . Trevor Ariza finished second on the team , totaling 17 points , seven rebounds and three assists . Eric Gordon was a huge spark off the bench , providing 19 points ( 7 - 16 FG , 1 - 9 FT ) and four rebounds in 33 minutes . He 's now averaging 22 points and 6 rebounds on the season . The only other player to score in double figures for Houston was Eric Gordon , who provided 28 points ( 12 - 13 FG ) , five rebounds and one block in 26 minutes . DeMar DeRozan did all he could to keep the Raptors in this game , accumulating 36 points , six rebounds , five assists and one blocked shot in the defeat . He did that damage on 13 - of - 21 shooting , going 10 - for - 10 from the free - throw line and 13 - by - 21 from the line in 39 minutes of action . The other two starters , Kyle Lowry and DeMarre Carroll were the only other Raptors to reach double figures in points . Carroll finished with 26 points and eight rebounds , while Lowry finished with 12 points , five boards , six assists and four steals in 40 minutes . The Raptors will look to build off this win on Friday , when they host the New York Knicks for their next game . Harden 's 40 - point , 11 - assist double - double was his third in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 31 points , 11 rebounds and 10 assists per game . He has now recorded at least 30 points and 10 rebounds in each of his last four games , as his efficiency has been at an all - time high .

Joakim Noah recorded a double - double of 18 points and 15 rebounds , along with six assists and two steals , in 40 minutes , while Bobby Portis chipped in 12 points and seven rebounds , in 31 minutes off the bench . The Warriors were led by Klay Thompson , who went 13 - for - 27 from the field to score 30 points , while also adding 10 rebounds , two assists and one steal , in 44 minutes . Stephen Curry finished with 21 points ( 9 - 23 FG , 2 - 9 3PT , 1 - 1 FT ) , nine assists , four rebounds and three steals , while Draymond Green added 10 points , nine rebounds , six assists , two blocked shots , one steal and one three - pointer , in 39 minutes . Marreese Speights finished with 10 points ( 5 - 14 FG , 0 - 2 3PT ) and eight rebounds , while Harrison Barnes added 12 points , five rebounds and two assists . Andre Iguodala was the only other Warriors player to reach double figures in points , as he finished with 24 points ( 10 - 17 FG ) and nine rebounds in 30 minutes . With the win , the Warriors improved to 35 - 7 on the season , while the Bulls go on to finish second in the Eastern Conference . Next , the Bulls will head to San Antonio to take on the Spurs on Friday , in what will be the second half of a back - to - back , as the Warriors will go on the road to play the Clippers on Friday .
The Minnesota Timberwolves ( 21 - 45 ) defeated the Oklahoma City Thunder ( 44 - 21 ) 99 - 96 on Wednesday at Chesapeake Energy Arena in Oklahoma City . The Timberwolves came out strong in this one , out - scoring the Thunder 24 - 21 in the first quarter , but the Thunder battled back to make it a one - point game heading into the fourth quarter . However , the Timberwolves were able to out - score the Thunder 30 - 23 in the final 12 minutes to seal the win and keep their playoff hopes alive . Despite being out - rebounded 54 - 37 , the Thunder were still able to force the Timberwolves into 24 turnovers , which may have been the difference in the game . The Thunder shot 43 percent from the field and 22 percent from three - point range , while the Timberwolves shot 43 % from the floor and 33 % from long range . The T-Wolves were led by Gorgui Dieng , who went 7 - for - 11 from the free throw line to score 25 points , while also grabbing nine rebounds . He 's now averaging 17 points and 9 rebounds on the season . Karl-Anthony Towns recorded a double - double with 17 points ( 8 - 15 FG , 1 - 2 FT ) and 12 rebounds , while Ricky Rubio recorded a triple - double of his own , finishing with 13 points ( 4 - 9 FG , 3 - 6 3Pt ) , 12 assists and eight rebounds in 36 minutes . Andrew Wiggins was the only other Timberwolve to reach double figures in points , as he finished with 20 points and five steals in 35 minutes . Russell Westbrook led the way for the Thunder with 26 points , eight assists and four rebounds in 37 minutes . Kevin Durant finished with 28 points ( 11 - 20 FG , 2 - 5 3PT , 4 - 4 FT ) , six rebounds and one assist in 38 minutes . He did have six turnovers though , so it was n't all good for the All-Star . Enes Kanter had a nice game off the bench , scoring 17 points on 7 - of - 9 shooting and grabbing 14 rebounds in 21 minutes . Steven Adams recorded eight points and 13 rebounds in 25 minutes , while Dion Waiters had three points ( 1 - 8 FG ) and two assists in 18 minutes . Next up for the Timberwolves is a road matchup against the New Orleans Pelicans on Friday . For the Thunder , they 'll look to extend their winning streak to three games when they take on the New York Knicks on Friday in New York .
The Oklahoma City Thunder defeated the Memphis Grizzlies , 104 - 84 , at FedEx Forum on Wednesday . The Grizzlies ( 3 - 3 ) were expected to win this game easily and they did just that , but it was close throughout . In fact , neither team led by more than 12 points , as it was a single - digit margin for the entirety of the second half . The key for the Thunder was their shooting , as they went 49 percent from the field and 33 percent from three - point range , while the Grizzlies went just 37 percent on their end . The assist - to - turnover ratio was decisive as well , with Oklahoma City recording 15 assists to 13 turnovers , while Memphis committed 19 turnovers to just 19 assists . The Thunder also dominated the rebounding , winning that battle , 47 - 36 . Kevin Durant was the player of the game , as he tallied 36 points , 10 rebounds , two assists , one steal and one block on 11 - of - 23 shooting . Russell Westbrook finished second on the team , totaling 25 points , nine rebounds and five assists . Enes Kanter came off the bench to provide 16 points , four rebounds and two steals . The only other player to score in double digits for Oklahoma City was Serge Ibaka , who finished with eight points and seven rebounds . Oklahoma City will look to build off this win on Friday in a road matchup against the New Orleans Pelicans . Memphis had to play this game without Marc Gasol and Zach Randolph and they simply did n't have enough in the arsenal to keep up with the Thunder . Zach Randolph finished with 16 points and eight rebounds , while Marc Gasor totaled 17 points , five rebounds and four assists . Mike Conley was the only other starter with more than five points , accruing just five points and six assists in the defeat . The bench really struggled , as Zach Randolph led the team with just seven points , three rebounds and one assist . Memphis ' next game will be on Friday , when they host the Los Angeles Clippers for their next game .
The Portland Trail Blazers ( 9 - 12 ) defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves ( 8 - 11 ) 109 - 103 on Wednesday at the Target Center in Minneapolis . The Trail Blazers were able to hold off the Timberwolves in this one , as they out - scored the Timberwolves 34 - 21 in the fourth quarter to secure the win . The Blazers were the superior shooters in this game , going 51 percent from the field and 50 percent from three - point range , while the Timberwolves finished at 46 percent shooting from the floor and 33 percent from beyond the arc . The Timberwolves were also out - rebounded 40 - 40 , giving the Trail Blazers just enough of an advantage to pull out the victory . Damian Lillard and C.J . McCollum led the way for the Blazers . Lillard finished with 19 points ( 6 - 15 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 6 - 6 FT ) , seven assists and three rebounds in 37 minutes . He 's now averaging 23 points and 7 assists on the season . McCllum on the other hand finished with 17 points ( 7 - 17 FG , 3 - 5 3PT ) , six assists , five rebounds and two steals in 35 minutes . Al-Farouq Aminu went 5 - for - 7 from deep and finished with 16 points ( 5 - 7 FG , 2 - 2 3PT , 4 - 5 FT ) and three steals in 27 minutes . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 40 points and 12 rebounds over those two games . Meyers Leonard was the only other Blazer to reach double figures in points . He finished with 14 points ( 4 - 10 FG ) and two rebounds in 24 minutes off the bench . Karl-Anthony Towns was the star of the show for the Timberwolves . He went off for 27 points ( 13 - 21 FG ) , 12 rebounds , two assists and two blocked shots in 32 minutes . After struggling with his shot in the past two games , it was good to see him get back on track Wednesday . Andrew Wiggins also had a solid showing . He had 17 points and five rebounds in 40 minutes . Ricky Rubio finished with nine points , six rebounds and 15 assists in 34 minutes . The only other Timberwolve in double figures was Kevin Martin , who had 11 points ( 3 - 6 FG ) . The Wolves ' next game will be on the road against the Los Angeles Clippers on Friday , while they 'll be at home against the New Orleans Pelicans on Friday .
The Indiana Pacers ( 6 - 6 ) defeated the Cleveland Cavaliers ( 9 - 2 ) 103 - 93 on Wednesday at Bankers Life Fieldhouse in Indianapolis . The Pacers were able to hold off the Cavaliers in this one , despite being out - rebounded 51 - 40 by the Cavaliers . The Cavaliers were the superior shooters in this game , going 41 percent from the field and 37 percent from three - point range , while the Pacers finished at 50 percent from both the floor and 36 percent from long range . Despite the loss , the Pacers were still able to force the Cavaliers into 18 turnovers , while committing just 10 of their own , which may have been the difference in the game . Kevin Love was the high - point man for the Cavaliers , as he finished with 27 points ( 11 - 23 FG , 4 - 10 3Pt , 1 - 4 FT ) and 16 rebounds in 33 minutes . Kyrie Irving was n't far behind , finishing with 24 points ( 10 - 20 FG ) and seven assists in 32 minutes . The only other player to score in double digits for Cleveland was Channing Frye , who finished with nine points ( 2 - 4 FG , 5 - 6 FT ) in 13 minutes off the bench . Tristan Thompson recorded a double - double with 12 rebounds and three assists in 28 minutes , while Iman Shumpert scored two points ( 1 - 6 FG , 0 - 1 3PT ) and dished out two assists in 27 minutes . Paul George led the way for the Pacers with 21 points ( 8 - 18 FG , 3 - 9 3PT , 2 - 2 FT ) , 11 rebounds , five assists , two steals and one blocked shot in 37 minutes . Jeff Teague finished with 20 points , eight assists , four rebounds , one steal and one block in 35 minutes . Thaddeus Young chipped in 16 points ( 7 - 14 FG ) , six rebounds and one steal in 36 minutes . Myles Turner finished with 12 points and nine rebounds , while C.J . Miles added 10 points ( 4 - 7 FG ) in 23 minutes in his second game back from a knee injury . Up next , the Cavaliers will head home to take on the Brooklyn Nets on Friday , while Indiana will stay home and go up against the New York Knicks on Friday .
The visiting Utah Jazz defeated the host Detroit Pistons , 97 - 96 , at Palace of Auburn Hills on Wednesday . The Jazz ( 3 - 4 ) have now won three straight games after a slow start to the season , as they continue to battle for a playoff spot in the Western Conference . Wednesday 's win came on the back of strong play from star forward Derrick Favors , who posted a double - double of 16 points and 12 rebounds . Forward Gordon Hayward added 17 points , four rebounds , four assists , three steals and two blocks on 5 - of - 13 shooting . Center Enes Kanter , meanwhile , posted a 14 - point , 11 - rebound double that also included a steal and a block . Utah shot 46 percent from the field and 40 percent from three - point range , while holding Detroit to 39 percent shooting and 26 percent from beyond the arc . The Pistons ( 2 - 3 ) were led by Brandon Jennings ' 23 points , which he supplemented with five assists , two rebounds and a steal . Greg Monroe was right behind him with a 19 - point effort that also featured 11 rebounds and two assists . Andre Drummond turned in a typically dominant performance with 11 points , 18 rebounds , one steal and one block . Kentavious Caldwell-Pope and Josh Smith turned in matching 11 - point efforts , with the former adding a rebound and one assist , and the latter supplying nine rebounds and four assists . The only other player to score in double digits for the Pistons was reserve guard Jon Leuer , who contributed nine points , three rebounds , three assists and one steal in 17 minutes off the bench . For the Jazz , it was Alec Burks who led the way with 14 points , along with four assists and three rebounds . The team shot a solid 46 percent and knocked down 10 three - pointers on the night . Up next , the Jazz will head home to take on the Wizards on Friday night , while the Pistons will stay home to face the Heat on Friday evening as well .
The Los Angeles Clippers ( 47 - 27 ) defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves ( 25 - 50 ) 99 - 79 on Monday at the Target Center in Minneapolis . The Clippers came out firing on all cylinders in this one , out - scoring the Timberwolves 32 - 17 in the first quarter alone . They were able to hold off the Timberwolves in the second and third quarters , where they out - scored them 32 - 19 , to secure the nine - point victory in front of their home crowd . Chris Paul led the way for the Clippers , finishing with 20 points ( 6 - 16 FG , 1 - 4 3Pt , 7 - 7 FT ) , 16 assists and eight rebounds in 31 minutes . He 's now averaging a triple - double on the season . J.J. Redick was also a big factor in the win , going 6 - for - 15 from the field to score 17 points , while also adding three rebounds and three assists in 27 minutes . DeAndre Jordan finished with 11 points ( 5 - 7 FG ) , eight rebounds , three blocked shots and three steals in 30 minutes . The only other Clipper to reach double figures in points was Jamal Crawford , who finished with 10 points ( 3 - 6 FG ) in 18 minutes off the bench . The Timberwolves were led by Karl-Anthony Towns , who recorded a double - double with 16 points ( 7 - 13 FG , 2 - 3 2Pt ) and 11 rebounds in just 23 minutes . It was his second straight game with double - digit rebounds and third in the last four games , as he continues to be a force on the boards . Shabazz Muhammad was the only other player to score in double figures for the Timberwolves , finishing second on the team with 14 points ( 4 - 5 FG ) and seven rebounds in 20 minutes . Ricky Rubio struggled shooting the ball , going only 2 - of - 9 ( 2 - 9 FG ) from the floor , but still finished with nine points , three rebounds , one assist and one steal in 25 minutes . Gorgui Dieng had a quiet game by his standards , scoring just three points , but he did grab 10 rebounds and recorded two assists and one block in 22 minutes . Next up , the Timberwolves will look to get out of this rut on Wednesday in a road matchup against the New Orleans Pelicans . Meanwhile , the Clippers will head home Wednesday to take on the Portland Trail Blazers .

The Thunder got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Wizards 32 - 19 in the first quarter . The Wizards were able to make a run in the second quarter though , cutting the deficit to just two points , but the Thunder responded with a 32 - point third quarter to put the game out of reach . Russell Westbrook did everything he could to keep the Thunder in this game , as he finished with 35 points , 14 rebounds and 11 assists on 12 - of - 35 shooting from the field , to go along with five assists and two steals , in 41 minutes . Up next , the Thunder will stay home to take on the Nuggets on Friday , while the Wizards will head home to go up against the Kings on Friday .

The Portland Trail Blazers ( 7 - 10 ) defeated the Los Angeles Lakers ( 2 - 13 ) 108 - 96 on Wednesday at the Moda Center in Portland . The Trail Blazers got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Lakers 34 - 21 in the first quarter . They were able to hold the lead for the majority of the game , but the Lakers battled back in the fourth quarter to make it a one - point game with just over three minutes to go . However , Damian Lillard and C.J . McCollum hit some clutch free throws late in the game to seal the win for the Trail Blazers . Lillard finished with 29 points ( 9 - 19 FG , 5 - 11 3Pt , 6 - 7 FT ) , seven assists and four rebounds in 36 minutes . He 's now averaging 27 points and 8 assists on the season . McCllum on the other hand shot 12 - 20 from the field and 4 - 7 from the three - point line to score 28 points , while also adding two rebounds and one steal in 34 minutes . It was a season - high in points for him , as he 's combined for 54 points and 12 rebounds over his last two games . The only other Blazer to reach double figures in points was Allen Crabbe , who finished with nine points ( 3 - 7 FG , 1 - 2 3Pd , 4 - 4 FT ) and two rebounds in 17 minutes off the bench . The Lakers were led by Kobe Bryant and Jordan Clarkson , who each scored 21 points . Bryant added two rebounds , two assists and two steals to his team - high scoring total , while Clarkson added four assists , three rebounds and four steals . Julius Randle finished with 16 points ( 8 - 13 FG ) , six rebounds , four assists and three steals in 30 minutes , while D'Angelo Russell added 16 points , four rebounds and five assists in 38 minutes . Both teams play on Friday , as the Lakers will travel to Sacramento to take on the Kings , while the Blazers will head to San Antonio to go up against the Spurs .
The Houston Rockets ( 31 - 9 ) defeated the Charlotte Hornets ( 20 - 19 ) 121 - 114 on Wednesday at the Toyota Center in Houston . The Rockets got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Hornets 32 - 26 in the first quarter . The Hornets were able to make a run in the second quarter though , cutting the Rockets ' lead to just two points , but the Rockets were n't done , as they went on to out - score the Hornets 35 - 29 in the third quarter to seal the win . James Harden led the way for the Rockets , as he finished with a game - high of 40 points ( 11 - 24 FG , 7 - 14 3Pt , 11 - 14 FT ) , to go along with 15 rebounds and 10 assists , in 38 minutes . It was his second 40 - point game in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 31 points , 9 rebounds and 8 assists . He 's now averaging 31 - points , 8 rebounds and 9 assists on the season . Trevor Ariza was the other starter to reach double figures in points , as well , finishing with 16 points ( 5 - 10 FG , 3 - 6 3PT ) , five rebounds and three assists , while Montrezl Harrell chipped in 14 points and three blocks , in 29 minutes . Ryan Anderson finished with 13 points and two steals , in 36 minutes . Patrick Beverley struggled shooting the ball , going 2 - for - 10 from the field , but still finished with eight points and eight rebounds , in 32 minutes . Kemba Walker was the high - point man for the Hornets , with 25 points ( 9 - 21 FG , 5 - 12 3PT , 2 - 3 FT ) . He also added 10 assists and six rebounds , while Nicolas Batum came off the bench and finished with 22 points ( 8 - 14 FG , 4 - 9 3 Pt ) , three rebounds and one assist , in 27 minutes . Batum has been the Hornets best player over his last three games , averaging 16 points and 5 rebounds over that span . Marvin Williams was the only other starter in double figures , with 16 , in 25 minutes . Jeremy Lamb and Jeremy Lamb finished with 11 and 11 points , respectively , while Marco Belinelli added 15 points , six rebounds and six assists , off of the bench . With the win , the Rockets have now won four of their last five , while the Hornets have lost three straight . Next , the Hornets will head to San Antonio to take on the Spurs on Friday , in what will be the second half of a back - to - back set . Houston will look to extend their winning streak to five , as the Rockets host the New Orleans Pelicans on Friday .
The Brooklyn Nets ( 3 - 4 ) defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves ( 1 - 5 ) 119 - 110 on Wednesday at the Barclays Center in Brooklyn . The Timberwolves came out strong in this one , out - scoring the Nets 33 - 33 in the first quarter , but the Nets responded with a 33 - 19 second quarter of their own and never looked back after that . The Nets shot 55 percent from the field and 36 percent from beyond the arc , while the Timberwolves shot 42 percent of their shots from the floor and 43 percent from three - point range . Brook Lopez led the Nets in scoring with 26 points ( 10 - 16 FG , 3 - 7 3Pt ) , to go along with three rebounds and three blocked shots , in 28 minutes . Karl-Anthony Towns finished with 21 points ( 8 - 15 FG , 1 - 4 3PT , 4 - 4 FT ) , while Zach LaVine added 17 points and two rebounds . The only other player to score in double digits for the T-Wolves was Shabazz Muhammad , who finished with 12 points ( 4 - 7 FG , 2 - 3 3PT ) , along with seven assists , five rebounds and five steals , in 32 minutes off the bench . Up next , the Nets will stay home to take on the 76ers on Friday , in what will be the second game of a back - to - back for both teams . Minnesota will look to get back on track Friday , as they play host to the Bulls .
The Golden State Warriors ( 56 - 14 ) defeated the Oklahoma City Thunder ( 40 - 30 ) 111 - 95 on Wednesday at Chesapeake Energy Arena in Oklahoma City . The Warriors were the superior shooters in this game , going 48 percent from the field and 46 percent from beyond the arc , while the Thunder finished at 43 percent shooting from the floor and just 19 percent from deep . The Thunder were also out - rebounded 46 - 40 , giving the Warriors an advantage in the rebounding column , but they were out - scored 29 - 19 in the fourth quarter , giving them just enough of an advantage to pull out the win . The Splash Brothers , Klay Thompson and Stephen Curry led the way for the Warriors . Thompson finished with 34 points ( 12 - 21 FG , 7 - 15 3Pt , 3 - 3 FT ) , six rebounds and two steals , while Curry went 8 - for - 17 from the three - point line to score 23 points , to go along with six assists and four rebounds . It was a season - high in points for Curry , while it was his second straight game with at least 23 points and six assists . Draymond Green struggled shooting the ball , but still finished with two points ( 0 - 4 FG ) , 10 rebounds , six assists , one steal and one block , in 26 minutes . The only other Warrior to reach double figures in points was Ian Clark , who finished with 10 points ( 5 - 7 FG ) and five rebounds in 13 minutes off the bench . For the Thunder , Victor Oladipo was the high - point man , with 17 points ( 6 - 14 FG , 2 - 3 3PT ) , while Russell Westbrook finished with 15 points ( 4 - 16 FG , 1 - 6 3PT , 6 - 7 FT ) and eight rebounds , along with seven assists , two steals and one blocked shot , in 27 minutes . Enes Kanter was the only other Thunder player in double figures , as he finished with a double - double of 15 points and 10 rebounds in 25 minutes . Up next , the Warriors will head to San Antonio to take on the Spurs on Friday , where they 'll look to extend their winning streak to 10 games . Oklahoma City , on the other hand , will look to end their losing streak at home against the New Orleans Pelicans on Friday .
The Indiana Pacers ( 7 - 7 ) defeated the Oklahoma City Thunder ( 8 - 6 ) 115 - 111 on Wednesday at Chesapeake Energy Arena in Oklahoma City . The Pacers were the superior shooters in this game , going 45 percent from the field and 50 percent from three - point range , while the Thunder finished at 44 percent from both the floor and 28 percent from beyond the arc . Despite being out - rebounded 49 - 49 , the Pacers were able to force the Thunder into 20 turnovers , while committing only eight of their own , which may have been the difference in the game . The Thunder were led by Russell Westbrook , who recorded his third triple - double of the season , finishing with 31 points ( 13 - 34 FG , 2 - 8 3Pt , 3 - 5 FT ) , 15 assists and 11 rebounds in 40 minutes . He 's now averaging 31 points , 11 rebounds and 10 assists on the year . The only other player to score in double digits for the Thunder was Victor Oladipo , who finished with 14 points ( 6 - 14 FG ) , five rebounds and six assists in 38 minutes . It was his second double - double in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 16 points and 12 rebounds . Coming off the bench , Enes Kanter had 16 points ( 5 - 9 FG , 1 - 2 3PT , 5 - 6 FT ) and four rebounds in 25 minutes . Coming out of the All-Star break , the Thunder have now lost three straight games , as they continue to struggle to find their groove . Jeff Teague led the way for the Pacers , as he went 9 - for - 16 from the floor to score a game - high of 30 points , while also adding nine assists and six steals . He was able to get to the free throw line nine times , converting on a perfect 9 - of - 9 . Thaddeus Young recorded his second straight 20 - plus point game , posting 20 points ( 9 - 18 FG ) and a team - high 11 rebounds . He also had two steals and two blocked shots . Glenn Robinson was the other Pacer to reach double figures in points , posting 16 points of his own , to go along with 11 rebounds , in 45 minutes . Monta Ellis chipped in 12 points , seven assists , four rebounds and two steals , while Myles Turner added 15 points , nine rebounds and a pair of blocks . With Kevin Seraphin sitting out with an ankle injury , Paul George moved back to a bench role . He finished with 10 points and two assists in 13 minutes . With the win the Pacers have now won three of their last four games . They 'll look to continue their winning ways on the road against the New Orleans Pelicans on Friday , in what will be the second half of a back - to - back set .

Meanwhile , the Jazz will head home to face the Charlotte Hornets on Saturday .

The San Antonio Spurs ( 13 - 3 ) defeated the Boston Celtics ( 9 - 7 ) 109 - 103 on Wednesday at the TD Garden in Boston . The Spurs were able to hold off the Celtics in this one , as they out - scored the Celtics 34 - 29 in the fourth quarter to secure the win . The Celtics came into this game as a double - digit favorite , but it took a late run by the Spurs to get it done . In fact , San Antonio outscored Boston 34 - 26 in the final 12 minutes to pull out the victory . The key for the Spurs was their ability to shoot 47 percent from the field and 46 percent from three - point range , while holding the Celtics to 46 percent shooting from the floor and 35 percent from long range . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 40 points and 20 assists over those two games . He went 9 - for - 21 for 24 points and 8 assists , while also adding a rebound and a steal . He finished with 18 points , three rebounds and five assists in 28 minutes . Al Horford recorded 12 points , 10 rebounds , four assists and three blocks in 35 minutes . Avery Bradley had a nice all - around game with 19 points , eight rebounds and three assists in 38 minutes . Marcus Smart was the most valuable bench player for Boston . He recorded nine points , ten assists and four rebounds in 27 minutes . He also recorded a steal and a blocked shot . With the win , the Spurs have now won four of their last five games . They 'll look to keep it rolling on the road against the Charlotte Hornets on Friday , while the Celtics will look to get back on track against the Philadelphia 76ers on Friday .

The Atlanta Hawks defeated the visiting Washington Wizards , 106 - 90 , in Game 1 of the Eastern Conference first - round playoffs Sunday at Philips Arena to take a 1 - 1 lead in the series . The Hawks were expected to win this game easily and they left no doubt who the better team was , as they led by double - digits for the majority of the game . In fact , Atlanta held a double - digit lead for the entirety of the second half , as the Wizards never led by more than seven points . Rebounding was a huge factor for the Hawks , winning that battle , 44 - 40 . Atlanta also dominated the assist - to - turnover ratio , recording 30 assists to just 10 turnovers , while Washington committed 16 turnovers to just 21 assists . Ramon Sessions led the Wizards in scoring , as he tallied 21 points , three rebounds and four assists . Bradley Beal finished with 20 points , five rebounds , seven assists and three steals . Nene Hilario left the game early in the fourth quarter with an ankle injury and did not return . The Wizards will look to bounce back in Game 2 on Tuesday in Washington . Atlanta was led by DeMarre Carroll and Paul Millsap , who each scored 22 points each . Millsap added 11 rebounds , five assists and four steals , while Carroll had six rebounds , four assists and one steal . Al Horford finished with 18 points , four rebounds , six assists , three steals and two blocks . Kyle Korver finished with 12 points , six rebounds and three blocks . Jeff Teague finished with nine points , seven rebounds and eight assists . Atlanta 's next game is on Wednesday in Washington against the second - place Wizards .

Meanwhile , the Warriors will stay home and go up against the Los Angeles Clippers on Friday .
The Indiana Pacers ( 1 - 3 ) defeated the Detroit Pistons ( 3 - 1 ) 94 - 82 on Monday at the Palace of Auburn Hills . The Pacers got off to a quick start in this game , out - scoring the Pistons 35 - 30 in the first quarter . The Pistons were able to make a run in the second quarter , but the Pacers were able stay in control and eventually pull away in the third quarter . Indiana shot 43 percent from the field and 30 percent from three - point range , while holding the Pistons to 38 percent shooting from the floor and 23 percent from long range . Up next , the Pacers will head home Wednesday to take on the Nets , while the Pistons will stay home Wednesday and go up against the Heat .

The Nets came out strong in this one , out - scoring the Thunder 21 - 18 in the first quarter and out - rebounding them 38 - 36 over the next two quarters . They were able to hold the lead for the majority of the game , but the Thunder battled back in the fourth quarter to make it a one - possession game with just over a minute to go . However , Brooklyn was able to out - rebound Oklahoma City 23 - 18 to seal the win and end the Thunder 's three - game losing streak . The New Orleans Pelicans defeated the Milwaukee Bucks , 116 - 99 , at Smoothie King Center on Wednesday . The Bucks ( 19 - 27 ) have now dropped two straight and three of their last four games , as they continue to slide down the Eastern Conference standings . The Pelicans ( 16 - 26 ) , on the other hand , continue to climb up the standings , and Wednesday 's win over the Bucks was the result of yet another strong performance from superstar Anthony Davis . Davis led the team with 22 points , seven rebounds , five assists , four blocks , and four steals in 36 minutes of action . The All-Star forward shot 8 - of - 17 from the field and 6 - for - 11 from three - point range en route to a team - high 22 points . Davis has now scored at least 20 points in each of his last three games , a stretch where he 's averaging 24 points , 10 rebounds , and 5 assists per game . Davis is now averaging 22 points and 12 rebounds on the year . The team as a whole shot a solid 46 percent from the floor and 55 percent from beyond the arc . Milwaukee , meanwhile , saw strong play from its own young big man in Greg Monroe , who scored 22 points ( 8 - 13 FG , 6 - 6 FT ) to go along with 11 rebounds and two assists in 30 minutes . Khris Middleton added 22 points of his own , while Michael Carter-Williams chipped in 19 points and five assists . Jabari Parker and Giannis Antetokounmpo each added 10 points , but the rest of the Bucks ' starting five combined for just 21 points on the night . Milwaukee will look to bounce back on Friday in a road matchup against the Oklahoma City Thunder . New Orleans , which has now won five of its last six games , was led by Ryan Anderson 's 23 points off the bench , which he supplemented with six rebounds , two assists , and a steal in 34 minutes . Jrue Holiday added 14 points , four rebounds , four assists , three steals , and three steals in 24 minutes , while Tyreke Evans and Norris Cole added 10 and 11 points , respectively , to round out the starting five 's productive night . The Pelican will return home to host the Minnesota Timberwolves on Friday .

The Toronto Raptors ( 10 ) defeated the Indiana Pacers ( 0 - 1 ) 106 - 99 in Game 1 of the Eastern Conference first - round playoffs Sunday at Air Canada Centre to take a 1 - 1 lead in the series . The Raptors came out strong in the first quarter , out - scoring the Pacers 20 - 15 , but the Pacers battled back to make it a two - point game by halftime . Toronto was able to out - score Indiana 34 - 23 in the third quarter , and the Raptors were able to hold the lead for the rest of the way . DeMar DeRozan led the way for Toronto with 25 points ( 7 - 17 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt , 10 - 16 FT ) , six assists , five rebounds and two steals in 36 minutes . Jonas Valanciunas added a double - double with 21 points ( 8 - 11 FG , 5 - 6 FT ) and 15 rebounds in 32 minutes . Kyle Lowry chipped in 23 points and six assists in 39 minutes , while DeMarre Carroll added 14 points ( 5 - 14 FG ) , eight rebounds and four assists in 41 minutes . The Pacers were led by C.J . Miles , who finished with 18 points ( 6 - 15 FG , 4 - 8 3PT ) , three steals and one assist in 35 minutes . George Hill finished with 19 points , three rebounds , two assists , two steals and two blocks in 38 minutes . Paul George finished with 17 points , 12 rebounds , eight assists and three steals in 37 minutes . Rodney Stuckey was the only other Pacer in double figures with 16 points in 24 minutes off the bench . Indiana shot just 37 percent from the field and 39 percent from beyond the arc . Game 2 will take place in Toronto on Tuesday .
The Atlanta Hawks ( 24 - 17 ) defeated the New York Knicks ( 18 - 24 ) 108 - 107 on Wednesday at Madison Square Garden in New York . The Hawks were the superior shooters in this game , going 46 percent from the field and 38 percent from three - point range , while the Knicks finished at 49 percent from both the floor and 31 percent from beyond the arc . Dennis Schroeder led the Hawks with 28 points ( 13 - 16 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt ) and three assists in 34 minutes , while Paul Millsap added 17 points ( 5 - 18 FG , 6 - 10 FT ) , seven rebounds , six assists , three steals and three blocks in 39 minutes . Tim Hardaway , Jr. finished with 20 points ( 9 - 15 FG , 2 - 7 3PT ) , three rebounds and four assists in 35 minutes . Carmelo Anthony led the way for the Knicks , going 10 - for - 16 from the floor to score a game - high of 30 points , while also adding seven rebounds and two assists . Derrick Rose finished with 18 points , nine assists , four rebounds , one steal and one block in 32 minutes . Joakim Noah recorded a double - double with seven points ( 2 - 3 FG , 3 - 5 FT ) and 17 rebounds , while Mindaugas Kuzminskas chipped in 14 points and five rebounds in 38 minutes . The Knicks gave up 18 turnovers in the game , which may have been the difference in this one . Up next , the Hawks will head home Friday to take on the 76ers , while New York will stay home Friday and go up against the Pacers .
The Memphis Grizzlies ( 24 - 19 ) defeated the New Orleans Pelicans ( 13 - 27 ) 101 - 99 on Wednesday at Fed Ex Forum Arena in Memphis . The Grizzlies got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Pelicans 24 - 24 in the first quarter . The Pelicans were able to make a run in the second quarter , however , as they out - scored the Grizzlies 29 - 23 , but the Grizzlies were still able to hold them off in the end . Memphis shot 47 percent from the field and 42 percent from three - point range , while the Pelicans shot 49 percent of their shots from the floor and 32 percent from long range . Despite being out - rebounded 40 - 34 by the Grizzlies , they still managed to force the Pelicans into 15 turnovers , giving them just enough of an advantage to pull out the win . Marc Gasol was the high - point man for Memphis , as he finished with 16 points ( 6 - 13 FG , 4 - 8 FT ) , 10 rebounds , six assists , two steals and one block , in 39 minutes . Mike Conley finished with 15 points and 10 assists , while Courtney Lee chipped in 16 points of his own , in 33 minutes . Zach Randolph was the only other player to score in double figures for the Grizz , as his eight points ( 3 - 9 FG , 2 - 2 FT ) and eight rebounds did n't do much to help out the starters . Mike Daniels came off the bench to score 16 points and grab six rebounds , in 27 minutes . Anthony Davis led the way for the Pelicans , with 21 points , eight rebounds , three steals and three blocked shots , in 37 minutes . Jrue Holiday was the most effective player for New Orleans , scoring a team - high of 23 points , to go along with nine assists and two rebounds . The only other Pelican to reach double figures in points was Norris Cole , who finished with 10 points , four rebounds and four assists , in 30 minutes . Tyreke Evans added 14 points and four rebounds , while E'Twaun Moore scored 14 points , while Eric Gordon and Omer Asik added 10 points each . Up next , the Grizzlies will stay at home to take on the Spurs on Friday , while New Orleans will head home to play the Thunder on Friday .
The Oklahoma City Thunder ( 38 - 13 ) defeated the Orlando Magic ( 21 - 27 ) 117 - 114 on Wednesday at Chesapeake Energy Arena in Oklahoma City . The Thunder got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Magic 32 - 32 right away in the first quarter . They went on to go on to out - score the Magic 64 - 48 in the second quarter , giving them the cushion they needed to coast to the victory . The Magic were led by Victor Oladipo , who went 13 - for - 20 from the field and 3 - for- 6 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 37 points , while also adding seven rebounds and four assists . He 's now averaging 22 points and 7 rebounds on the season . Nikola Vucevic was the only other Magic player to reach double figures in points , as he finished with 16 points ( 8 - 16 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt , 7 - 8 FT ) , three rebounds , three assists and two blocked shots , in 36 minutes . Tobias Harris chipped in 15 points ( 7 - 14 FG , 1 - 4 3PT ) and seven rebounds , in 34 minutes . The only other player to score in double digits for the Magic was D.J . Augustin , who finished with 13 points ( 6 - 7 FG ) and three assists , in 18 minutes off the bench . For the Thunder , Kevin Durant led the way with 37 points ( 12 - 25 FG , 6 - 12 3PT , 7 7 FT ) and five assists , along with five rebounds , two steals and three blocks , in 37 minutes . Russell Westbrook finished with 24 points ( 10 - 18 FG ) , 19 rebounds and 14 assists , to go along with two steals , in 38 minutes . It was his second triple - double in a row , after scoring 24 points and grabbing 19 rebounds in Sunday 's game against the Clippers . Dion Waiters started in place of the injured Victor Enes Kanter ( ankle ) and finished with eight points and two assists , two rebounds , one steal and one three - pointer , in 33 minutes . With the win , the Thunder are now 3 - 1 in their last four games , as they continue to climb up the Western Conference standings . They 'll look to keep it rolling on Friday , when they play the Minnesota Timberwolves on the road .
The Washington Wizards defeated the Los Angeles Clippers , 104 - 96 , at Verizon Center on Wednesday . The Clippers ( 16 - 6 ) came in to Wednesday 's contest looking to bounce back from a tough loss to the Golden State Warriors on Monday night , but were unable to do so against the Wizards ( 16 6 ) . Los Angeles was led by Chris Paul 's 19 points , which he supplemented with seven rebounds , six assists and a game - high six turnovers . Blake Griffin followed with 14 points , three assists , two rebounds , a steal and a block . Matt Barnes was next with 11 points , six rebounds , an assist and a steal . J.J. Redick and DeAndre Jordan supplied matching 10 - point efforts , with the former adding four rebounds , two assists and one steal , and the latter registering eight rebounds , one assist , one steal and one block . Jamal Crawford paced the second unit with 12 points and three rebounds . Bradley Beal paced the Wizards with 29 points , four assists , three rebounds and three steals . Marcin Gortat was right behind him with 18 points , two boards and two blocks . Kris Humphries and Paul Pierce were next with matching 11 - point tallies , while John Wall registered 10 points , 11 assists , a rebound , two blocks and a pair of steals . Kelly Oubre , Jr. led the bench with nine points , five rebounds and two assists , while Nene Hilario was productive in a reserve role as well with eight points and two rebounds . The Wizards remain in second place in the Eastern Conference 's Southeast Division , and are currently slotted in the seventh seed in the conference as well . They 're home again on Friday night to face off with the New Orleans Pelicans . Meanwhile , the Clippers remain home and await the Portland Trail Blazers on Friday evening .
The Utah Jazz ( 9 - 9 ) defeated the Indiana Pacers ( 12 - 7 ) 122 - 119 on Wednesday at EnergySolutions Arena in Salt Lake City . The Jazz got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Pacers 27 - 19 in the first quarter . They were able to hold on to the lead for the rest of the way , as they went on to out - score the Pacers 26 - 26 in the second quarter and 32 - 26 overall in the win . The Pacers were the superior shooters in this game , going 43 percent from the field , while the Jazz finished at 47 percent . Derrick Favors was the player of the game , as he led all scorers with 35 points ( 14 - 24 FG , 7 - 9 FT ) , to go along with 13 rebounds , one assist , one steal and one block , in 44 minutes . Gordon Hayward was n't far behind , finishing with 22 points ( 5 - 14 FG , 3 - 8 3Pt ) , five rebounds , five assists and two steals , in 43 minutes . Rudy Gobert came up big off the bench , with 19 points ( 8 - 17 FG ) , seven assists and three rebounds , in 34 minutes , while Trey Burke chipped in 10 points ( 2 - 6 FG , 6 - 8 FT ) and 14 rebounds in 23 minutes . Paul George led the way for the Pacers , with 48 points ( 15 - 27 FG , 8 - 11 3PT ) , eight rebounds , three assists , three steals and one blocked shot , in 42 minutes . Rodney Stuckey was the only other Pacer in double figures , with 23 points on 8 - 14 shooting , including 1 - 3 from long range , in 32 minutes off of the bench . C.J . Miles struggled shooting , going 2 - 10 from the floor , on his way to 12 points , in 35 minutes . Next up , the Pacers will head to Denver to take on the Nuggets on Friday , in what will be the second half of a back - to - back for both teams . Utah , on the other hand , will look to continue their winning ways against the Los Angeles Clippers on Friday .
The Indiana Pacers ( 16 - 9 ) defeated the Brooklyn Nets ( 7 - 19 ) 104 - 97 on Wednesday at Bankers Life Fieldhouse in Indianapolis . The Pacers came out strong in this one , out - scoring the Nets 23 - 18 in the first quarter and out - rebounding them 52 - 42 . They were able to hold the lead for the majority of the game , but the Nets battled back in the fourth quarter to make it a one - possession game with just over a minute to go . However , Paul George was able to hit a three - pointer at the buzzer to seal the win for the Pacers . The Nets were led by Jarrett Jack , who scored a game - high of 26 points ( 8 - 15 FG , 3 - 6 3Pt , 7 - 7 FT ) , to go along with nine rebounds and six assists , in 39 minutes . Brook Lopez was the only other starter to score in double figures , as he finished with 18 points , five rebounds and one block , in 33 minutes . Thaddeus Young recorded a double - double , with 14 points ( 5 - 14 FG , 4 - 4 FT ) and 14 rebounds , while Joe Johnson chipped in 11 points ( 4 - 11 FG ) , three rebounds , one assist and three steals , in 32 minutes . The only other player to score double digits for the Nets was Quincy Acy , who finished with 12 points , in 22 minutes off the bench . Paul George led the Pacers in scoring , with 23 points , along with 10 rebounds , three assists and one steal , in 36 minutes . C.J . Miles added 15 points , while Rodney Stuckey added 14 points and 11 rebounds , in 23 minutes . Ian Mahinmi finished with 10 points and nine rebounds in 25 minutes . George Hill struggled shooting the ball , going 3 - for - 11 from the field , but still finished with nine points , four rebounds and three assists . Monta Ellis struggled shooting , going 1 - of - 8 from the floor , on his way to only two points , but added five assists , two steals and one rebound , in 34 minutes . Next up , the Pacers will head to Boston to take on the Celtics on Friday , in what will be the second half of a back - to - back for both teams . Meanwhile , the Nets will look to get back on track , as they play host to the Miami Heat on Friday .
The Charlotte Hornets ( 25 - 26 ) defeated the Washington Wizards ( 22 - 27 ) 108 - 104 on Wednesday at Time Warner Cable Arena in Charlotte . The Hornets came into this game as a double - digit favorite and they left no doubt who the better team was in this one . In fact , the Wizards led for the majority of the game , but the Hornets outscored the Wizards 30 - 17 in the fourth quarter to pull out the win . The Wizards shot 44 percent from the field and 36 percent from three - point range , while the Hornets shot 47 percent from beyond the arc . The assist - to - turnover ratio was decisive as well , with the Hornets recording nine more assists than the Wizards , while committing five less turnovers . The Hawks were led by Nicolas Batum , who tallied 26 points ( 9 - 20 FG , 3 - 9 3Pt , 5 - 6 FT ) , 11 rebounds and nine assists in 44 minutes . Kemba Walker was n't far behind , as he finished with 23 points ( 8 - 19 FG , 4 - 10 3PT ) , five rebounds and five assists in 35 minutes . Marvin Williams finished with 13 points and 10 rebounds in 29 minutes , while Cody Zeller chipped in eight points ( 3 - 6 FG , 2 - 2 FT ) and nine rebounds in 30 minutes . John Wall led the way for the Wizards with a team - high of 23 points , to go along with six rebounds and 10 assists in 40 minutes . Otto Porter was second on the team , finishing with 20 points ( 7 - 14 FG ) and eight rebounds in 39 minutes . Marcin Gortat recorded an 11 - point , 13 - rebound double - double , while Jared Dudley added 10 points and two steals in 26 minutes . The only other Wizards player to reach double figures was Nene Hilario , who scored 22 points off the bench in 20 minutes . Up next , the Hornets will stay home to take on the 76ers on Friday , while Washington will head home to go up against the Heat on Friday .
The Sacramento Kings ( 22 - 31 ) defeated the Philadelphia 76ers ( 8 - 45 ) 114 - 110 on Wednesday at the Wells Fargo Center in Philadelphia . The Kings came into this game as a double - digit favorite and they did n't disappoint . In fact , they led for the majority of the game , as they led by as many as 26 points in the second half . The assist - to - turnover ratio was the decisive statistic , with the Kings recording 29 assists to just 13 turnovers , while the Sixers committed 19 turnovers to just 29 assists . DeMarcus Cousins was the star of the show , as he tallied 28 points , 12 rebounds and five assists on 8 - of - 18 shooting from the field . Rajon Rondo finished with 14 points , 15 assists and eight rebounds of his own . Rudy Gay was n't far behind , finishing with 22 points , four rebounds , three blocks and one assist . The only other player to score in double digits for the Kings was Anthony Tolliver , who finished with 25 points on 9 - for - 12 shooting off the bench . Up next , the Kings will head home to take on the New Orleans Pelicans on Friday , as the Sixers will stay home to play the Toronto Raptors on Friday .
The Dallas Mavericks ( 47 - 31 ) defeated the Phoenix Suns ( 39 - 40 ) 107 - 104 on Wednesday at the American Airlines Center in Dallas . The Mavericks got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Suns 27 - 30 right away in the first quarter . They went on to out - score the Suns 26 - 19 in the second quarter , giving them just enough of an advantage to hold on for the win . The Suns were led by the duo of Markieff Morris and Isaiah Thomas . Morris finished with 19 points ( 7 - 16 FG , 0 - 3 3Pt , 5 - 5 FT ) , six rebounds and seven assists . He 's now averaging 19 points and 7 rebounds on the season . Thomas on the other hand went off for a career - high of 30 points ( 10 - 19 FG ) , as he went 5 - 10 from three - point range . It was his second 30 - point game in a row , a stretch where he 's combined for 54 points and 12 rebounds . Marcus Morris recorded a double - double with 12 points ( 5 - 9 FG , 1 - 2 3PT ) and 10 rebounds , giving him his third double - digit scoring game in the last four games . The only other player to score in double digits for the Suns was Eric Bledsoe , who finished with 14 points . He also had three assists and one rebound . The other three starters scored in double figures for Phoenix as well , but it was n't enough to keep up with the Mavericks . Dirk Nowitzki led the way for the Mavericks , scoring 19 points on 7 - 15 shooting from the field ( 1 - 4 3PT , 4 - 4 FT ) and grabbing four rebounds in 31 minutes . Monta Ellis was the other starter to reach double figures in points with 20 , while adding two assists and two steals in 35 minutes . Tyson Chandler had a big game as well . He recorded 12 points and 23 rebounds in 34 minutes . He continues to be a force on the boards and has now recorded at least nine rebounds in four of his last five games . Rajon Rondo chipped in 12 points , seven assists and three rebounds of his own , while the only other Maverick to score double digits was Devin Harris , who added 12 points in 18 minutes off the bench . With the win , the Mavericks are now tied for second place in the Western Conference 's Southwest Division . They 're just a half - game behind the eighth - seeded Houston Rockets , so they 'll head to San Antonio to take on the Spurs on Friday night in their final game of the regular season . Meanwhile , the Suns are still trying to keep their playoff hopes alive , as they 're still in the hunt for the eighth seed in the West .
The Memphis Grizzlies ( 31 - 22 ) defeated the Brooklyn Nets ( 14 - 40 ) 109 - 90 on Wednesday at the Barclays Center in Brooklyn . The Grizzlies came out firing on all cylinders in this one , out - scoring the Nets 39 - 18 in the first quarter alone . They shot 52 percent from the field and 45 percent from three - point range , while the Nets shot 47 percent from beyond the arc and 50 percent from long range . They also out - rebounded the Grizzlies 35 - 35 , giving them just enough of an advantage to pull out the win . Mike Conley led the way for the Grizzlies , scoring 20 points ( 7 - 13 FG , 3 - 4 3Pt ) , to go along with five assists and four rebounds , in 29 minutes . Zach Randolph finished with 15 points ( 6 - 12 FG ) , six assists , three rebounds , three steals and one block , in 27 minutes . JaMychal Green chipped in 13 points ( 5 - 6 FG , 1 - 1 3PT , 2 - 2 FT ) , four rebounds and one assist , in 21 minutes . The only other player to score in double digits for Memphis was Vince Carter , who finished with 18 points , in 28 minutes off the bench . The Nets were led by Brook Lopez , who went 8 - 14 from the floor and 4 - 4 from the free throw line to score 20 points , while also adding four rebounds . Wayne Ellington was the other starter to reach double figures in points , as he went 6 - 8 ( 4 - 5 3PT ) , while adding 18 points . Thaddeus Young finished with 10 points and nine rebounds , along with two assists and one steal , in 25 minutes . Sean Kilpatrick was the only other starter in double figures , with 11 points , two rebounds and two steals , in only 16 minutes . Up next , the Grizzlies will head home to take on the 76ers on Friday , in what will be the second half of a back - to - back for both teams . Brooklyn will look to get back on track Friday , when they host the Toronto Raptors .
The Washington Wizards ( 11 - 5 ) defeated the Miami Heat ( 9 - 8 ) 107 - 86 on Wednesday at the Verizon Center in Washington D.C . The Wizards were the superior shooters in this game , going 54 percent from the field and 53 percent from beyond the arc , while the Heat finished at 46 percent shooting from the floor and only 9 - for - 30 from three - point range . The assist - to - turnover ratio was the difference in the game , with the Wizards recording 29 assists to 12 turnovers and the Heat committing 12 turnovers to just 12 assists . The Heat were led by Chris Bosh and Dwyane Wade , who each finished with 21 points and 20 points , respectively . Wade added three rebounds and two steals , while Bosh added eight rebounds , three assists and two blocks . Hassan Whiteside was the only other player to score in double figures for the Heat , as he finished with 11 points and two rebounds off the bench . Luol Deng started in place of Goran Dragic and finished with nine points and three rebounds in 24 minutes . John Wall led the way for the Wizards , finishing with 18 points ( 6 - 10 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt , 4 - 5 FT ) , 13 assists , five rebounds , two steals and one blocked shot , in 32 minutes . Bradley Beal struggled shooting the ball , going 3 - of - 7 on his way to eight points , while Marcin Gortat recorded a double - double , with 15 points and 10 rebounds , in 27 minutes . Kelly Oubre , Jr. led the team in scoring , with 23 points ( 8 - 14 FG , 3 - 5 3PT ) and three assists , in 33 minutes . Up next , the Wizards will look to extend their winning streak to four games on Friday , when they host the New Orleans Pelicans . Miami , on the other hand , will head to New York to take on the Knicks on Friday .
The Memphis Grizzlies ( 21 - 14 ) defeated the Oklahoma City Thunder ( 20 - 13 ) 114 - 80 on Wednesday at Fed Ex Forum Arena in Memphis . The Grizzlies were the superior shooters in this game , going 52 percent from the field and 59 percent from beyond the arc , while the Thunder finished at just 34 percent shooting from the floor and a meager 18 percent from three - point range . They also out - rebounded the Thunder 39 - 39 , giving them just enough of an advantage to pull out the victory . Marc Gasol led the way for the Grizzlies , finishing with 25 points ( 9 - 20 FG , 0 - 3 3Pt , 7 - 9 FT ) , eight rebounds and five blocked shots in 33 minutes . He 's now averaging 22 points and 8 rebounds on the season . Zach Randolph was the other big contributor off the bench , as he finished with 21 points ( 10 - 17 FG , 1 - 3 FT ) and eight rebounds in 25 minutes . It was his second double - double in a row , a stretch where he 's combined for 40 points and 12 rebounds . JaMychal Green also had a solid game , scoring 17 points ( 6 - 7 FG , 2 - 2 3PT , 3 - 5 FT ) to go along with four rebounds , two assists , one steal and one blocked shot in 34 minutes . For the Thunder , Russell Westbrook did n't have his best shooting performance . He went 6 - for - 19 from the three point line , but still finished with a team - high of 21 points , while also adding five rebounds and two steals in 23 minutes of action . He did have six turnovers though , so it was n't all good for the All-Star point guard . Enes Kanter was the only other Thunder player to reach double figures in points . He finished with 19 points ( 7 - 11 FG ) and five rebounds in 24 minutes . The only other player to score in double figures for the Thunder was Steven Adams , who finished with six points ( 1 - 9 FG , 4 - 8 FT ) but grabbed 14 rebounds and recorded two blocks in 27 minutes . With Kevin Durant sitting out with a hamstring injury , the Thunder 's bench really struggled to get anything going , as no one scored more than 10 points . Up next , the Grizzlies will stay home to take on the San Antonio Spurs on Friday , while Oklahoma City will head home to go up against the New Orleans Pelicans on Friday .
The Indiana Pacers ( 39 - 34 ) defeated the Houston Rockets ( 36 - 38 ) 104 - 101 on Wednesday at Bankers Life Fieldhouse in Indianapolis . The Pacers came into this game as a double - digit favorite and they did n't disappoint . In fact , they led for the majority of the game , as they held the lead for the final 30 - plus minutes . The Rockets were held to just 32 points in the second half , as the Pacers outscored them 23 - 22 in the third quarter to pull away and eventually pull away in the fourth . Despite being out - rebounded 50 - 44 by the Rockets , the Pacers were able to hold them to just 17 points in that 24 - minute stretch , which may have been the difference in the game . James Harden led the Rockets in scoring , as he tallied 34 points ( 11 - 22 FG , 4 - 11 3Pt , 8 - 11 FT ) , eight rebounds and eight assists . He also had five turnovers , so it was n't all good for the MVP candidate . Dwight Howard finished with 11 points ( 5 - 6 FG , 1 - 3 FT ) and 10 rebounds , giving him his first double - double of the season . He 's now averaging 16 points and 10 boards on the year . Trevor Ariza was the only other starter in double figures , as his 14 points and two assists matched a season - high . The only other player to score in double digits for the Rockets was Patrick Beverley , who finished with six points ( 3 - 8 FG ) and three assists in 26 minutes . For the Pacers , Paul George led the way with 25 points and 11 rebounds , while Monta Ellis finished with 23 points ( 10 - 18 FG ) , seven assists , six rebounds and three steals . Ian Mahinmi finished with 19 points , 11 rebounds and four assists , while C.J . Miles chipped in 10 points off the bench . With this win the Pacers are now just a half - game behind the Boston Celtics for the eighth and final playoff spot in the Eastern Conference . Up next , the Rockets will head home Friday to take on the Celtics , while the Pacers will stay home Friday and go up against the New Orleans Pelicans .
The Orlando Magic defeated the Philadelphia 76ers , 112 - 109 , at Amway Center on Wednesday . The Sixers ( 26 - 44 ) checked in to Wednesday 's contest on the wrong end of a four - game losing streak , having now lost three straight and four of their last five . However , they were able to prevail with a hard - fought victory over the Magic thanks in large part to the play of their own young big man . Richaun Holmes led the way for Philadelphia with 24 points , 14 rebounds , five assists , a steal and a block . Robert Covington was right behind him with a 24 - point , 13 - rebound double - double that also included five steals and two blocks . Dario Saric and T.J. McConnell turned in matching 18 - point efforts , with the former adding five rebounds , one assist , one steal and one block , and the latter supplying 10 assists , one rebound and three steals . Nik Stauskas paced the second unit with 20 points , five boards , two assists , two steals , one block and one three - pointer . Robert Hernangomez was productive in a reserve role as well , registering eight points , seven rebounds and one assist . Nikola Vucevic 's 26 points led Orlando , a total he supplemented with 13 rebounds , a pair of assists and two steals . Evan Fournier was next with 19 points , four rebounds , three assists and one steal . Aaron Gordon registered 17 points , three rebounds , four assists and a blocked shot . Terrence Ross and Elfrid Payton posted matching 15 - point tallies , while Jeff Green led the bench with nine points . Payton added 13 rebounds and four assists , while Ross hauled in five boards and dished out two assists . The 76ers remain in last place in the Eastern Conference 's Atlantic Division , and are currently slotted in the seventh seed in the conference as well . They head to Miami to take on the Heat on Friday night , while the Magic remain home and await the Toronto Raptors for a Friday night showdown as well on Friday evening .
The Portland Trail Blazers defeated the host Minnesota Timberwolves , 106 - 101 , in Game 3 of the Western Conference first - round playoffs Sunday at Target Center to take a 2 - 2 series lead . The Timberwolves ( 2 - 1 ) were expected to win this game easily and they did just that , but it took a late run by the Trail Blazers ( 1 - 2 ) to pull out the victory . Portland outscored Minnesota 32 - 21 in the fourth quarter and overtime to pull away . The Trail Blazers were led by Damian Lillard , who scored a game - high 34 points on 14 - of - 25 shooting , to go along with seven assists , two rebounds , two steals and one block , in 38 minutes . C.J . McCollum followed up with 18 points , six rebounds , four assists , one steal , one block and one three - pointer , in 36 minutes , while Al-Farouq Aminu added 17 points and nine rebounds , in 32 minutes . Meyers Leonard played just 24 minutes and finished with four points , seven rebounds and one assist , in 24 minutes . The Blazers shot 46 percent from the field and 30 percent from three - point range , while the Timberwolves shot 43 percent and 23 percent from long range , which was n't enough to keep up with the Blazers . Minnesota was led by Ricky Rubio , who finished with 12 points , nine rebounds and nine assists , while Nemanja Bjelica added 24 points , in 35 minutes off the bench . Karl-Anthony Towns finished with 11 points , five rebounds and four blocks , in 27 minutes . Andrew Wiggins chipped in 16 points , along with six rebounds and three assists , in 23 minutes . Next up , the Timberwolves play the second game of a back - to - back , in Minnesota , on Tuesday , when they host the Los Angeles Lakers . Portland plays their second game in as many nights , in Los Angeles , on Wednesday .

The Kings were the superior shooters in this game , going 51 percent from the field and 29 percent from beyond the arc , while the Suns finished at 47 percent from both the floor and 25 percent from deep . The Suns were led by Devin Booker , who finished with 18 points ( 8 - 12 FG , 2 - 5 3PT ) , three assists and two rebounds . Eric Bledsoe finished with 16 points ( 5 - 11 FG ) and five assists , while T.J. Warren added 14 points and five rebounds . Tyson Chandler recorded a double - double with eight points and 10 rebounds , along with one assist and one steal , in 23 minutes . The Boston Celtics ( 32 - 23 ) defeated the Los Angeles Clippers ( 35 - 18 ) 139 - 134 on Wednesday at the TD Garden in Boston . The Celtics got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Clippers 33 - 37 in the first quarter alone . They went on to out - score the Clippers 58 - 48 in the second quarter , giving them enough of an advantage to coast to a much - needed victory in front of their home crowd . Isaiah Thomas led all scorers with 36 points ( 12 - 21 FG , 1 - 5 3Pt , 11 - 12 FT ) , to go along with 11 assists , four rebounds and one steal , in 40 minutes . Jared Sullinger recorded a double - double with 21 points ( 10 - 15 FG ) and 11 rebounds , while Jae Crowder added 19 points ( 5 - 11 FG , 3 - 8 3PT , 6 - 7 FT ) and eight rebounds , in 38 minutes . Avery Bradley chipped in 18 points ( 7 - 14 FG ) , two assists and one rebound , in 44 minutes . The Clippers were led by Chris Paul , who went 13 - 21 from the field , while also adding 13 assists , five rebounds , three steals and one block , in 48 minutes . J.J. He continues to be one of the most consistent scorers in the league , averaging 24 points and 8 rebounds per game over his last four games . Frank Kaminsky III was the only other Hornets player in double figures with 16 points , three rebounds and one steal in 25 minutes . With the loss , the Hornets are now just a half - game ahead of the Miami Heat for the eighth and final playoff spot in the Eastern Conference . Up next , the Nuggets will head home Friday to take on the Heat , while the Hornets will stay home and go up against the Bucks on Friday .

It was his second double - double in a row , after posting 17 points and six rebounds against the Bucks on Sunday . The bench was led by Zach Randolph 's 20 points ( 7 - 12 FG , 4 - 4 FT ) and 12 rebounds , giving him his fourth double - digit scoring game of the season . Marc Gasol struggled with his shot , going just 1 - for - 6 from the floor , but still finished with two points , seven assists and six boards . The Grizz were led in scoring by Courtney Lee and Tony Allen , who both finished in double - figures with 17 and 14 points , respectively . With the win , the Grizzlies improved to 10 - 2 at home this season . They 'll look to keep it rolling on the road against the New Orleans Pelicans on Friday , as they 'll travel to New Orleans to play the Pelicans .
The Orlando Magic ( 7 - 11 ) defeated the San Antonio Spurs ( 14 - 4 ) 95 - 83 on Wednesday at the AT & T Center in San Antonio . The Magic got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Spurs 16 - 20 in the first quarter and 29 - 21 in the second quarter to take a 20 - point lead heading into the locker room . They were able to hold the Spurs to just 37 percent shooting from the field and 25 percent from the three - point line , while shooting 45 percent from beyond the arc . They also out - rebounded the Spurs 45 - 40 , giving them just enough of an advantage to pull out the win . Serge Ibaka was the high - point man for the Magic , finishing with 18 points on 7 - of - 11 shooting , to go along with seven rebounds , two assists , two steals and one block , in 34 minutes . Evan Fournier finished with 13 points , seven assists , three rebounds and two steals , in 33 minutes . Elfrid Payton recorded a double - double off the bench , with 12 points and 10 rebounds , in 25 minutes . The Spurs were led by Kawhi Leonard , who finished with 21 points on 6 - 16 shooting , in 32 minutes . LaMarcus Aldridge finished with 16 points , six rebounds , three assists and one blocked shot , in 31 minutes , while Patty Mills chipped in 13 points on 4 - 9 shooting , including 2 - 5 from deep , in 23 minutes . Pau Gasol finished with six points on 2 - 6 shooting , along with six rebounds and three assists , in 22 minutes . Up next , the Magic will head home to take on the Timberwolves on Friday , while the Spurs will stay home and go up against the Clippers on Friday .
The Sacramento Kings ( 13 - 17 ) defeated the New York Knicks ( 5 - 27 ) 135 - 129 on Wednesday at Sleep Train Arena in Sacramento . The Kings got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Knicks 38 - 27 in the first quarter . The Knicks were able to make a run in the second quarter , but the Kings responded with a big run of their own to take the lead and eventually pull away in the fourth quarter . Sacramento shot 55 percent from the field and 50 percent from three - point range in this game , while the Knicks finished at 50 percent shooting from the floor and 30 percent from beyond the arc . DeMarcus Cousins did all he could to keep the Kings in the game , as he finished with 39 points ( 14 - 27 FG , 1 - 1 3Pt , 10 - 11 FT ) , 11 rebounds and four assists in 32 minutes . Rudy Gay was n't far behind , finishing with 29 points ( 12 - 21 FG , 2 - 7 3PT , 3 - 3 FT ) and three assists in 43 minutes . Darren Collison finished with 27 points and 10 assists in 42 minutes . Carmelo Anthony was the star of the show for the Knicks . He finished with a game - high of 36 points , to go along with 11 rebounds , six assists and one steal in 46 minutes . Cole Aldrich was the only other Knick to reach double figures in points . Aldrich finished with 18 points ( 8 - 9 FG ) , seven rebounds , two blocks and one assist in 24 minutes . Tim Hardaway Jr. added 19 points ( 7 - 14 FG ) and five rebounds in 30 minutes . Up next , the Kings will stay home to take on the 76ers on Friday , while New York will head home to play the Nuggets on Friday .
The Memphis Grizzlies ( 20 - 18 ) defeated the Denver Nuggets ( 13 - 24 ) 91 - 84 on Monday at Fed Ex Forum Arena in Memphis . The Grizzlies got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Nuggets 29 - 7 in the first quarter alone . The Nuggets were able to make a run in the second quarter , but were unable to hold off the Grizzlies in the third quarter , where they out - scored the Nuggets 24 - 18 . Despite being out - rebounded 59 - 43 , the Grizzlies were still able to out - score the Nuggets 43 - 40 in the fourth quarter , giving them just enough of an advantage to pull out the win . Danilo Gallinari led the way for the Nuggets , scoring a game - high of 29 points ( 8 - 18 FG , 2 - 6 3Pt , 11 - 11 FT ) , to go along with eight rebounds and three assists in 35 minutes . He 's now averaging 20 points and 8 rebounds on the season . Gary Harris chipped in 11 points ( 4 - 9 FG ) and five rebounds in 31 minutes . Jameer Nelson struggled shooting the ball , going 0 - for - 3 from the field , but still finished with nine assists and three rebounds in 30 minutes . The Grizz were led by Zach Randolph , who scored 24 points ( 9 - 19 FG , 6 - 8 FT ) and grabbed six rebounds in 28 minutes off the bench . It was a season - high in points for him , while also notching his first double - double of the year . Jeff Green finished with 16 points and nine rebounds , while Matt Barnes added 15 points and seven rebounds in 33 minutes . Marc Gasol struggled with his shot , going 5 - of - 17 from the floor , but he still recorded 12 points , four rebounds , three assists , five steals and one block in 37 minutes . Mario Chalmers was the other starter with double - digit points ( 12 ) , six rebounds and four assists in 40 minutes . Despite the loss , the Nuggets have now won two of their last three games , as they continue to battle for a playoff spot in the Western Conference . They 'll look to get back on track on Wednesday , when they take on the New Orleans Pelicans on the road .
The Brooklyn Nets ( 11 - 28 ) defeated the New York Knicks ( 20 - 21 ) 110 - 104 on Monday at the Barclays Center in Brooklyn . The Nets were able to hold off the Knicks in this one , as they out - scored New York 36 - 29 in the fourth quarter to secure the victory . The Knicks came into this game as a double - digit favorite , but the Nets had other ideas . They out - shot the Knicks 52 percent to 45 percent from the field and 53 percent to 32 percent from three - point range , while also out - rebounding them 45 to 45 and out - assisting them 24 to 19 . The assist - to - turnover ratio was decisive as well , with the Nets recording 24 assists to 15 turnovers , while the Knicks committed 19 turnovers to just 19 assists . Brook Lopez led the way for the Nets , as he tallied 20 points ( 8 - 13 FG , 4 - 6 FT ) , eight rebounds , five assists , two steals and one block , in 30 minutes . Thaddeus Young finished with 19 points ( 9 - 18 FG , 1 - 2 FT ) and 11 rebounds , while Joe Johnson chipped in 14 points ( 6 - 12 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt ) , seven rebounds and six assists , in 39 minutes . Quincy Acy came off the bench to score a team - high of 31 points ( 10 - 17 FG , 9 - 11 FT ) to go along with seven rebounds , three assists and two steals , in 32 minutes . The only other player to score in double figures for the Knicks was Arron Afflalo , who finished with 18 points , three rebounds and two assists . Kristaps Porzingis finished with 12 points and 10 rebounds , along with three steals , two assists , three steals and two blocks , in 37 minutes . Up next , the Knicks will head home Wednesday to take on the Wizards , while Brooklyn will stay home Wednesday and go up against the Heat .

The Charlotte Hornets ( 27 - 33 ) defeated the Toronto Raptors ( 38 - 24 ) 103 - 94 on Wednesday at Time Warner Cable Arena in Charlotte . The Hornets came into this game as a double - digit favorite and they did n't disappoint . In fact , they led for the majority of the game , as they led by at least 12 points for the entirety of the fourth quarter and into the final period . The key for Charlotte was the rebounding , as the Hornets out - rebounded the Raptors 56 - 32 , while holding them to just 32 percent from the field . The Raptors were led by DeMar DeRozan , who tallied 30 points ( 14 - 26 FG , 2 - 2 FT ) , two rebounds , three assists , one steal and one block in 39 minutes . Cody Zeller and Michael Kidd-Gilchrist chipped in 12 points each , with Zeller adding seven rebounds and four assists , while Kidd Gilchrist added 11 rebounds , four assists and two steals in 35 minutes . With this win the Hornets are now tied with the Miami Heat for the eighth and final playoff spot in the Eastern Conference . They 'll head to New York to take on the Knicks on Friday night in the second half of a back - to - back set . For the Raptors , they 're off until Friday night when they 'll travel to Boston to play the Celtics .

The Warriors were able to hold off the Jazz in this one , despite being out - scored 29 - 23 in the fourth quarter . The Jazz came into this game as a double - digit favorite and nearly pulled out the upset win , but it was n't enough to take down the defending champs . Golden State shot 49 percent from the field and 48 percent from three - point range , while the Jazz shot 45 percent from beyond the arc and only 32 percent from long range . Draymond Green and Stephen Curry led the Warriors in scoring with 20 points each . Green added 12 rebounds and eight assists , while Curry added six rebounds , five assists and two steals . Klay Thompson was the only other player to score in double figures for the Warriors , as he finished with a team - high of 20 points . Derrick Favors finished with 23 points and 10 rebounds , while Rudy Gobert added 13 points , 11 rebounds , three assists , one steal and one block in 37 minutes . The Pistons came into this game as a double - digit favorite and they left no doubt who the better team was . The Pelicans ( 32 - 43 ) have now won five of their last six games , as they continue to battle for the final playoff spot in the Western Conference playoff race .
