The Hornets were able to hold off the Bulls in this one , despite being out - rebounded 56 - 41 by the Bulls . They were the superior shooters in this game , going 44 percent from the field , while the Bulls went just 39 percent . They also out - assisted the Bulls 25 - 7 , giving them just enough of an advantage to pull out the victory in front of their home crowd . Kemba Walker led the way for the Hornets , as he went 8 - for - 19 from the floor and 4 - of - 9 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 30 points , while also adding seven rebounds and eight assists . He 's now averaging 22 points , 8 rebounds and 6 assists on the season . Nicolas Batum also had a big game , finishing with 19 points ( 8 - 13 FG , 3 - 6 3Pt , 0 - 0 FT ) , 13 rebounds and 8 assists . It was his second double - double in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 17 points and 12 rebounds . Michael Kidd-Gilchrist also had 20 points ( 7 - 14 FG , 1 - 2 3PT , 5 - 6 FT ) and seven rebounds of his own . In his second game back from a one - game absence due to an ankle injury , he went off for 20 points and seven boards in 30 minutes . Coming off the bench , Marco Belinelli had 13 points ( 5 - 9 FG ) and eight rebounds in 28 minutes . The Bulls were led by Pau Gasol 's 22 points and 10 rebounds . He also had seven assists , two steals and three blocked shots . Taj Gibson was the only other Bull to reach double figures in points with 11 , while E'Twaun Moore added 12 points . The only other player to score in double figures for the Bulls was Nikola Mirotic , who finished with 14 points ( 6 - 11 FG ) in 32 minutes . Up next , the Hornets will stay home to take on the 76ers on Friday , while Chicago will head home to go up against the Pistons on Friday .
The Utah Jazz ( 39 - 24 ) defeated the Sacramento Kings ( 25 - 37 ) 110 - 109 on Wednesday at Sleep Train Arena in Sacramento . The Jazz came into this game as a double - digit favorite and they did n't disappoint , as they held the Kings to just 52 percent shooting from the field and 47 percent from the three - point line . They also out - rebounded the Kings 47 - 37 and out - assisted them 24 - 24 , giving them just enough of an advantage to pull out the win . Rodney Hood led the Jazz in scoring with 28 points ( 10 - 17 FG , 4 - 8 3Pt ) , to go along with four rebounds and two steals , in 33 minutes . Gordon Hayward followed up with 23 points ( 7 - 21 FG , 2 - 7 3PT , 7 - 9 FT ) , six rebounds and five assists , in 40 minutes . Rudy Gobert finished with 16 points ( 8 - 11 FG ) , 23 rebounds , three assists , three blocks and one steal , in 41 minutes . George Hill chipped in 15 points ( 4 - 14 FG ) and eight assists , while going 5 - 8 from the free throw line . The only other player to score in double digits for the Jazz was Derrick Favors , who finished with nine points , in 26 minutes . The Kings were led by Ty Lawson , who went 7 - for - 13 from the floor to score 19 points , while also adding five assists and four rebounds , in 37 minutes . Darren Collison finished with 18 points , three rebounds , five assists . Willie Cauley-Stein finished with 15 points and nine rebounds , while Arron Afflalo added 17 points ( 6 - 12 FG , 1 - 2 3PT ) and three assists . Kosta Koufos recorded a 12 - point , 10 - rebound double - double , along with one assist and one block , in 36 minutes . Up next , the Jazz will head home to take on the Denver Nuggets on Friday , while the Kings will stay home and play the Los Angeles Clippers on Friday .
The Charlotte Hornets ( 21 - 27 ) defeated the Washington Wizards ( 31 - 18 ) 92 - 88 on Wednesday at the Verizon Center in Washington D.C . The Hornets were the superior shooters in this game , going 47 percent from the field and 27 percent from beyond the arc , while the Wizards finished at 41 percent shooting from the floor and just 40 percent from deep . The Wizards were also out - rebounded 42 - 42 , giving the Hornets just enough of an advantage to pull out the victory . Charlotte was led by their frontcourt duo of Al Jefferson and Michael Kidd-Gilchrist . Jefferson finished with 18 points ( 9 - 19 FG , 0 - 2 3Pt , 5 - 10 FT ) and 12 rebounds in 31 minutes . It was his second double - double in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 17 points and 13 rebounds over that span . He 's now averaging 16 points and 10 rebounds on the year . Brian Roberts was the other starter to reach double figures in points . He went 6 - for - 10 from the three - point line and 1 - of - 3 from the free throw line to score 18 points , while also adding three assists and one steal in 34 minutes . Gerald Henderson chipped in 17 points ( 6 - 13 FG ) and five assists of his own . He was able to get to the line a game - high five times and converted on all four of those attempts . The only other Hornets player to score in double figures was Michael Kidd Gilchrist , who finished with 13 points ( 4 - 6 FG , 4 - 10 FG , 2 - 11 FT ) , to go along with 13 rebounds and three assists in 37 minutes . For the Wizards , Bradley Beal was the high - point man with 18 ( 7 - 16 FG ) , while adding 11 rebounds and one assist in 39 minutes . Beal 's 11 rebounds were a season - high for him , while his 18 points were also a new career - high . John Wall had a nice all - around game , as he recorded a 16 - point , 10 - assist , one - rebound and one - steal line . He did turn the ball over four times though , so it was n't all good for the Wizards point guard . Paul Pierce was the only other Washington player to hit double digits in the scoring column . He finished with 11 points in 24 minutes , while Nene added eight points and seven rebounds in 28 minutes of action . Kelly Oubre , Jr. came off the bench to score 13 points and grab five rebounds in 26 minutes . With the loss , the Wizards have now lost four of their last five games . They 're currently in fourth place in the Eastern Conference 's Southeast Division , and are just a half - game ahead of the eighth - place Atlanta Hawks . Up next , the Hornets will head home to take on the Atlanta Hawks on Friday , while Washington will travel to Boston to play the Celtics on Friday .
The Phoenix Suns ( 23 - 59 ) defeated the Los Angeles Clippers ( 53 - 29 ) 114 - 105 on Monday at Talking Stick Resort Arena in Phoenix . The Suns were the superior shooters in this game , going 46 percent from the field and 27 percent from beyond the arc , while the Clippers finished at 45 percent shooting from the floor and 29 percent from three - point range . The assist - to - turnover ratio was the difference in the game , with the Suns recording 26 assists to 16 turnovers and the Clippers committing 15 turnovers to just 23 assists . The Clippers were led by Jamal Crawford , who went off for 19 points ( 8 - 13 FG , 3 - 6 3Pt ) and three rebounds in 29 minutes off the bench . He 's now averaging 19 points and 5 rebounds on the season . Austin Rivers was the only other Clipper to reach double figures in points , finishing with 16 points ( 7 - 17 FG ) , four rebounds and five assists . Cole Aldrich recorded a double - double with 14 points ( 5 - 5 FG , 4 - 4 FT ) and 10 rebounds , giving him his second double - doubles in a row . The only other player to score in double figures for the Clippers was Marreese Speights , who finished with 12 points , seven rebounds , five assists and three steals in 25 minutes . Jon Leuer led the way for the Suns , as he went 7 - for - 8 for 16 points and 14 rebounds to go along with two steals and one block in 20 minutes . It was a season - high in points for him , while it was also a season high in rebounds as well . Mirza Teletovic led the team in scoring , going off for a team - high of 22 points , while also adding nine rebounds and two assists . He was able to get to the free throw line eight times , converting on a perfect 4 - of - 4 from the charity stripe . P.J . Tucker also had a solid game , scoring 14 points , adding seven rebounds and three assists in 30 minutes . Alex Len started at center and finished with 10 points ( 4 - 10 FG , 2 - 2 FT ) , three rebounds and one assist in 28 minutes . Brandon Knight chipped in 14 points and 12 rebounds , while Devin Booker added 12 points and two rebounds in 27 minutes . With the win , the Suns are now tied with the Clippers for the eighth and final playoff spot in the Western Conference . They 'll head to San Antonio to take on the Spurs on Wednesday , as the Clippers will head to Denver to play the Nuggets .
The Houston Rockets ( 41 - 18 ) defeated the New Orleans Pelicans ( 23 - 35 ) 129 - 99 on Wednesday at the Smoothie King Center in New Orleans . The Rockets were the superior shooters in this game , going 50 percent from the field and 39 percent from beyond the arc , while the Pelicans finished at 42 percent shooting from the floor and just 19 percent from three - point range . The Pelicans were also out - rebounded 48 - 44 , giving the Rockets 48 boards to the Pelicans 44 . The assist - to - turnover ratio was the difference in the game , with the Rockets recording 28 assists to just 16 turnovers and the Pelicans committing 20 turnovers to just 24 assists . James Harden led the Rockets in scoring , finishing with 13 points ( 3 - 9 FG , 1 - 6 3Pt , 6 - 6 FT ) , 14 assists and four rebounds , while also recording three steals and three steals . He 's now averaging 27 points , 8 assists and 4 rebounds on the season . Eric Gordon led the team in scoring off the bench , going off for 27 points ( 9 - 16 FG , 7 - 11 3Pts , 2 - 2 FT ) and two assists in 25 minutes . He was able to get to the free throw line a game - high seven times , converting on all 11 attempts . Ryan Anderson was the only other starter in double figures , as he finished with 17 points ( 5 - 9 shooting , 3 - 6 from deep , 4 - 4 FT ) . The only other Rocket to reach double figures in points was Trevor Ariza , who finished with nine points and seven rebounds in 27 minutes . For the Pelicans , Anthony Davis led the way with 29 points ( 8 - 21 FG , 13 - 16 FT ) to go along with nine rebounds , two steals and two blocked shots , while DeMarcus Cousins finished with 27 points and 13 rebounds . He also had five steals and four blocked shots . Jrue Holiday struggled shooting the ball , going 3 - for - 12 on his way to six points , but he did dish out seven assists and recorded four rebounds and two blocks in 35 minutes . The bench was led by Ryan Anderson 's 12 points , which he complemented with five rebounds , five assists and two steals . The other three Pelicans bench players combined for just 20 points , with E'Twaun Moore ( six points ) , Solomon Hill ( three points , five rebounds ) and Langston Galloway ( five points , four rebounds ) rounding out the five players who scored in double digits . Despite the loss , the Rockets are still in second place in the Western Conference 's Southwest Division . They 're home again on Friday , as they 'll take on the Oklahoma City Thunder in a matinee game . Meanwhile , the Pelicans are in third place , and they 're currently a half - game behind the eighth - place Dallas Mavericks .
The Milwaukee Bucks defeated the Portland Trail Blazers , 90 - 88 , at BMO Harris Bradley Center on Wednesday . The Bucks ( 9 - 13 ) came in to Wednesday 's contest on the second night of a back - to - back , having dropped their previous two contests by a combined nine points . However , they were able to bounce back with a much - needed win over the Blazers , as they held Portland to just 39 percent shooting from the field and 24 percent from three - point range . Milwaukee was led by Giannis Antetokounmpo 's 17 - point , nine - rebound double - double , which he supplemented with an assist , two blocks , a steal and a pair of blocks . Greg Monroe was right behind him with a 16 - point effort that also included 12 rebounds and three assists . Khris Middleton supplied 14 points , three assists , a rebound , two steals and a block . O.J . Mayo registered 15 points , while Jabari Parker supplied 12 points , six rebounds , four assists and a steal . Greg Green led the bench with eight points , seven assists , five rebounds and four blocks . Damian Lillard 's 23 points led the way for Portland , and he supplemented his scoring total with seven assists and five rebounds . CJ McCollum and Al-Farouq Aminu were next with matching 18 - point efforts , with the former adding four assists , two rebounds and five steals , and the latter supplying five rebounds , an assist and two steals . Meyers Leonard led the second unit with 12 points and three rebounds , while Allen Crabbe was productive in a reserve role as well with 10 points , 13 boards , two assists and two blocks . The Trail Blazers remain in last place in the Western Conference 's Northwest Division . They head home to face off with the Los Angeles Clippers on Friday night . Meanwhile , the Bucks remain home to tangle with the Philadelphia 76ers on Friday evening as well .

Sacramento , on the other hand , will stay home to host the Phoenix Suns on Saturday night .

The Thunder got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Timberwolves 31 - 17 in the first quarter alone . They went on to out - score the Timberwolves 58 - 38 in the second quarter , giving them the cushion they needed to coast to an easy victory in front of their home crowd . Next up , the Thunder will head to San Antonio to take on the Spurs on Friday night , in what will be the second half of a back - to - back . Redick added 19 points and three rebounds of his own . Raymond Felton started at point guard and finished with 11 points , six assists , four rebounds and four steals . Meanwhile , the Grizzlies will look to get back on track against the San Antonio Spurs on Wednesday .

They were the superior shooters in this game , going 39 percent from the field and 19 percent from beyond the arc , while the Heat finished at 40 percent shooting from the floor and 36 percent from deep . The Heat were also out - rebounded 54 - 46 , which may have been the difference in the game , as they lost that battle , 46 - 46 . Despite the loss , the Hornets were still able to keep their playoff hopes alive . For the Heat , Josh Richardson was the high - point man , with 20 points on 8 - of - 14 shooting , while Tyler Johnson was the second - leading scorer , with 18 points , in 28 minutes . Hassan Whiteside recorded a double - double , with eight points ( 4 - 7 FG ) and 10 rebounds , while Goran Dragic finished with five points , three rebounds and eight assists . The only other player to reach double figures for Miami was Tyler Johnson , who finished with 12 points ( 5 - 10 FG , 1 - 4 3Pst ) , in 17 minutes . Up next for the Hornets is a matchup against the New Orleans Pelicans on Wednesday , in what will be the second half of a back - to - back for both teams , as the Hornets will be in New Orleans to take on the Pelicans and the Heat will travel to Atlanta to play the Hawks on Wednesday .

Reggie Jackson added 23 points ( 8 - 14 FG , 1 - 4 3Pt , 6 - 7 FT ) and five assists , while Andre Drummond recorded a double - double with 17 points and 23 rebounds , in 36 minutes . Ersan Ilyasova chipped in 13 points ( 4 - 10 FG ) and eight rebounds in 25 minutes . Khris Middleton was the high - point man for the Bucks , with 21 points ( 6 - 15 FG , 3 - 7 3PT ) , while Greg Monroe added 14 points and 13 rebounds . Giannis Antetokounmpo finished with 12 points ( 5 - 11 FG , 2 - 2 FT ) , nine rebounds , two assists and one block , in 34 minutes . The only other player to score in double digits for Milwaukee was O.J . Mayo , who finished with 13 points , along with five rebounds , four assists , one steal and one blocked shot , in 33 minutes . Up next , the Pistons will stay home to take on the 76ers on Friday , while the Bucks will head home to play the Nets on Friday .

Paul Zipser and Rajon Rondo turned in matching 15 - point efforts , with the former adding four rebounds , and the latter dishing out nine assists , hauling in nine boards and recording a steal . Bobby Portis led the second unit with 12 points , six rebounds and a pair of assists . Tobias Harris led the Pistons with 14 points , four rebounds and three assists . Marcus Morris was right behind him with a modest 14 points and three rebounds . Andre Drummond mustered a modest eight points but did haul in 17 rebounds and dish out a team - high eight assists . Jon Leuer led the bench with 13 points and six rebounds . Ish Smith and Kentavious Caldwell-Pope supplied matching nine - point tallies , while Tobias Harris was the only other starter with double - digit scoring . The Pistons remain in last place in the Eastern Conference 's Central Division , and are currently slotted in the seventh seed in the conference as well . They head to Milwaukee to take on the Bucks on Friday night . Chicago remains in fourth place , and currently holds the tiebreaker over the eighth - seeded Bucks . They 're home again on Friday evening to face off with the Pacers .

The Trail Blazers came into this game as a double - digit favorite , but the Hawks were able to prevail with a big road win . The Hawks were the superior shooters in this game , going 39 percent from the field and 29 percent from beyond the arc , while the Trail Blazers finished at 36 percent shooting from the floor and just 38 percent from deep . The Blazers were also out - rebounded 52 - 52 , giving the Hawks just enough of an advantage to pull out the win . McCollum were the only Trail Blazers to reach double figures in points . It was a season - high in points for Crabbe , who also added two assists and a steal . The only other Trail Blazer who reached double figures was Meyers Lillard , who finished with 11 points , 13 rebounds and three assists in 27 minutes . McConnell was the only other starter to score in double figures , as he finished with 10 points ( 5 - 9 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt ) , seven rebounds and two assists in 25 minutes . The 76ers had six players score in the double digits , but no one scored more than 13 points . The bench was the difference in the game . They got 13 points from Hollis Thompson and 13 from Nik Stauskas , while also getting 10 points and 10 rebounds from Dario Saric . They 'll look to get out of this rut when they take on the New York Knicks on Friday in their next scheduled game . Andre Drummond did everything he could to keep the Pistons in this game . He finished with 16 points , 17 rebounds , three steals and one block in just 26 minutes of action . It was his second double - double in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 17 points and 17 rebounds per game . Marcus Morris was second on the team with 19 points ( 9 - 16 FG ) , eight rebounds and three assists , while Reggie Jackson chipped in 14 points ( 4 - 12 FG ) and six assists in 28 minutes . Jon Leuer and Kentavious Caldwell-Pope each scored 12 points of their own , with the former adding five rebounds , two assists and one blocked shot and the latter adding four rebounds . Tobias Harris and Ish Smith were huge off the bench for the Pistons . Harris had 12 points and seven rebounds , while Smith had 11 points , four assists , one rebound and one steal in 20 minutes . Detroit 's next game will be on the road against the Charlotte Hornets on Friday .

The Jazz were expected to win this game easily and they left no doubt with this dominating victory . Utah dominated from start to finish , as they held the Lakers to just 38 percent shooting from the field and 39 percent from three - point range . They also dominated the rebounding , winning that battle , 47 - 43 , and outscored them in the paint , 52 - 36 . The Lakers were led by Luol Deng , who recorded a double - double with 12 points and 12 rebounds . Nick Young was the only other starter in double figures , as he tallied 13 points and one block . Jordan Clarkson led the team in scoring off the bench , dropping 17 points on 6 - of - 12 shooting in 27 minutes . D'Angelo Russell struggled shooting , going 3 - for - 14 on his way to nine points , but still finished with five rebounds , five assists and two steals . Rodney Hood was second on the team , totaling 15 points , six rebounds , one assist and one steal . Alec Burks led the bench in scoring , dropping 15 points and eight rebounds in 20 minutes . Next up , the Jazz will travel to Denver to take on the Nuggets in Game 2 on Monday , while the Lakers will head to Los Angeles to play the Clippers in Game 3 .

Up next , the Celtics will stay home to take on the Wizards on Wednesday , while the Hornets will head home to go up against the Heat on Wednesday .
The Brooklyn Nets ( 7 - 9 ) defeated the New York Knicks ( 4 - 15 ) 98 - 93 on Wednesday at Madison Square Garden in New York . The Nets got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Knicks 27 - 18 in the first quarter and 28 - 19 in the second quarter . The Knicks were able to make a run in the third quarter , but were unable to keep up with the Nets in the fourth , as they were out - scored 29 - 21 , giving the Nets enough of an advantage to pull out the victory . Brook Lopez led the way for the Nets , scoring 23 points ( 10 - 20 FG , 3 - 4 FT ) , to go along with eight rebounds and three blocked shots , in 35 minutes . Joe Johnson followed up with 22 points , eight rebounds , six assists , three steals and one block , in 37 minutes . Deron Williams added 19 points ( 6 - 12 FG , 5 - 8 3Pt , 2 - 3 FT ) and five rebounds , while Bojan Bogdanovic chipped in 10 points ( 5 - 11 FG ) , two assists , two rebounds and one steal , in 40 minutes . Carmelo Anthony was the high - point man for the Knicks , as he finished with 20 points on 7 - 22 shooting , along with nine rebounds and six assists . Up next , the Nets will head home to take on the 76ers on Friday , while the Knicks will head to Boston to play the Celtics on Friday .
The Cleveland Cavaliers ( 30 ) defeated the Orlando Magic ( 0 - 3 ) 105 - 99 on Sunday at Quicken Loans Arena in Game 3 of the Eastern Conference finals . The Cavaliers got off to a quick start in this game , out - scoring the Magic 33 - 20 in the first quarter . They were able to hold on to that lead for the rest of the way , as they went on to out - score the Magic 37 - 17 in the second quarter to take a 20 - point lead heading into the fourth . Cleveland was able to shoot 41 percent from the field and 30 percent from three - point range , while holding Orlando to 45 percent shooting from the floor and 29 percent from beyond the arc . LeBron James led the way for the Cavaliers , as he finished with 23 points ( 7 - 16 FG , 2 - 6 3Pt , 7 - 11 FT ) , nine assists , six rebounds , one steal and one block , in 39 minutes . Kevin Love finished with 19 points ( 6 - 17 FG ) , five rebounds and one blocked shot , in 33 minutes . Elfrid Payton finished with 10 points , five assists and four rebounds in 34 minutes , while Aaron Gordon added eight points , three rebounds , three steals and two assists , in 26 minutes . Up next , the Cavaliers will stay home to take on the Hawks on Tuesday , while the Magic will head home to go up against the Bulls on Wednesday .
The Atlanta Hawks ( 8 - 2 ) defeated the Miami Heat ( 2 - 8 ) 93 - 90 on Wednesday at the American Airlines Arena in Miami . The Hawks came into this game as a double - digit favorite and they left no doubt who the better team was , as they pulled out the hard - fought victory in front of their home crowd . This game was close throughout , as there were 10 ties and 11 lead changes , with neither team leading by more than 12 points . The key for the Hawks was the free - throw shooting , where they went 17 - for - 20 , while the Heat went just 11 - for- 19 . The assist - to - turnover ratio was decisive as well , with Atlanta recording 18 assists to just 18 turnovers , while Miami committed 23 turnovers to just 13 assists . Dennis Schroeder led the Hawks in scoring , as he tallied 18 points ( 7 - 15 FG , 2 - 2 3Pt ) , four assists and five steals in the win . Paul Millsap finished with 15 points , six rebounds and four assists , while Dwight Howard recorded his first double - double of the season , totaling 11 points and 11 rebounds in the victory . The only other player to score in double figures for Atlanta was Kent Bazemore , who finished with 12 points , three rebounds , two steals and two blocks in 31 minutes . The Heat were led by Hassan Whiteside and Josh Richardson , who combined for 40 points and 20 rebounds . Whiteside finished with 19 points and 25 rebounds , while Richardson amassed 19 points , four rebounds , three steals and three blocks . Dion Waiters was the only other Miami player to reach double figures in points , tallying 11 points , two rebounds , five assists and three steals . Tyler Johnson and James Johnson each scored 14 points off the bench , with Johnson adding two rebounds and two assists , and Johnson adding four rebounds and a block . Up next for the Heat is a matchup with the Orlando Magic on Friday , as the Hawks will travel to Orlando to take on the Magic in the second half of a back - to back .

The Denver Nuggets defeated the Utah Jazz , 105 - 91 , at Pepsi Center on Wednesday . The Nuggets ( 5 - 8 ) came into this game as a double - digit favorite and they left no doubt who the better team was . In fact , Denver led for the entirety of the second half , as they led by at least 12 points for the majority of the game . Shooting was the key difference , with the Nuggets shooting 49 percent from the field and 36 percent from three - point range , while holding the Jazz to 39 percent shooting and 26 percent from long range . Denver also dominated the rebounding , winning that battle , 49 - 49 . Free-throw shooting was a huge factor as well , with Denver going 26 - of - 30 from the charity stripe , while Utah hit just 11 - of- 19 . The Jazz ( 7 - 8 , still in the thick of things ) had to play this game without Derrick Favors and Rudy Gobert and it clearly hurt them down the stretch . Gordon Hayward led the team in scoring , as he tallied 25 points , seven rebounds and two assists . Dante Exum was second on the team , finishing with 10 points and six assists . Rodney Hood was the only other starter in double figures , totaling 10 points , five rebounds and five assists . Alec Burks led the bench with 16 points and eight rebounds . On deck for the Jazz is a road matchup against the Portland Trail Blazers on Friday . Denver was led by Jusuf Nurkic , who totaled 16 points , 11 rebounds , three assists , one steal and one block in the win . Wilson Chandler was huge off the bench , providing 17 points , four rebounds , one assist and one steal . Danilo Gallinari finished with 13 points , six rebounds and seven assists . Jameer Nelson was the third bench player in double - figures , providing 18 points , one rebound and four assists . Will Barton started for Emmanuel Mudiay and accrued seven points , eight assists and two steals in the victory . The only other Nugget to reach double figures in points was Will Barton , who amassed seven points and two rebounds . Denver will look to build off this win on Friday against the Los Angeles Clippers in their next game .

Wesley Matthews was the other starter to reach double figures in points , as he finished with 21 , while Yogi Ferrell added 19 points , five rebounds and three assists , in 38 minutes . Seth Curry chipped in 16 points ( 7 - 17 FG , 2 - 6 3PT ) and five rebounds , while J.J. Barea added 14 points ( 6 - 11 FG ) and eight rebounds , in 29 minutes off the bench . For the Cavaliers , LeBron James did everything he could to keep the Cavaliers in this game . He went 9 - for - 19 from the field to score 23 points , while also adding nine rebounds and nine assists . He 's now averaging 23 points and 10 rebounds on the season . Kyrie Irving was the only other starter in double figures , with 18 points , in 33 minutes . The only other player to score in double digits for the Cavaliers was Richard Jefferson , who finished with 11 points , three rebounds and one block , in 25 minutes . Up next , the Mavericks will stay home to take on the Timberwolves on Friday , while the Cavaliers will head home to play the Trail Blazers on Friday .

Dirk Nowitzki was the only other Maverick to reach double figures in points , as he finished with 12 points ( 5 - 12 FG ) , four rebounds and two assists , in 27 minutes . Rajon Rondo finished with eight points ( 4 - 10 FG , 0 - 2 3PT ) , nine assists and four rebounds , in 36 minutes , while Chandler Parsons chipped in 11 points , six rebounds , two assists and one steal , in 35 minutes . The Lakers were led by the duo of Jordan Clarkson and Wesley Johnson , who finished with 15 points each . Clarkson added six rebounds and five assists , while Johnson added four rebounds . Wayne Ellington finished with 13 points ( 6 - 16 FG ) and five rebounds , while Lou Williams chipped - in 17 points ( 8 - 15 FG , 1 - 1 FT ) and eight rebounds off the bench , in 25 minutes . Next up , the Mavericks will head to San Antonio to take on the Spurs on Friday , in what will be the second half of a back - to - back for the Lakers , in order to try and get back into the win column . Next , the Lakers will go on the road and play the Golden State Warriors on Friday .

The Utah Jazz ( 43 - 25 ) defeated the Detroit Pistons ( 33 - 35 ) 97 - 83 on Wednesday at the Palace of Auburn Hills . The Jazz were the superior shooters in this game , going 47 percent from the field and 46 percent from three - point range , while the Pistons finished at 42 percent from both the floor and 23 percent from beyond the arc . Gordon Hayward led the Jazz with 25 points ( 9 - 17 FG , 4 - 7 3Pt , 3 - 3 FT ) , nine rebounds and six assists in 34 minutes . He 's now pushed his season averages to 20 points , 8 rebounds and 6 assists on the year . Rudy Gobert recorded a double - double with 12 points ( 5 - 6 FG , 2 - 5 FT ) and nine rebounds , while also adding five assists and four blocks in 36 minutes . It was the first time Gobert has recorded double - digit rebounds in his last seven games , as he continues to be a force on the boards . George Hill was the other starter to reach double figures in points , finishing with 17 points ( 6 - 12 FG , 1 - 4 3PT ) , four rebounds and three assists in 31 minutes . Joe Johnson chipped in 12 points , five rebounds , three steals and one block in 29 minutes , while Trey Burke was the only other Jazz player in double figures with 12 . The Pistons were led by Ish Smith , who went 6 - for - 9 from the floor to score 16 points , while adding three rebounds and two assists in 28 minutes off the bench . He was able to get to the free throw line six times , converting on four of those attempts . Jon Leuer started in place of the injured Tobias Harris , who finished with seven points ( 3 - 8 FG ) and five rebounds in 30 minutes . The only other player to score in double digits for the Pistons was Kentavious Caldwell-Pope , who added 10 points ( 4 - 12 ) , one rebound and one steal . The bench was led by 12 points and 12 rebounds from Stanley Johnson , who also recorded six rebounds , two assists and one blocked shot in 23 minutes . Andre Drummond had a quiet game by his standards , scoring only six points on 3 - of - 4 shooting , but he did grab five rebounds and record one steal in 20 minutes . Detroit 's next game will be on the road against the Charlotte Hornets on Friday , while Utah will travel to Milwaukee to play the Bucks on Friday .
The Washington Wizards ( 39 - 24 ) defeated the Denver Nuggets ( 29 - 35 ) 123 - 113 on Monday at the Pepsi Center in Denver . The Wizards came out firing on all cylinders in this one , out - scoring the Nuggets 57 - 48 in the first half alone . They were able to hold on to the lead for the majority of the second half , as they were up by as many as 26 points in the third quarter . The Nuggets made a run late in the fourth quarter though , cutting the Wizards lead to just three points with just over a minute to go , but John Wall answered with a game - winning three - pointer to put the Wizards up 123 - 112 . Wall finished the game with 30 points ( 12 - 19 FG , 2 - 6 3Pt , 4 - 5 FT ) , 10 assists and three rebounds in 35 minutes . Bradley Beal added 23 points ( 9 - 15 FG , 5 - 7 3PT ) and five assists of his own , while Otto Porter , Jr. finished with 22 points ( 10 - 15 ) and four steals in 34 minutes . Marcin Gortat recorded a double - double with 11 points ( 5 - 10 FG , 1 - 4 FT ) and 15 rebounds , while Markieff Morris added 11 points and six rebounds in 26 minutes . Gary Harris led the way for the Nuggets , as he went 10 - for - 15 from the field to score 26 points , while also adding four assists and two steals in 37 minutes . Mason Plumlee finished with 19 points ( 7 - 13 FG ) and 10 rebounds in 31 minutes , while Wilson Chandler chipped in 21 points , three rebounds and three assists . Jameer Nelson struggled shooting the ball , going 2 - of - 6 from the floor , but finished with five points , six assists and four rebounds in 24 minutes . Up next , the Wizards will head home to take on the Timberwolves on Wednesday , while the Nuggets will head to San Antonio to play the Spurs on Wednesday .

The Nets were able to out - score the Mavericks 52 - 43 in the second half to pull out the victory on the road Wednesday . They were the superior shooters in this game , going 52 percent from the field and 44 percent from beyond the arc , while the Mavericks finished at 43 percent shooting from the floor and 32 percent from deep . Deron Williams led the Nets with 23 points ( 8 - 13 FG , 4 - 6 3Pt , 3 - 4 FT ) and six rebounds , while also adding two assists and one steal . He 's had a nice stretch of three games where he 's averaging 20 points , 6 rebounds and 2 assists . Coming off the bench , Quincy Acy had a solid game as well , scoring 16 points ( 7 - 12 FG , 1 - 2 FT ) , to go along with eight rebounds , one assist and one block , in 30 minutes . The only other player to score in double digits for the Nets was Joe Johnson , who finished with 15 points , while adding eight rebounds and three assists . The Mavericks were led by Dirk Nowitzki , who went 8 - for - 14 for 20 points and 6 rebounds , in 31 minutes . It was a season - high in points for him , while it was also his second 20 - point game in a row . Rajon Rondo was the only other Maverick to reach double figures in points , as he finished with eight points ( 4 - 10 FG ) , seven rebounds and six assists , in 28 minutes . J.J. Barea started in place of Chandler Parsons , who sat out with an ankle injury . Barea finished with seven points ( 3 - 9 FG , 0 - 3 3PT ) , two rebounds and one assist , while Monta Ellis chipped in with 12 points , five assists , one rebound and three steals , in 38 minutes . Devin Harris and Devin Harris were the only bench players to score more than nine points , with Harris scoring 14 points , and Harris scoring 12 points . Up next , the Nets will head home to take on the Trail Blazers on Friday , where they 'll be looking to keep their playoff hopes alive . Meanwhile , the Mavericks will look to end their losing streak at home against the Charlotte Hornets on Friday .

The Portland Trail Blazers ( 35 - 32 ) defeated the Orlando Magic ( 28 - 37 ) 121 - 84 on Wednesday at the Moda Center in Portland . The Trail Blazers came into this game as a double - digit favorite and they left no doubt who the better team was , as they took care of business in this lopsided win . The Blazers shot 56 percent from the field and 49 percent from three - point range , while the Magic shot just 37 percent from beyond the arc and 27 percent from long range . They also out - rebounded the Magic 51 - 39 , giving them even more of an advantage in this one . Damian Lillard and C.J . McCollum led the way for the Blazers , as each scored 19 points . Lillard added 10 assists and four rebounds to his 19 points , while McCllum had 18 points ( 8 - 17 FG , 2 - 6 3Pt ) and three steals . Allen Crabbe was a huge spark off the bench , as he scored 18 points and grabbed five rebounds in just 24 minutes . Mason Plumlee recorded nine points ( 4 - 6 FG , 1 - 2 FT ) and 11 rebounds , giving him his first double - double of the season . The only other Blazer to reach double figures in points was Al-Farouq Aminu , who finished with 11 points , seven rebounds and two assists . Victor Oladipo and Aaron Gordon led the Magic in scoring with 18 and 17 points , respectively , but it was n't enough to keep up with the Trail Blazers . Evan Fournier was the only other Magic player in double figures , scoring 15 points ( 6 - 12 FG ) , to go along with four rebounds , two assists and two steals . Dewayne Dedmon played just 15 minutes and scored two points , but he did grab eight rebounds and record a block . Next up for the Magic is a road matchup against the Los Angeles Clippers on Friday , as the Blazers will travel to San Antonio to take on the Spurs . The Magic will be right back in action on Thursday , when they host the Utah Jazz .
The Cleveland Cavaliers ( 33 - 12 ) defeated the Detroit Pistons ( 25 - 22 ) 114 - 106 on Wednesday at the Palace of Auburn Hills . The Cavaliers came into this game as a double - digit favorite and they left no doubt who the better team was . They out - scored the Pistons 33 - 20 in the second quarter and held them to just 20 points in the third quarter . The Cavs were the superior shooters in this game , going 47 percent from the field and 39 percent from three - point range , while the Pistons finished at 48 percent shooting from the floor and 30 percent from long range . Cleveland also dominated the assist - to - turnover ratio , recording 20 assists to seven turnovers , while committing only seven turnovers to just seven assists . Kevin Love was the player of the game , finishing with 29 points ( 9 - 19 FG , 5 - 7 3Pt , 6 - 6 FT ) , six rebounds and three assists in 37 minutes . Kyrie Irving was n't far behind , going 11 - for - 19 for 28 points of his own , while also adding four rebounds , two assists and one steal . LeBron James finished with 20 points ( 7 - 16 FG ) , nine rebounds and eight assists in 36 minutes . Tristan Thompson recorded an 11 - point , 14 - rebound double - double in 31 minutes . The only other player to score in double figures for the Cavs was Channing Frye , who finished with 12 points ( 5 - 6 FG , 2 - 2 FT ) and eight rebounds in 19 minutes off the bench . The Pistons were led by the duo of Andre Drummond and Kentavious Caldwell-Pope . Drummond finished with a team - high of 20 points , to go along with eight rebounds , three blocks and one assist in 35 minutes . He 's now averaging 20 points and 10 rebounds on the season . Caldwell-Pt finished with 19 points , seven rebounds and two assists , while Reggie Jackson chipped in 15 points and six assists in 32 minutes . Detroit has now lost four of their last five games , as they continue to slide down the standings . They 're currently in fourth place in the Eastern Conference 's Central Division , and they 're just a half - game behind the eighth - seeded Chicago Bulls . Up next , the Cavaliers will head home Friday to take on the Bulls , while Detroit will stay home Friday and go up against the Heat .

The Wizards were able to use a strong second half where they out - scored the Hornets 29 - 25 to secure the win and end their four - game losing streak . They were the superior shooters in this game , going 54 percent from the field and 40 percent from beyond the arc , while the Hornets finished at just 39 percent shooting from the floor and 25 percent from three - point range . They also out - rebounded the Wizards 47 - 43 , giving them just enough of an advantage to pull out the win . John Wall and Markieff Morris led the Wizards in scoring . Wall finished with 24 points ( 9 - 20 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt , 6 - 7 FT ) , seven assists and four rebounds , while Morris finished with 23 points ( 8 - 13 FG , 2 - 4 3PT , 5 - 5 FT ) and eight rebounds of his own . Bradley Beal chipped in 18 points ( 6 - 16 FG , 4 - 9 3PT ) , five rebounds and four assists . The Hornets were led by Kemba Walker , who went 7 - for - 24 from the court and 2 - for- 10 from the three - post to score 21 points , while also adding five assists . He was able to get to the free throw line a game - high 20 times , converting on 10 of those attempts . Marvin Williams finished with 13 points ( 5 - 12 FG ) , eight rebounds , four assists , two steals and one blocked shot , while Cody Zeller added 13 points , nine rebounds , three steals and two blocked shots . The only other Hornets player to reach double figures in points was Marco Belinelli , who came off the bench and finished with 18 points and three rebounds . Nicolas Batum struggled shooting the ball , going only 2 - of - 9 for four points , but he did grab seven rebounds and dished out six assists , giving him his second double - digit assists in the last three games . Up next , the Wizards will head to New York to take on the Knicks on Wednesday , while Charlotte will stay home and go up against the Heat on Wednesday .

The Minnesota Timberwolves ( 7 - 32 ) defeated the Denver Nuggets ( 18 - 22 ) 113 - 105 on Wednesday at the Pepsi Center in Denver . The Timberwolves got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Nuggets 37 - 25 in the first quarter and 29 - 22 in the second quarter to take a double - digit lead heading into the fourth . The Nuggets were able to make a run in the fourth quarter , but it was n't enough , as the Timberwolves held on to win their fourth straight game . Andrew Wiggins led the way for the Timberwolves , as he finished with a game - high of 31 points ( 11 - 17 FG , 4 - 5 3Pt , 5 - 6 FT ) , to go along with nine rebounds , four assists , three blocked shots and one steal , in 40 minutes . Thaddeus Young was the other big contributor for the T-Wolves , finishing with 22 points , six rebounds , five assists and three steals , in 42 minutes . Robbie Hummel finished with 15 points and 13 rebounds , in 43 minutes , while Mo Williams chipped in 13 points and seven assists , in 36 minutes . Gorgui Dieng finished with 12 points , eight rebounds and five assists , while the only other player to score in double digits for Minnesota was Shabazz Muhammad , who finished with seven points , in 16 minutes off the bench . Ty Lawson was the high - point man for the Nuggets , with 22 , while Wilson Chandler finished with 14 points , two rebounds and one assist , in 33 minutes . Jusuf Nurkic played just 15 minutes , and finished with four points , nine rebounds and two assists . Nikola Jokic was the only bench player to reach double figures in points , with 16 points , while Jamal Murray added 14 points and 10 rebounds . Up next , the Timberwolves will head home to take on the Trail Blazers on Friday , in what will be the second half of a back - to - back for both teams , while Denver will stay home and go up against the Kings on Friday .
The Los Angeles Clippers ( 15 - 5 ) defeated the Cleveland Cavaliers ( 13 - 4 ) 113 - 94 on Wednesday at Quicken Loans Arena in Cleveland . The Clippers were the superior shooters in this game , going 47 percent from the field and 42 percent from beyond the arc , while the Cavaliers finished at 41 percent from both the floor and 38 percent from deep . The Cavaliers were also out - rebounded by the Clippers 47 - 36 , giving the Clippers even more of an advantage in the rebounding column . J.J. Redick led the Clippers in scoring with 23 points ( 9 - 13 FG , 4 - 6 3Pt , 1 - 2 FT ) , while Chris Paul added 16 points ( 5 - 11 FG , 3 - 7 3PT ) , six rebounds and nine assists of his own . Blake Griffin struggled shooting , going just 4 - of - 14 from the floor , but still finished with 13 points ( 4 - 14 FG , 0 - 1 3PT , 5 - 8 FT ) and 11 assists . DeAndre Jordan recorded a double - double with nine points and 15 rebounds , while Marreese Speights chipped in 12 points and seven assists off the bench . Kyrie Irving led the way for the Cavaliers with 28 points ( 8 - 19 FG , 11 - 12 FT ) . He also had two rebounds and two assists in 34 minutes . Kevin Love was the only other Cleveland player in double figures , finishing with 16 points and four rebounds in 25 minutes . LeBron James struggled shooting the ball , going 5 - for - 14 on his way to 16 points , five rebounds , five assists and two steals . Tristan Thompson started in place of Kyle Korver , who sat out with an ankle injury . Thompson finished with three points ( 1 - 3 FG ) , eight rebounds and one steal . The only other Cavalier to reach double figures in points was Channing Frye , who finished with 12 points in 22 minutes . Up next , the Clippers will head to Indiana to take on the Pacers on Friday , while Cleveland will stay home and go up against the Nets on Friday .
The Los Angeles Clippers ( 55 - 26 ) defeated the Denver Nuggets ( 30 - 51 ) 110 - 103 on Wednesday at the Staples Center in Los Angeles . The Clippers came into this game as a double - digit favorite and they left no doubt who the better team was , as they pulled out the victory in front of their home crowd . In fact , the Clippers led for the majority of the game , as the Nuggets were held to just 31 points in the first half , with the two teams combining to shoot just 38 percent from the field and 36 percent from three - point range . The assist - to - turnover ratio was decisive as well , with Los Angeles recording 25 assists to just 13 turnovers , while the Nuggets committed 18 turnovers to just 18 assists . The Nuggets were led by Wilson Chandler , who scored a game - high of 32 points ( 12 - 23 FG , 6 - 10 3Pt , 2 - 3 FT ) , to go along with six rebounds and one steal , in 35 minutes . Kenneth Faried finished with 19 points ( 7 - 16 FG , 5 - 9 FT ) and 17 rebounds , while Randy Foye chipped in 16 points ( 6 - 21 FG , 3 - 12 3PT ) , seven rebounds and eight assists , in 39 minutes . The only other player to score in double digits for the Nuggets was Gary Harris , who finished with 13 points ( 4 - 8 FG ) , two rebounds and two assists . Up next , the Nuggets will head home to take on the Trail Blazers on Friday , in what will be the final game of their current five - game road trip . Meanwhile , Blake Griffin and DeAndre Jordan did everything they could to keep the Clippers in this game . Griffin finished with 22 points , nine rebounds , eight assists and two blocked shots , in 40 minutes , while Jordan finished with 20 points ( 8 - 12 FG , 4 - 10 FT ) of his own , along with 21 rebounds , four blocks , three assists , one steal and one blocked shot , in 36 minutes . J.J. Redick was the only other Clipper in double figures , as he scored 20 points , while adding two assists and one rebound , in 33 minutes . Chris Paul finished with 17 points and nine assists , while Matt Barnes added 11 points , one rebound and one assist , in 30 minutes of action . The Clips will look to keep rolling on Friday in a road matchup against the Golden State Warriors .
The Boston Celtics defeated the Charlotte Hornets , 102 - 89 , at Spectrum Center on Wednesday . The Celtics ( 16 - 13 ) checked in to Wednesday 's contest on the wrong side of a two - game losing streak , having dropped two straight and three of their last four . However , they were able to bounce back with a strong performance from their starting five , led by Kelly Olynyk 's 20 - point , nine - rebound , three - assist double - double . Jae Crowder was right behind him with 19 points , 12 rebounds and a block . Avery Bradley was next with 18 points , two rebounds , two assists and a steal . Isaiah Thomas and Jared Sullinger supplied matching eight - point efforts , with the former adding seven assists , four rebounds and two steals , and the latter hauling in 10 rebounds , dishing out five assists , recording two steals and recording two blocks . Marcus Smart led the second unit with 10 points , seven rebounds , three assists and two blocks , while Jaylen Brown was productive in a reserve role as well with seven points , one rebound , one assist and one steal . The Hornets ( 15 - 12 ) were led by Jeremy Lamb 's 23 points , which he supplemented with seven rebounds and one block . Nicolas Batum followed with 17 points , six rebounds and seven assists . Kemba Walker and Cody Zeller were next with matching 10 - point tallies . The former added four assists , three rebounds , one steal , one block and one three - pointer , while the latter hauled in 10 boards , dished out two assists , recorded a pair of steals and recorded two steals . Frank Kaminsky III led the bench with 12 points , eight rebounds and three assists , while Marco Belinelli was productive as a reserve as well , posting 12 points and five rebounds . The two teams reconvene on Friday night in Boston for the second game of a back - to - back .
The Phoenix Suns ( 32 - 30 ) defeated the Orlando Magic ( 19 - 43 ) 105 - 100 on Wednesday at the Amway Center in Orlando . The Suns were the superior shooters in this game , going 47 percent from the field and 38 percent from beyond the arc , while the Magic finished at 47 percent shooting from the floor and just 25 percent from deep . The Magic were also out - rebounded by the Suns 42 - 34 , giving the Suns just enough of an advantage to pull out the win . Brandon Knight led the way for the Suns , finishing with a game - high of 28 points ( 7 - 15 FG , 4 - 9 3Pt , 10 - 12 FT ) , to go along with seven assists , three steals and one rebound , in 39 minutes . Markieff Morris finished with 23 points ( 11 - 17 FG ) and six rebounds , while Eric Bledsoe added 13 points , nine assists , seven rebounds and three steals , in 38 minutes . P.J . Tucker chipped in 19 points and five rebounds , in 36 minutes , while Mirza Teletovic added seven points and four rebounds in 20 minutes off the bench . Victor Oladipo did everything he could to keep the Magic in the game , as he finished with 38 points ( 15 - 25 FG ) , four rebounds , three assists and one steal , in 43 minutes . Nikola Vucevic finished with 18 points ( 8 - 16 FG , 2 - 2 FT ) and five boards , while Elfrid Payton recorded a double - double with nine points and 10 assists , along with four rebounds and five steals . The only other Magic player to score in double figures was Tobias Harris , who finished with 11 points ( 5 - 8 FG , 1 - 3 3PT ) , in 35 minutes . Up next , the Suns will head home Friday to take on the 76ers , while Orlando will stay home Friday and go up against the Heat .
The Cleveland Cavaliers ( 37 - 16 ) defeated the Denver Nuggets ( 24 - 30 ) 125 - 109 on Wednesday at Quicken Loans Arena in Cleveland . The Cavaliers got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Nuggets 28 - 22 in the first quarter . They went on to out - score the Nuggets 33 - 22 the rest of the way , giving them just enough of an advantage to coast to an easy win . They shot 55 percent from the field and 50 percent from three - point range , while the Nuggets shot just 40 percent from beyond the arc and 32 percent from long range . The Cavs also out - rebounded the Nuggets 45 - 45 and out - assisted them 30 - 23 . The Nuggets were led by Nikola Jokic , who recorded his second double - double of the season , finishing with 27 points ( 9 - 18 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt , 8 - 10 FT ) and 13 rebounds in 38 minutes . He 's now averaging 20 points and 12 rebounds on the season . Gary Harris was the only other Nugget to reach double figures in points , as he finished with 16 points ( 6 - 11 FG , 3 - 5 3PT ) and three rebounds in 29 minutes . Jameer Nelson finished with 12 points ( 5 - 12 FG ) , eight rebounds and eight assists in 37 minutes , while Wilson Chandler chipped in 13 points and six rebounds in 34 minutes . For the Cavaliers , LeBron James was the player of the game . He went 11 - for - 16 from the floor to score 27 points , while also adding 12 assists and five rebounds in 33 minutes . It was his second straight game with at least 12 assists , a stretch where he 's averaging 11 assists per game . Kyrie Irving was n't too far behind , finishing the game with 27 ( 10 - 24 FG , 5 - 11 3PT , 2 - 2 FT ) , four rebounds , five assists and one block in 35 minutes . Kevin Love recorded 16 points , nine rebounds and five assists , while Tristan Thompson recorded a 13 - point , 13 - rebound , one - assist , one steal and a block in 36 minutes . Coming off the bench , Channing Frye had 14 points and five boards in 27 minutes . Up next , the Cavaliers will stay home to take on the Timberwolves on Friday , while Denver will head home to play the Trail Blazers on Friday .

The Bulls got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Nets 38 - 20 in the first quarter . They shot 51 percent from the field and 41 percent from beyond the arc , while the Nets shot just 34 percent ( 16 - for - 41 ) from the floor and 16 percent from three - point range . They also out - rebounded the Bulls 58 - 45 , giving them a big advantage in that category . Jimmy Butler led the Bulls in scoring with 22 points ( 6 - 10 FG , 2 - 3 3Pt , 8 - 9 FT ) , to go along with six rebounds and two assists , in 27 minutes . Taj Gibson added 14 points ( 7 - 9 FG ) and 11 rebounds , in 25 minutes , while Rajon Rondo chipped in 10 points ( 5 - 8 FG , 0 - 1 3PT ) , four rebounds , four assists , two steals and one block . Brooklyn will stay home and go up against the Pistons on Friday .
The Washington Wizards ( 27 - 20 ) defeated the New Orleans Pelicans ( 19 - 29 ) 107 - 94 on Wednesday at the Smoothie King Center in New Orleans . The Wizards were the superior shooters in this game , going 51 percent from the field and 48 percent from beyond the arc , while the Pelicans finished at 45 percent from both the floor and 31 percent from deep . The Pelicans were also out - rebounded by the Wizards 42 - 42 , giving the Wizards just enough of an advantage to pull out the win . Bradley Beal led the way for the Wizards , going 11 - for - 16 from the floor to score a game - high of 27 points , while also adding six rebounds and two assists . He 's now averaging 20 points and 6 rebounds on the season . Markieff Morris was also a big factor in the win , finishing with 21 points ( 9 - 20 FG , 3 - 3 3Pt ) and eight rebounds in 37 minutes . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 40 points and 20 rebounds over those two games . John Wall was the other Wizard to reach double figures in points , recording 18 points ( 8 - 19 FG ) and 19 assists . Marcin Gortat had a solid game as well , recording 17 points ( 7 - 11 FG ) , 11 rebounds , two assists and one steal in 31 minutes . For the Pelicans , Anthony Davis did everything he could to keep his team in the game , but it was n't enough . Davis finished with 36 points ( 15 - 25 FG , 1 - 2 3PT , 5 - 6 FT ) , 17 rebounds , three assists , three steals and two blocked shots in 40 minutes . He did n't have to do much though , as Jrue Holiday finished with 26 points and 11 assists of his own . The only other player to score in double figures for the Pelicans was Buddy Hield , who finished with 0 points ( 0 - 5 FG ) in 16 minutes . Up next , the Wizards will head home Friday to take on the 76ers , while New Orleans will stay home Friday and go up against the Heat .

The Celtics will look to bounce back on Friday , when they play the second game of a back - to - back when they host the New York Knicks . It was a season - high in points for Curry , as he 's now averaging 23 points and 6 rebounds on the year . The Los Angeles Lakers ( 18 - 36 ) defeated the New York Knicks ( 22 - 31 ) 121 - 107 on Monday at Madison Square Garden in New York . The Lakers came out firing on all cylinders in this one , as they out - scored the Knicks 59 - 44 in the first half alone . They were able to coast to the victory , as the Knicks were held to just 19 points in the second half , while the Lakers shot 43 percent from the field and 29 percent from three - point range . The Knicks were led by Carmelo Anthony , who scored 26 points ( 10 - 17 FG , 0 - 2 3Pt , 6 - 8 FT ) , to go along with five assists and three rebounds in 37 minutes . Kristaps Porzingis finished with 16 points ( 5 - 14 FG , 1 - 5 3PT , 5 - 7 FT ) and nine rebounds in 33 minutes . He 's now averaging 16 points and 9 rebounds on the season . The only other Knick to reach double figures in points was Willy Hernangomez , who had 16 points in 28 minutes off the bench . Derrick Rose struggled shooting the ball , as he went 2 - for - 8 from the floor , but finished with five points , four rebounds and three assists in 32 minutes . Nick Young led the Lakers in scoring with 17 points , while Julius Randle added 14 points and two steals in 17 minutes . Jordan Clarkson was the only other Laker in double figures , scoring 22 points ( 6 - 11 FG , 2 - 6 3PT ) and grabbing 10 rebounds in 26 minutes . Brandon Ingram chipped in 14 points , seven rebounds and two assists , while Lou Williams added 17 points and five rebounds in 24 minutes . Up next , the Lakers will head home Wednesday to take on the 76ers , while New York will stay home Wednesday and go up against the Pacers .
The Memphis Grizzlies defeated the host Utah Jazz , 102 - 96 , at Vivint Smart Home Arena on Wednesday . The Grizzlies ( 5 - 5 ) came in to Wednesday 's contest as one of the hottest teams in the Western Conference , having won four of their last five games . Memphis was led by Marc Gasol 's 22 points , which he supplemented with five rebounds , a steal and a block . Mike Conley followed with 18 points , seven assists , three rebounds and a steal . Zach Randolph led the bench with 20 points , while Zach Randolph was productive in a reserve role as well with an 18 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included a pair of steals . Chandler Parsons and JaMychal Green turned in matching nine - point efforts , with the former adding four rebounds and an assist , and the latter hauling in six boards and adding two blocks . The only other player to score in double digits for the Grizzlies was Zach Randolph , who supplied 20 points in 31 minutes off the bench . For the Jazz ( 7 - 4 ) , it was Joe Ingles who led the way with a team - high 20 points . He shot 7 - of - 11 from the field and hit four three - pointers en route to the scoring haul . Gordon Hayward was next with 13 points , four rebounds , three assists and two steals . Trey Burke led the second unit with 17 points and four assists , while Trey Burke supplied 18 points and five rebounds . Dante Exum supplied nine points , three boards and two assists . Rudy Gobert could only muster six points but did haul in five boards , dish out two assists , haul in two steals , and record a block in 22 minutes . Up next , the Grizzlies head to Los Angeles to take on the Lakers on Friday night , while the Jazz remain home and await the Golden State Warriors on Friday evening as well .

The Cavaliers got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Suns 41 - 28 right away in the first quarter . They went on to go on to out - score the Suns by 12 in the second quarter , giving them enough of an advantage to coast to a much - needed victory in front of their home crowd . The Toronto Raptors ( 40 - 29 ) defeated the Detroit Pistons ( 33 - 36 ) 87 - 75 on Wednesday at the Palace of Auburn Hills . The Raptors came into this game as a double - digit favorite and they did n't disappoint , as they held the Pistons to just 35 percent shooting from the field and 15 percent from three - point range . The assist - to - turnover ratio was decisive as well , with Toronto recording 19 assists to 12 turnovers , while Detroit committed 12 turnovers to just 14 assists . Serge Ibaka led the Raptors in scoring with 17 points ( 6 - 14 FG , 3 - 8 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) , to go along with nine rebounds and one assist , in 34 minutes . DeMar DeRozan finished with 14 points ( 3 - 9 FG ) , eight rebounds and six assists , while Jonas Valanciunas chipped in 10 points ( 5 - 7 FG ) and eight rebounds , in 24 minutes . The only other player to score in double digits for the Raptors was DeMarre Carroll , who finished with 12 points . The Pistons were led by Reggie Jackson , who went 6 - for - 14 from the floor to score a team - high of 20 points , while also adding six assists and two steals , in 28 minutes . Andre Drummond recorded yet another double - double , with eight points ( 4 - 10 FG , 0 - 4 FT ) and 22 rebounds , while adding two steals and one block , in 36 minutes . Tobias Harris was the only other Piston in double figures , as he scored 14 points on 5 - of - 10 shooting , along with seven rebounds and four blocked shots , in 33 minutes . Jon Leuer was a nice spark off the bench for Detroit , scoring 12 points , five rebounds and two assists , in 29 minutes . Up next , the Raptors will head home Friday to take on the 76ers , while the Pistons will stay home Friday and go up against the Heat .

The Indiana Pacers ( 18 - 32 ) defeated the Detroit Pistons ( 19 - 31 ) 114 - 109 on Wednesday at Bankers Life Fieldhouse in Indianapolis . The Pacers got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Pistons 29 - 26 in the first quarter . They were able to hold on to that lead for the rest of the way , as they went on to finish the game shooting 60 percent from the field and 57 percent from beyond the arc . The Pistons were led by Andre Drummond , who recorded a double - double with 18 points ( 9 - 15 FG , 7 - 9 FT ) and 16 rebounds . He also had an assist and a steal . Greg Monroe was the only other Piston to reach double figures in points , as he finished with 16 points ( 7 - 14 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt ) , nine rebounds and three steals . He 's now averaging 17 points and 12 rebounds on the season . D.J . Augustin was the other starter to reach the double - digit scoring mark , as the starting point guard . He finished with 12 points and six assists , while shooting 4 - of - 14 from the floor . The only other player to score in double figures for the Pistons was Jon Leuer , who finished with 13 points ( 5 - 12 FG ) , five assists and one rebound in 30 minutes off the bench . For the Pacers , George Hill was the player of the game . He went 8 - for - 12 for 20 points and 6 assists to go along with three rebounds and one block in 26 minutes . It was a season - high in points for Hill , who 's averaging 16 points and 5 assists on the year . Roy Hibbert recorded a 16 - point ( 8 - 11 FG , 5 - 7 FT ) , 12 - rebound , three - block and three - steal line . He was able to get to the free throw line a game - high 12 times , converting on eight of those attempts . David West chipped in with 14 points , seven rebounds , three assists and two steals in 31 minutes . Rodney Stuckey started in place of the injured Paul George ( ankle ) and finished with eight points ( 4 - 6 FG , 1 - 1 3PT ) and five assists in 22 minutes . With this win , the Pacers have now won three of their last four games . They 'll look to keep it rolling on the road against the New York Knicks on Friday . Meanwhile , the Pistons will look to end their losing streak on Friday against the Brooklyn Nets .

The Houston Rockets defeated the host New York Knicks , 116 - 111 , at Madison Square Garden on Wednesday . The Rockets ( 7 - 10 ) came in to Wednesday 's contest on the second night of a back - to - back , having dropped their previous two contests by a combined nine points . However , they were able to bounce back with a big road win over the Knicks ( 8 - 11 ) , thanks in large part to the play of All-Star point guard James Harden . Harden led the way with 26 points , nine assists , seven rebounds and two steals on 10 - of - 28 shooting from the field . He also added seven rebounds , two steals and a block . His backcourt partner in the backcourt , Trevor Ariza , added 16 points and seven rebounds of his own , while Clint Capela posted an 18 - point , 11 - rebound double - double that also included three steals . Dwight Howard was solid in his return to the starting lineup , posting 14 points , six rebounds and a pair of assists . The Knicks , meanwhile , were led by Arron Afflalo 's game - high 31 points , which he supplemented with seven boards , three assists and a steal . Kristaps Porzingis was next with 20 points , 13 rebounds , an assist , a steal and two blocks . Lance Thomas posted 15 points , three boards and a trio of steals , while Jose Calderon , who 's been filling in admirably for the injured Carmelo Anthony ( ankle ) , tallied seven points , five rebounds , five assists and five steals . The bench was led by a pair off the bench by Brandon Jennings and Willy Hernangomez , who supplied 14 and 12 points , respectively . New York managed to shoot a respectable 58 percent from the floor , but struggled from long range , hitting just 33 percent of their shots from beyond the arc . Up next , the Rockets will head home Friday to take on the 76ers , while the Knicks will stay home Friday and go up against the Heat .

The Mavericks were able to hold off the Nets in this one , despite being out - scored 29 - 17 in the fourth quarter . The Nets were up by as many as 17 points in the third quarter , but the Mavericks came out strong in the final period , out - scoring the Nets 29 - 29 to finish the game . Despite the loss , the Mavericks were the superior shooters in this game , going 54 percent from the field , while the Nets finished at 43 percent . Dirk Nowitzki led the Mavericks in scoring with 23 points ( 9 - 17 FG , 3 - 6 3Pt , 2 - 3 FT ) and nine rebounds , while also adding nine assists and one steal . It was a season - high in points for him , as he 's now pushed his season averages to 17 points and 8 rebounds per game . Harrison Barnes was also a big factor in the win , finishing with 19 points ( 8 - 15 FG , 1 - 1 3PT ) and six rebounds . He 's had a nice stretch of three games , combining for 40 points and 12 rebounds over that span . Wesley Matthews was the other starter to reach double figures in points . He finished with 15 points ( 5 - 9 FG ) , five rebounds and three assists . Coming off the bench , J.J. Barea had one of his best games of the season . He went 8 - for - 12 from the floor to score 20 points , while adding seven assists and two steals . It marked his second 20 - point game in a row , a stretch where he has averaged 17 points , 7 assists and 2 steals . The only other Maverick in double figures was Devin Harris , who finished with 11 points ( 4 - 6 FG ) and two rebounds in 17 minutes . Brook Lopez led the way for the Nets . He was able to record 27 points and seven rebounds , giving him his second double - double of the year . Lopez has now scored 20 or more points in four of his last five games , as the Nets are finally starting to find some consistency . Trevor Booker also had a solid showing off the pine . He had 18 points ( 6 - 7 FT ) , two rebounds and seven assists in 30 minutes . The other two Nets who reached double figures were Randy Foye ( 11 points ) and Caris LeVert ( five points ) . Both Jeremy Lin and Rondae Hollis-Jefferson struggled with their shot , as they combined for just 16 points on 5 - of - 25 shooting . The Mavs ' next game will be on the road against the Charlotte Hornets on Wednesday , while Nets will be at home against the Philadelphia 76ers on Wednesday .
The Miami Heat ( 46 - 32 ) defeated the Chicago Bulls ( 39 - 40 ) 106 - 98 on Wednesday at American Airlines Arena in Miami . The Heat were able to hold off the Bulls in this one , as they came out firing on all cylinders in the first half . In fact , they outscored the Bulls 21 - 6 in the second quarter and 35 - 19 in the third quarter to take a double - digit lead heading into the fourth . The Bulls were never able to get it within double - digits in the fourth quarter , as the Heat went on to outscore the Bulls 31 - 23 in the final period to seal the win . The win brings the Heat within two games of the final playoff spot in the Eastern Conference standings , while the Bulls are now just a half - game ahead of the eighth place Atlanta Hawks . The loss puts the Bulls just a game and a half behind the Heat for the eighth spot , but they still hold the tiebreaker over the Heat , so it was n't all bad news for Chicago . Jimmy Butler led the way for the Bulls , as he tallied 25 points ( 7 - 17 FG , 1 - 4 3Pt , 10 - 10 FT ) , six assists and one block in 40 minutes of action . Pau Gasol recorded another double - double , finishing with 21 points and 12 rebounds in 33 minutes . Derrick Rose was the only other player to score in double figures for Chicago , totaling 17 points , three rebounds , three assists and two steals in 36 minutes . Up next , the Bulls will head home Friday to take on the 76ers , while Miami will stay home Friday and play the Trail Blazers .
The Sacramento Kings ( 27 - 42 ) defeated the New York Knicks ( 28 - 43 ) 88 - 80 on Wednesday at Madison Square Garden in New York . The Knicks came out strong in this one , out - scoring the Kings 12 - 12 in the first quarter and 12 - 6 in the second quarter , but the Kings responded with a strong second quarter to take the lead and eventually pull away in the fourth . The Kings were able to out - score the Knicks 19 - 15 in the final quarter to secure the victory and keep their playoff hopes alive . DeMarcus Cousins led the way for the Kings , finishing with 24 points ( 11 - 23 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt ) , 20 rebounds and two blocked shots in 37 minutes . Rudy Gay was the only other starter to score in double figures , as he finished with 17 points ( 8 - 21 FG ) and four rebounds in 39 minutes . Rajon Rondo struggled shooting the ball , going 1 - 5 from the field and 0 - 1 from the three - point line , but still finished with six rebounds , six assists and two steals in 34 minutes . Darren Collison added 13 points ( 4 - 13 FG , 3 - 5 3PT , 2 - 2 FT ) , three rebounds and six assists in 40 minutes . Robin Lopez led the Knicks in scoring with 23 points ( 9 - 20 FG , 5 - 7 FT ) and grabbed 20 rebounds in 38 minutes . Kristaps Porzingis finished with 13 points and seven rebounds in 35 minutes . Justin Holiday came off the bench to score 14 points ( 6 - 15 FG ) , to go along with two assists , two rebounds , two steals and one block in 27 minutes . Up next , the Knicks will stay home to take on the 76ers on Friday , while the Kings will head home to play the Nets on Friday .
The Denver Nuggets ( 11 - 16 ) defeated the New York Knicks ( 14 - 13 ) 127 - 114 on Wednesday at the Pepsi Center in Denver . The Nuggets got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Knicks 33 - 22 in the first quarter . They were able to hold on to that lead for the rest of the way , as they went on to out - score the Knicks by 16 points in the second and third quarters . They shot 56 percent from the field and 37 percent from three - point range , while the Knicks shot 44 percent from beyond the arc and 35 percent from long range . This was a wire - to - wire win for the Nuggets , who have now won three of their last four games . Emmanuel Mudiay was the player of the game , as he led the team with 22 points ( 10 - 15 FG , 2 - 3 3Pt ) , seven rebounds and five assists . He 's now averaging 16 points and 5 assists on the season . Wilson Chandler had a solid game as well , scoring 12 points ( 5 - 14 FG ) and grabbing three rebounds in 27 minutes . He was able to get to the free throw line a game - high 17 times , converting on 10 - of - 10 attempts . Danilo Gallinari and Gary Harris each scored 13 points , while Nikola Jokic recorded 10 points and nine rebounds in 20 minutes . The Knicks were led by Carmelo Anthony , who went 10 - for - 14 from the floor to score 29 points , to go along with four rebounds , three assists and one steal . It was his second game in a row with at least 20 points and five rebounds . Kristaps Porzingis also had 22 points and eight rebounds , while Brandon Jennings chipped in 14 points ( 7 - 19 FG , 1 - 6 3PT , 7 - 7 FT ) , eight rebounds and three steals . The only other player to score in double digits for the Knicks was Willy Hernangomez , who finished with 17 points , nine rebounds and two assists in 28 minutes off the bench . Up next , the Nuggets will stay home to take on the Timberwolves on Friday , while New York will head home to play the Pacers on Friday .
The Miami Heat defeated the Atlanta Hawks , 105 - 87 , at American Airlines Arena on Wednesday . The Heat ( 27 - 21 ) came into Wednesday 's contest on the second night of a back - to - back , and they showed why they 're still considered one of the hottest teams in the Eastern Conference . The team shot 48 percent from the field and 25 percent from three - point range en route to a season - high 105 points on 48 percent shooting overall . Miami also held a 47 - 31 advantage in the rebounding column and held the Hawks to just 39 percent shooting and 23 percent from beyond the arc . All five members of the Heat 's first unit scored in double figures , led by Chris Bosh 's 18 points , which he supplemented with seven rebounds and two assists . Dwyane Wade was right behind him with 17 points , eight assists , four rebounds , two steals and one block . Luol Deng and Amar'e Stoudemire turned in matching 17 - point efforts , with the former also hauling in four boards , dishing out three assists and recording two steals , and the latter posting a 12 - rebound double - double . Hassan Whiteside led the bench with 10 points , nine boards , two blocks and one steal . The Hawks ( 27 22 ) , meanwhile , were led by Paul Millsap 's 17 points and five rebounds . Al Horford was the only other member of the starting five with double - digit scoring , posting 17 points . Jeff Teague was next with 15 points , six assists , two rebounds , one block and one three - pointer . Kent Bazemore posted a modest eight points but did haul in 10 rebounds , dished out an assist and recorded a steal . Tim Hardaway , Jr. led the second unit with 11 points , three rebounds and one assist . Dennis Schroder was productive in a reserve role as well , posting a 10 - point , 10 - rebound performance over 20 minutes . The two teams reconvene on Friday night in Atlanta for the second game of a home - and - home set .
The Washington Wizards ( 15 - 16 ) defeated the Orlando Magic ( 19 - 14 ) 103 - 91 on Wednesday at the Verizon Center in Washington D.C . The Wizards got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Magic 24 - 21 in the first quarter . They were able to hold on to that lead for the rest of the way , as they went on to out - score the Magic 31 - 19 in the second quarter to take a 20 - point lead heading into the half . The Magic were n't able to keep up with the Wizards in the third quarter , where they shot 47 percent from the field and 25 percent from three - point range , while the Wizards hit 47 percent of their shots from the floor and 31 percent from beyond the arc . John Wall led the way for the Wizards , as he finished with 24 points ( 10 - 19 FG , 0 - 3 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) , 13 assists , two rebounds , two steals and one block , in 39 minutes . He 's now averaging 24 points and 8 assists on the season . Otto Porter had a double - double of his own , finishing with 20 points ( 9 - 20 FG , 2 - 8 3PT ) , 11 rebounds and four steals , in 38 minutes . Marcin Gortat finished with 10 points ( 5 - 10 FG , 5 - 9 FT ) and 14 rebounds , along with two assists , one steal and one blocked shot , in 35 minutes . Garrett Temple chipped in 11 points ( 4 - 10 ) , three assists and one rebound , in 29 minutes , while Kelly Oubre , Jr. added 13 points , five rebounds , four assists and two steals . Tobias Harris had a solid all - around game for the Magic , with 13 points and 10 rebounds , to go along with three assists , in 36 minutes . Aaron Gordon was the only other Magic player to reach double figures in points . He finished with 20 ( 8 - 18 FG ) , five assists , four steals and three rebounds , in 31 minutes off the bench . Nikola Vucevic finished with 14 points ( 7 - 16 FG ) and seven rebounds , while Evan Fournier added 11 points and three assists . Up next , the Wizards will stay home to take on the 76ers on Friday , in what will be their second game of a back - to - back set . Orlando will look to get back on track Friday , when they travel to New York to play the Knicks . They 'll be right back in action Saturday .
The Sacramento Kings ( 13 - 17 ) defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves ( 9 - 20 ) 109 - 105 on Wednesday at the Target Center in Minneapolis . Zach LaVine led the way for the Timberwolves , scoring a game - high of 40 points on 13 - of - 21 shooting from the field , while also adding six rebounds and two assists in 39 minutes . Karl-Anthony Towns was the only other Timberwolve to score in double figures , as he finished with 20 points ( 7 - 15 FG , 1 - 5 3Pt , 5 - 6 FT ) , to go along with 13 rebounds and five assists in 38 minutes . The Kings were the superior shooters in this game , going 53 percent from the floor , while the Timberwolves finished at 46 percent . DeMarcus Cousins was the star of the show for the Kings . He finished with 32 points , seven rebounds , seven assists , four steals and two blocked shots in 37 minutes . He 's now averaging 27 points , 10 rebounds and 7 assists on the year . Matt Barnes was the other starter to reach double figures in points . He had 10 points ( 4 - 6 FG , 2 - 4 3PT ) , five rebounds , five assists and three steals in 32 minutes . Darren Collison started at point guard in place of Rudy Gay , who sat out with an ankle injury . Collison finished with three points and six assists in 20 minutes . Willie Cauley-Stein led the bench with 15 points ( 5 - 11 FG ) , three rebounds , four assists and two steals in 28 minutes . Up next , the Kings will head home to take on the Trail Blazers on Friday . The Timberwolves will look to bounce back on Friday when they play the Bulls in Chicago .
The Washington Wizards defeated the San Antonio Spurs , 102 - 99 , at Verizon Center on Saturday . The Wizards ( 3 - 1 ) were expected to win this game easily and they left no doubt with this dominating victory . In fact , Washington led for the entirety of the second half , as they held a double - digit lead for the final 30 - plus minutes . Shooting was the key difference , with the Wizards shooting 48 percent from the field and 35 percent from three - point range , while holding the Spurs to 46 percent shooting and 32 percent from long range . The assist - to - turnover ratio was decisive as well , with Washington recording 27 assists to 10 turnovers , while San Antonio committed 20 turnovers to just 21 assists . The Spurs were led by Kawhi Leonard , who tallied 23 points and nine rebounds in the defeat . LaMarcus Aldridge was the only other starter in double figures , as he totaled 10 points and 15 rebounds . Tony Parker finished with 17 points , two rebounds and four assists . Manu Ginobili came off the bench to provide 12 points and two rebounds . On deck for the Spurs is a home matchup against the New Orleans Pelicans on Monday . This marks Washington 's first win of the season and they 'll look to keep it rolling against the Oklahoma City Thunder on Monday in their next game .
