The Denver Nuggets ( 31 - 42 ) defeated the Los Angeles Lakers ( 15 - 57 ) 116 - 105 on Wednesday at the Staples Center in Los Angeles . The Nuggets were able to hold off the Lakers in this one , as they out - scored them 34 - 28 in the fourth quarter to secure the victory in front of their home crowd . The Lakers came into this game as a double - digit favorite , but it took a late run by the Nuggets to pull out the win . In fact , Denver outscored the Lakers 33 - 28 over the final 12 minutes , as that was the difference in the game . Despite being out - rebounded 48 - 43 , the Nuggets were still able to out - shoot the Lakers 48 percent to 44 percent from the field and out - assist them 31 to 23 . This was a huge win for the Nuggets , as it gives them a hold on the eighth spot in the west with just a half - game lead over the eighth - place Thunder . The bench was huge as well , as Will Barton led the team with 20 points ( 6 - 9 FG , 5 - 7 3Pt , 3 - 6 FT ) , eight assists and three rebounds in 27 minutes . Joffrey Lauvergne was the only other Nugget in double figures , as he finished with 18 points ( 7 - 11 FG , 0 - 1 3PT ) , five assists , four rebounds and five steals in 26 minutes off the bench . The only other player to reach double figures was Jamal Murray , who finished with 16 points , five rebounds and four assists in 28 minutes . Julius Randle recorded a triple - double in the loss , as his 13 points , 18 rebounds and 10 assists were all career - highs . Jordan Clarkson was the other starter to reach the 20 - point mark , as the starting point guard . Clarkson finished with 20 of his own , while also adding four rebounds , one assist and one steal in 35 minutes of action . Nick Young and Lou Williams both scored 14 points a piece , with Young adding three rebounds , three assists and two steals , while Williams added three assists , two steals and one block in 30 minutes . Next , the Lakers will look to get out of this slide on Friday , when they play the Utah Jazz on the road in their next scheduled game . This loss snapped a three - game winning streak for the Lakers , but they 'll look to bounce back on Friday in a home matchup against the Phoenix Suns .

The Portland Trail Blazers ( 33 - 28 ) defeated the New York Knicks ( 25 - 37 ) 104 - 85 on Monday at Madison Square Garden in New York . The Trail Blazers came into this game as a double - digit favorite and they did n't disappoint , as they held the Knicks to just 38 percent shooting from the field and 29 percent from three - point range . The Blazers were the superior shooters in this game , going 42 percent from the floor and 40 percent from long range , while the Knicks went 38 percent from beyond the arc and just 29 percent on their end . The Knicks were also out - rebounded 55 - 46 , giving the Trail Blazers even more of an advantage . Damian Lillard and C.J . McCollum carried the load for the Blazers . Lillard finished with 30 points ( 8 - 18 FG , 4 - 9 3Pt , 10 - 10 FT ) , four rebounds and six assists , while C. J . McCllum added 25 points ( 10 - 19 FG , 2 - 3 3PT , 3 - 3 FT ) and three rebounds of his own . It was a season - high in points for Lillard , who 's now averaging 28 points and 6 assists on the year . McCallum on the other hand went 10 - for - 19 from the free throw line and finished with 25 points , three rebounds and two assists . Meyers Leonard was the only other Blazer in double figures , as he finished with 11 points and 14 rebounds off the bench . Carmelo Anthony did his best to keep the Knicks in the game , but it was n't enough to get the win . Anthony finished with 23 points and 10 rebounds , while Kristaps Porzingis added 11 points ( 4 - 10 FG , 1 - 2 3PT ) , seven rebounds and three blocked shots . The only other Knick to reach double figures in points was Arron Afflalo , who finished with 13 points ( 6 - 9 FG ) , six rebounds and one assist in 36 minutes . Derrick Williams had a nice all - around game for the Knicks , scoring 11 points , grabbing nine rebounds and dishing out an assist in 25 minutes . The loss snapped a four - game winning streak for the Trail Blazer 's , who are now just a half - game ahead of the Miami Heat for the eighth and final playoff spot in the Western Conference . Up next , the Blazers will head home Wednesday to take on the Heat , while New York will head to Boston on Wednesday to go up against the Celtics .

The Golden State Warriors ( 10 - 2 ) defeated the Oklahoma City Thunder ( 3 - 12 ) 91 - 86 on Wednesday at Chesapeake Energy Arena in Oklahoma City . The Warriors were the superior shooters in this game , going 36 percent from the field and 28 percent from three - point range , while the Thunder finished at just 36 percent shooting from the floor and 18 percent from beyond the arc . The Thunder were also out - rebounded 52 - 52 , giving the Warriors a 57 - 57 advantage on the glass . The assist - to - turnover ratio was the difference in the game , with the Warriors recording 26 assists to nine turnovers and the Thunder committing 11 turnovers to just 13 assists . Reggie Jackson led the way for the Thunder , going 10 - for - 26 for a team - high of 22 points , while also adding 11 rebounds and eight assists . It was his second double - double in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 17 points and 12 rebounds per game . He 's now averaging 16 points and 10 rebounds on the season . Serge Ibaka was the only other Thunder player in double figures , finishing with 16 points ( 5 - 17 FG , 0 - 2 3Pt , 6 - 6 FT ) , eight rebounds and five blocked shots in 34 minutes . It marked his second straight game with double - digit rebounds , a trend he continues to show signs of continuing with the Thunder . Enes Kanter had a nice game off the bench , posting 16 points , 11 rebounds , two steals and one block in 33 minutes . The only other player to reach double figures for points was Steven Adams , who finished with 10 points ( 4 - 7 FG , 2 - 2 FT ) and six rebounds in 26 minutes . For the Warriors , it was a big night for the bench production . Marreese Speights led the team with 28 points ( 11 - 18 FG ) , seven rebounds and two assists in just 25 minutes . He was able to get to the free throw line 18 times , converting on 11 - of - 18 attempts . Klay Thompson finished with 20 points ( 6 - 20 FG , 4 - 11 3PT ) and eight rebounds in 38 minutes . Draymond Green recorded 10 points , nine rebounds , six assists , two blocks and one steal in 40 minutes . Stephen Curry finished with 15 points , six rebounds and six assists of his own , but struggled shooting the ball , going just 5 - for- 15 from deep . The other three starters scored in double digits for the Warriors as well , with Curry , Thompson and Andre Iguodala combining for 29 points . Golden State 's next game will be on the road against the Los Angeles Clippers on Friday , while Oklahoma City will travel to San Antonio to play the Spurs on Friday .
The Atlanta Hawks ( 41 - 29 ) defeated the Houston Rockets ( 35 - 35 ) 109 - 97 on Wednesday at Philips Arena in Atlanta . The Hawks were the superior shooters in this game , going 50 percent from the field and 37 percent from three - point range , while the Rockets went just 39 percent from beyond the arc and 22 percent from long range . The Rockets were also out - rebounded by the Hawks 51 - 40 , giving them just enough of an advantage to pull out the win . Despite the loss , the Rockets were still able to force the Hawks into 17 turnovers , which may have been the difference in the game . Dwight Howard recorded a double - double , finishing with eight points and 17 rebounds in 35 minutes . He also recorded four steals and four blocks . Eric Gordon was the high - point man for the Rockets , as he went off for 30 points ( 12 - 18 FG , 6 - 6 FT ) and nine rebounds in 28 minutes off the bench . James Harden finished with 25 points ( 7 - 17 FG , 3 - 5 3Pt , 8 - 8 FT ) , six rebounds and eight assists in 37 minutes . The only other player to score in double digits for Houston was Donatas Motiejunas , who finished with 13 points ( 4 - 9 FG , 0 - 3 3PT ) . Up next , the Hawks will look to keep their playoff hopes alive , as they travel to New Orleans to take on the Pelicans on Friday night . For the Rockets it was a disappointing loss , but they still have plenty of time to make up for it , as the Rockets are just a half - game behind the Thunder for the eighth and final playoff spot in the Western Conference . Al Horford led the Hawks in scoring with 22 points ( 10 - 19 FG , 2 - 5 2Pt ) , nine rebounds and two blocked shots in 33 minutes . Paul Millsap finished with 11 points ( 5 - 11 FG ) , 10 rebounds , six assists and two blocks , while Jeff Teague added five points ( 2 - 7 FG ) and seven assists in 25 minutes . Tim Hardaway , Jr. led the team in scoring off of the bench , going 7 - for - 11 for 20 points , while also adding three rebounds in 20 minutes . Dennis Schroder chipped in 14 points , four assists , one rebound and one steal in 22 minutes , while Kyle Korver added 11 points , two rebounds and three assists in 36 minutes . Next up for the Hawks is a road matchup against the New Orleans Pelicans on Saturday night . This will be the second night of a back - to - back , with both games taking place on the road .

The Heat were able to use a strong second half where they out - scored the Bulls 57 - 46 to secure the victory and end their four - game losing streak . He 's now averaging 24 points and 7 rebounds on the season . Pau Gasol did his best to keep the Bulls in the game . He finished with 19 points ( 9 - 18 FG ) , 17 rebounds , two assists and two blocked shots in 37 minutes . It was his second double - double in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 19 points and 17 rebounds . Jimmy Butler struggled shooting the ball , going 5 - 15 from the field and 1 - 1 from the three - point line , but still finished with 13 points , six rebounds and four assists in 40 minutes . Nikola Mirotic came off the bench to score 15 points ( 6 - 11 FG ) and grab eight rebounds in 22 minutes . Derrick Rose was held to just four points ( 2 - 6 FG ) in 13 minutes , but he did dish out a team - high six assists and recorded three steals in that time . The Bulls ' next game will be on the road against the Orlando Magic on Wednesday , while the Heat will be at home against the New York Knicks on Wednesday .

The Dallas Mavericks defeated the Portland Trail Blazers , 132 - 120 , at American Airlines Center on Wednesday . The Mavericks ( 35 - 35 ) have been dominant at home this season , and Wednesday 's blowout of the Trail Blazers ( 36 - 34 ) was no different . Dallas shot 55 percent from the field and 60 percent from three - point range , while holding Portland to 40 percent shooting and 39 percent from long range . Dirk Nowitzki led the way for the Mavs with 40 points , eight rebounds , four assists and two steals on 16 - of - 26 shooting . Deron Williams added 31 points , 16 assists , three rebounds and three steals , while Raymond Felton chipped in 11 points , two rebounds , an assist and a steal . Wesley Matthews added 15 points , five rebounds , three assists and a trio of steals . The Blazers were led by C.J . McCollum 's 22 points , which he supplemented with eight assists , a rebound , two steals and a block . Damian Lillard was right behind him with a 26 - point , eight - assist , four - rebound , five - steal effort that also included five turnovers . Mason Plumlee was next with a near double - double with 14 points , 19 rebounds , two assists , one steal and one block . Al-Farouq Aminu supplied 12 points , six rebounds and five assists . Meyers Leonard paced the bench with 24 points , four rebounds , five assists and one steal . Allen Crabbe was productive in a reserve role as well with 13 points , 14 rebounds , one assist , six blocks . The Trail Blazers remain in third place in the Western Conference 's Northwest Division , and are currently slotted in the seventh seed as well . They head to Houston to take on the Rockets on Friday night . Nowitzky 's 40 points led all scorers , a total he complemented with eight rebounds and four assists . Williams followed with a game - high 16 assists and three rebounds . Felton and Wesley Matthews turned in a pair of 11 - point efforts , with the former adding two rebounds and one assist and the latter supplying five boards and three assists . Zaza Pachulia went scoreless over five minutes before exiting with a sprained ankle and did not return . Devin Harris led the second unit with nine points , three boards and two assists . Dallas remains in fourth place and is a half - game behind the eighth - seeded Houston Rockets . They 're home again on Saturday night for a showdown with the Golden State Warriors .

The Hawks were able to hold off a late charge from the Celtics in the fourth quarter to secure the hard - fought victory in front of their home crowd . The Celtics came into this game as a double - digit favorite and nearly pulled out a wire - to - wire win , but were unable to do so as the Hawks outscored them 30 - 15 in the final 12 minutes . The Brooklyn Nets ( 16 - 42 ) defeated the Phoenix Suns ( 14 - 44 ) 116 - 106 on Monday at Talking Stick Resort Arena in Phoenix . The Nets were able to pull away in the fourth quarter , out - scoring the Suns 26 - 35 to secure the victory in front of their home crowd . The Suns came into this game as a double - digit favorite , but the Nets came out firing on all cylinders in this one . They out - scored the Suns 34 - 29 in the first quarter and held them to just 16 points in the second quarter , which was the difference in the game . Brooklyn shot 49 percent from the field and 44 percent from beyond the arc , while the Suns shot 43 percent from both the floor and from three - point range . Bojan Bogdanovic led the way for the Nets , going 8 - for - 16 from the floor to score 24 points , while also adding four steals . He 's now averaging 17 points and 5 rebounds on the season . Thaddeus Young was also a big factor in the win , finishing with 18 points ( 8 - 11 FG , 2 - 2 FT ) , eight rebounds and seven steals . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 40 points and 20 rebounds over those two games . Donald Sloan had a solid all - around game as well , recording 13 points ( 3 - 6 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt , 7 - 10 FT ) and nine rebounds . He also had six assists and four steals in just 24 minutes . The only other starter to reach double figures in points was Brook Lopez , who finished with 12 points ( 4 - 10 FG , 4 - 6 FT ) . Coming off the bench , Quincy Acy was a huge factor in this win . He finished with 16 points and three rebounds in 25 minutes . Isaiah Whitehead was the only other player to score in double figures for the Suns . He scored a season - high of 30 points ( 12 - 23 FG , 5 - 13 3PT , 1 - 1 FT ) to go along with 11 rebounds and one assist in 30 minutes . Tyson Chandler recorded a 12 - point ( 5 - 9 FG ) and 11 - rebound double double , while Ronnie Price added 16 points ( 7 - 14 FG ) , four steals and two assists . He did have four turnovers though , so it was n't all good for the point guard . Brandon Knight was the other Suns ' bench player in double - figures . He had 13 points and six rebounds in 17 minutes , while Mirza Teletovic had 10 points and five rebounds in 20 minutes . Despite the loss , the Nets have now won four of their last five games , as they continue to climb up the Eastern Conference standings . They 're currently in fourth place in the Atlantic Division , and have a hold of the eighth seed in the conference as well . They head to San Antonio to take on the Spurs on Wednesday .
The Golden State Warriors ( 20 ) defeated the Portland Trail Blazers ( 0 - 2 ) 110 - 99 on Wednesday at Oracle Arena in Oakland . The Warriors got off to a quick start in this game , out - scoring the Trail Blazers 21 - 21 in the first quarter . The Trail Blazers were able to make a run in the second quarter , cutting the lead to four points , but the Warriors responded with a 34 - 12 run of their own to put the game out of reach . Klay Thompson led the way for the Warriors , scoring 27 points ( 7 - 20 FG , 5 - 14 3Pt , 8 - 8 FT ) , to go along with three rebounds and three assists , in 40 minutes . Draymond Green recorded a double - double with 17 points and 14 rebounds , along with seven assists , four blocks and one steal , in 41 minutes . Shaun Livingston chipped in 14 points ( 6 - 15 FG ) , four rebounds , four assists , one steal and one block , in 33 minutes , while Marreese Speights added 15 points , five rebounds and four assists in 32 minutes off the bench . For the Blazers , Damian Lillard and C.J . McCollum were the only two players to score in double figures , as Lillard finished with 25 points ( 8 - 21 FG , 6 - 11 3PT , 3 - 3 FT ) and six assists , while McCollun added 22 points ( 9 - 19 FG , 1 - 5 3PT ) , two assists , two rebounds and one blocked shot , in 39 minutes . Maurice Harkless and Al-Farouq Aminu each added 11 points , seven rebounds and two assists each , in 27 and 37 minutes , respectively . Up next , the Warriors will head to San Antonio to take on the Spurs on Friday , while the Blazers will stay home and go up against the Clippers on Friday .
The Houston Rockets defeated the Los Angeles Clippers , 115 - 109 , in Game 1 of the Western Conference first - round playoffs Saturday at Toyota Center to take a 1 - 1 series lead in the series . The Rockets were expected to win this game easily and they left no doubt with this dominating victory . The fourth quarter is where Houston made their mark , as they outscored the Clippers , 32 - 20 , in that 12 - minute stretch . The assist - to - turnover ratio was decisive , with the Rockets recording 20 assists to 14 turnovers , while the Clippers committed 20 turnovers to just 20 assists . Los Angeles was led by Blake Griffin , who tallied 34 points , 15 rebounds , four assists , one steal and one block . DeAndre Jordan finished with 16 points , 12 rebounds , two steals and two blocks . Jamal Crawford was the only other Clipper in double figures , as he provided 19 points , five rebounds , five assists and one steal off the bench . The Clippers will look to get back on track in Game 2 on Monday in Los Angeles . James Harden led the way for the Rockets , accumulating 32 points , seven assists , three rebounds , three steals and seven assists . Dwight Howard recorded a 24 - point , 16 - rebound double - double . Trevor Ariza finished with 15 points , 13 rebounds and two assists . Terrence Jones recorded 10 points , eight rebounds , one assist , three blocks and two steals . Houston 's next game will be on Monday against the Oklahoma City Thunder in the second half of a back - to back .
The Chicago Bulls defeated the Toronto Raptors , 108 - 92 , at United Center on Wednesday . The Bulls ( 42 - 28 ) checked in to Wednesday 's contest on the second night of a back - to - back , having dropped two straight and three of their last four . However , they were able to bounce back with a convincing victory over the Raptors ( 41 - 27 ) on the backs of a pair of standout performances from their young stars . Doug McDermott and Nikola Mirotic led the way with matching 29 - point efforts , with the former adding 11 rebounds and four blocks , and the latter supplying 11 rebounds , an assist and four steals . Mike Dunleavy followed with 21 points , while Pau Gasol posted a near double - double with 11 points , nine rebounds , six assists , a block and a steal . Aaron Brooks and Tony Snell supplied matching 11 - point tallies , while Joakim Noah turned in a modest but full stat line of eight points , 14 assists , 10 rebounds , a steal and a block . The Raptors were led by DeMar DeRozan 's 27 points , which he supplemented with seven rebounds and three assists . Greivis Vasquez and Terrence Ross were next with matching 11 points efforts , while Jonas Valanciunas ( five points ) and Amir Johnson ( eight points ) notably underwhelmed . Cory Joseph paced the second unit with 17 points , five assists , two rebounds , two steals and two blocks . Jonas Baynes was productive in a reserve role as well with 14 points , two boards , two assists and two steals . Up next , the Bulls head to Milwaukee to take on the Bucks on Friday night , while the Raptors head north of the border to tangle with the Brooklyn Nets on Friday evening as well .
The Los Angeles Lakers ( 4 - 3 ) defeated the Phoenix Suns ( 2 - 5 ) 119 - 108 on Wednesday at the Staples Center in Los Angeles . The Lakers got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Suns 23 - 15 in the first quarter . They were able to hold on to the lead for the rest of the way though , as the Suns were n't able to keep up with them in the second and third quarters . In the end , the Lakers out - scored the Suns 36 - 32 in the fourth quarter to seal the win . The Suns were led by Devin Booker , who scored a game - high of 39 points ( 13 - 29 FG , 3 - 7 3Pt , 10 - 10 FT ) , to go along with seven assists and three rebounds in 45 minutes . He 's now averaging 22 points and 7 assists on the year . T.J. Warren was the other starter to reach double figures in points , as he finished with 22 points ( 9 - 20 FG ) , six rebounds and three assists in 39 minutes . Eric Bledsoe finished with 19 points ( 7 - 14 FG , 0 - 4 3PT ) , two rebounds , two assists and two steals in 30 minutes . The only other player to score in double figures for the Suns was Jared Dudley , who finished with 10 points ( 3 - 6 FG , 1 - 3 3PT , 5 - 6 FT ) . Tyson Chandler recorded a double - double with nine points and 12 rebounds , while Brandon Knight chipped in five points and 11 rebounds in 18 minutes off the bench . Nick Young led the way for the Lakers , scoring 22 points on 8 - of - 14 shooting from the field , while also adding seven rebounds , one assist , one steal and one block in 36 minutes . Julius Randle finished with 18 points , five rebounds , four assists and one steal in 28 minutes . Timofey Mozgov added 14 points ( 6 - 9 FG , 2 - 3 FT ) and eight rebounds in 22 minutes , while Lou Williams added 18 points ( 8 - 16 FG ) and six rebounds in 30 bench minutes . D'Angelo Russell struggled shooting the ball , going 2 - for - 11 from the floor , but still finished with 11 points , six assists and five rebounds . The two teams will have a rematch on Friday in Phoenix for the second game of a back - to - back .
The San Antonio Spurs ( 53 - 9 ) defeated the Sacramento Kings ( 25 - 36 ) 104 - 94 on Wednesday at the AT & T Center in San Antonio . The Spurs were able to hold off the Kings in this one , despite being out - rebounded 46 - 33 by the Kings . They were the superior shooters in this game , going 49 percent from the field and 35 percent from beyond the arc , while the Kings finished at 46 percent shooting from the floor and 38 percent from deep . Kawhi Leonard led the Spurs in scoring with 25 points ( 9 - 24 FG , 1 - 5 3Pt , 6 - 7 FT ) , to go along with 13 rebounds and six assists , in 36 minutes . He 's now pushed his season averages to 22 points , 8 rebounds and 6 assists per game , as he continues to be a force to be reckoned with . Tony Parker struggled shooting the ball , going 1 - for - 6 on his way to only two points , but he did add seven assists , two rebounds and one block , in 32 minutes . The bench was huge for the Spurs , as Manu Ginobili finished with 22 points ( 8 - 11 FG ) and one rebound , in 15 minutes off the bench , while Patty Mills chipped in nine points ( 3 - 4 FG ) , nine rebounds and an assist , in 19 minutes . For the Kings , DeMarcus Cousins did everything he could to keep his team in the game . He went 10 - for- 20 from the three - point line and 10 - of - 15 from the free throw line to score a game - high of 31 points , while also adding nine rebounds , three assists and one steal , in 35 minutes . It was his second game in a row with at least 20 points and 10 rebounds . Quincy Acy finished with 16 points ( 7 - 7 FG , 2 - 2 FT ) and seven rebounds , in 31 minutes . Rajon Rondo finished with nine points , eight assists , eight rebounds and two steals , while Rudy Gay added nine points and four rebounds . Up next , the Spurs will stay at home and go up against the Golden State Warriors on Friday , while Sacramento will head home to take on the Los Angeles Clippers on Friday .
The Philadelphia 76ers defeated the Phoenix Suns , 120 - 105 , at Wells Fargo Center on Friday . The Sixers ( 3 - 10 ) have been struggling mightily on offense all season , but Joel Embiid 's 26 - point , seven - rebound , two - block performance on Friday night may have been the high - water mark of his young career . The big man has now scored at least 26 points in three of his last four games , and he 's done so while shooting over 50 percent from the field in each of those contests . Embiids shot 9 - of - 14 on his way to 26 points , while also adding seven rebounds , two assists and two blocks in the blowout win over the Suns . He 's now averaging 22 points , 8 rebounds and 2 blocks on the year . Embid has been a huge reason for the Sixers ' success this season , as he has been averaging 25 points , 9 rebounds and 6 assists per game . Sergio Rodriguez also had a big night , recording eight points , 11 assists and eight rebounds in 29 minutes . The 76ers shot 52 percent as a team from the floor and 49 percent from beyond the arc . Phoenix ( 4 - 11 ) has now lost four of their last five games , as they continue to slide down the standings . Eric Bledsoe led the way for the Suns with 27 points , six assists and five rebounds in the loss , but the rest of the team struggled to get anything going . The Suns shot just 42 percent from both the field and from three - point range , and the team hit just 62 percent of its free - throws . Brandon Knight led the team in scoring off the bench with 12 points , two rebounds and two assists in 21 minutes . Phoenix will look to bounce back as they play host to the Los Angeles Clippers on Sunday . Philadelphia will be in action again on Sunday as they host the New York Knicks .
The New Orleans Pelicans ( 21 - 33 ) defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves ( 20 - 34 ) 122 - 106 on Wednesday at the Target Center in Minneapolis . The Pelicans were the superior shooters in this game , going 60 percent from the field and 48 percent from beyond the arc , while the Timberwolves finished at 46 percent shooting from the floor and just 22 percent from three - point range . Despite being out - rebounded by the Timberwolves , the Pelicans were able to out - score them 43 - 34 in the paint , giving them just enough of an advantage to pull out the win . Anthony Davis was the star of the game , as he went 16 - for - 22 from the free - throw line and finished with a game - high of 42 points ( 16 - 22 FG , 2 - 3 3Pt , 8 - 11 FT ) , to go along with 13 rebounds , while also adding two assists , one steal and one block , in 36 minutes . Jrue Holiday was n't too far behind , finishing with 25 points ( 10 - 14 FG , 1 - 2 3PT , 4 - 4 FT ) and 12 assists , while adding six rebounds and five steals , in 38 minutes . Buddy Hield was the only other Pelican to reach double figures in points , with 17 , while Dante Cunningham added 12 points ( 4 - 8 FG , 3 - 5 3PT ) , four rebounds and one assist , in 37 minutes . Karl-Anthony Towns did everything he could to keep the Timberwolves in the game . He finished with 36 points and eight rebounds , in 39 minutes , while Andrew Wiggins added 29 points ( 11 - 17 FG , 6 - 7 FT ) of his own . Ricky Rubio recorded a double - double with 15 points ( 5 - 10 FG ) , 12 assists and four steals , while Gorgui Dieng chipped in eight points and nine rebounds . The only other player to score in double figures for the Timberwolves was Brandon Rush , who finished with nine points , in 25 minutes . The Timberwolves will look to get out of this rut on Friday , when they play the Oklahoma City Thunder on the road . For the Pelicans , they 'll look to extend their winning streak to three games , as they travel to Denver to take on the Nuggets on Friday .
The Houston Rockets ( 15 - 7 ) defeated the Los Angeles Lakers ( 10 - 14 ) 134 - 95 on Wednesday at the Toyota Center in Houston . The Rockets got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Lakers 43 - 27 in the first quarter and 39 - 24 in the second quarter . They were the superior shooters in this game , going 54 percent from the field and 42 percent from beyond the arc , while the Lakers finished at just 39 percent shooting from the floor and 25 percent from three - point range . James Harden led the way for the Rockets , going 8 - for - 14 from the point guard position to score a game - high of 25 points , while also adding seven assists , six rebounds and four steals . He 's now averaging 27 points , 8 assists and 4 steals on the year . Patrick Beverley had a double - double of his own , finishing with 10 points ( 4 - 9 FG , 2 - 6 3Pt ) , 12 assists and seven rebounds . He also had three steals and three steals . Clint Capela was the other starter to reach double figures in points , as he finished with 12 points ( 6 - 10 FG , 1 - 2 3Pts ) , nine rebounds , two assists , two steals and two blocked shots . The Lakers were led by Julius Randle , who went 9 - of - 19 from the free throw line to score 21 points , to go along with 10 rebounds and one assist . It was his second double - doubles in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 16 points and 10 rebounds per game . Lou Williams was the only other Lakers player in double figures , finishing as the team 's leading scorer with 24 points ( 7 - 12 FG ) , while adding six assists , three rebounds , one steal and one block . The only other player to score in double digits for the Lakers was Marcelo Huertas , who finished with 10 . He went 3 - for- 7 from the three point line and 0 - for 4 from the four - point line , to score 10 points . He did have seven assists and five steals , while Jordan Clarkson had a rough night shooting the ball , going just 3 - 13 FG , but still finished with seven points . Up next , the Rockets will stay at home to take on the Timberwolves on Friday , where they 'll look to extend their winning streak to four games . Meanwhile , the Lakers will look to end their losing streak at home against the Kings on Friday .
The Boston Celtics ( 32 - 18 ) defeated the Los Angeles Lakers ( 17 - 36 ) 113 - 107 on Wednesday at the TD Garden in Boston . The Celtics got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Lakers 29 - 30 right away in the first quarter . They went on to out - score the Lakers 31 - 23 in the second quarter , giving them the cushion they needed to coast to a much - needed victory in front of their home crowd . Jae Crowder added 18 points ( 6 - 12 FG , 2 - 7 3PT , 4 - 4 FT ) and six rebounds , while Al Horford chipped in 11 points ( 4 - 11 FG , 1 - 4 3PT ) , eight rebounds and eight assists , in 31 minutes . Jaylen Brown finished with 12 points ( 3 - 7 FG ) , seven rebounds and one assist , in 32 minutes . For the Lakers , D'Angelo Russell did everything he could to keep the Lakers in this game , as he finished with 20 points ( 8 - 20 FG , 0 - 2 3Pts , 2 of 2 FT ) 6 rebounds , six assists , one steal and one block , in 33 minutes . Nick Young finished with 17 points , three rebounds , three assists , two steals and one blocked shot , while Julius Randle added 14 points ( 5 - 10 FG , 3 - 9 3 Pt , 8 - 10 FT ) of his own , in 30 minutes off the bench . The only other player to score in double digits for the Lakers was Jordan Clarkson , who finished with 18 points , 11 rebounds and four assists , while Larry Nance Jr. added 11 rebounds , five steals and three blocks . The Lakers shot just 39 percent from the field and 37 percent from beyond the arc , as they were out - scored in the paint 52 - 47 . Up next , the Celtics will stay home to take on the Wizards on Friday , while the Lakers will head home to go up against the Heat on Friday .
The Golden State Warriors ( 64 - 7 ) defeated the Los Angeles Clippers ( 43 - 27 ) 114 - 98 on Wednesday at Oracle Arena in Oakland . The Warriors were the superior shooters in this game , going 45 percent from the field and 44 percent from three - point range , while the Clippers finished at 42 percent from both the floor and 29 percent from beyond the arc . The assist - to - turnover ratio was decisive as well , with the Warriors recording five more assists than the Clippers , while committing three less turnovers . The Clippers were led by DeAndre Jordan , who recorded a double - double with 19 points ( 7 - 10 FG , 5 - 10 FT ) and 20 rebounds , while also recording three assists and two blocks . Chris Paul struggled shooting the ball , going just 4 - of - 16 from the floor , but still finished with 13 points ( 4 - 16 FG , 1 - 6 3Pt , 4 - 5 FT ) , six rebounds and eight assists . Jamal Crawford was the only other Clipper to reach double figures in points , as he finished with 16 points and four rebounds in 24 minutes off the bench . Klay Thompson led all scorers for the Warriors , going 12 - for - 21 from the court and 7 - for- 10 from long range to score a game - high of 32 points , while adding four rebounds and three assists as well . Stephen Curry was n't far behind , finishing with 33 points ( 12 - 23 FG ) , four rebounds , five assists and three steals . Draymond Green recorded a 12 - point , 12 - rebound double double , to go along with four assists , two steals and two steals , while Harrison Barnes chipped in 11 points ( 3 - 11 FG , 2 - 4 3PT , 3 - 4 FT ) of his own . Marreese Speights and Andre Iguodala were the only bench players to score in double figures , as they scored 11 and 12 points respectively . With the win , the Warriors extended their winning streak to six games , while extending their home record to 64 - 1 . Next up , the Clippers will head to San Antonio to take on the Spurs on Friday , while Golden State will travel to Sacramento to play the Kings on Friday .
The Minnesota Timberwolves ( 3 - 6 ) defeated the Los Angeles Lakers ( 6 - 5 ) 125 - 99 on Wednesday at the Target Center in Minneapolis . The Timberwolves got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Lakers 36 - 27 in the first quarter alone . They were able to hold off the Lakers in the second and third quarters , where they out - scored them 69 - 48 . The Lakers were led by Julius Randle , who scored 14 points ( 5 - 8 FG , 1 - 1 3Pt , 3 - 5 FT ) , to go along with six rebounds and three assists in 28 minutes . He 's now averaging 14 points and 6 rebounds on the season . Nick Young was the only other Lakers starter to score in double figures , as he finished with nine points ( 3 for 9 FG , 3 for 7 3Pts ) , while also adding one assist and one steal in 24 minutes . The only other player to score double digits for the Lakers was Jordan Clarkson , who finished with 17 points ( 4 - 5 FG , 0 - 1 FT ) in 18 minutes off the bench . The Wolves were led in scoring by Andrew Wiggins , who went 14 - for - 21 from the field and 2 - for 5 from the three - point line to score 47 points , while adding four rebounds and one block in 41 minutes . It was his second straight game with at least 40 points , as the Timberwolves continue to ride his hot hand . Nemanja Bjelica was the other big scorer for the Timberwolves , as his 24 points ( 9 - 15 FG , 5 - 7 3PT , 1 1 FT , 1 ) , eight rebounds , three assists and three steals were a season - high . Karl-Anthony Towns recorded a double - double with 22 points ( 7 - 22 FG , 2 - 7 2Pt 6 - 10 FT ) and 12 rebounds , while Ricky Rubio recorded a 10 - point , 10 - assist triple - double in 34 minutes . With the win , the Timberwolves are now 2 - 2 in their last three games , as they continue to be one of the hottest teams in the Western Conference . They 'll look to keep it rolling on Friday in a road matchup against the Portland Trail Blazers . Meanwhile , the Lakers will look to get back on track on Friday against the New Orleans Pelicans in their next game .
The Los Angeles Clippers ( 10 ) defeated the San Antonio Spurs ( 0 - 1 ) 107 - 92 on Wednesday at the Staples Center in Los Angeles . The Clippers got off to a quick start in this game , out - scoring the Spurs 30 - 18 in the first quarter . They were able to hold on to the lead for the rest of the game , as they led by double - digits for the majority of the final three quarters . The Spurs made a run in the fourth quarter , but it was not enough to get the job done , as the Clippers outscored the Spurs 28 - 21 in the final period . The assist - to - turnover ratio was the decisive statistic , with the Clippers recording 16 assists to just 13 turnovers , while the Spurs committed 25 turnovers to just 25 assists . Chris Paul led the way for the Clippers , as he tallied 32 points , seven rebounds and six assists in the win . Blake Griffin finished with 26 points , 12 rebounds , six assists , three steals and three blocks . DeAndre Jordan recorded a double - double , totaling nine points , 14 rebounds and four blocks . Marreese Speights came off the bench to score 17 points on 7 - of - 10 shooting in 23 minutes . Kawhi Leonard was the high - point man for the Spurs , finishing with 18 points , six rebounds , three assists and four steals . Tim Duncan recorded 11 points , 11 rebounds , four assists , two blocks and one steal in 30 minutes . The only other player to score in double digits for San Antonio was Tony Parker , who finished with 10 points , two rebounds and one assist in 29 minutes . Up next , the Clippers will look to extend their winning streak to four games on Friday , when they host the Golden State Warriors , while San Antonio will head home to take on the Oklahoma City Thunder on Friday .

The Chicago Bulls ( 35 - 33 ) defeated the Utah Jazz ( 33 - 36 ) 92 - 85 on Wednesday at the United Center in Chicago . Derrick Rose led the Bulls in scoring with 22 points ( 10 - 15 FG , 2 - 2 3Pt ) , to go along with four assists and three rebounds , in 31 minutes . Taj Gibson added 15 points ( 7 - 9 FG , 1 - 1 FT ) and 10 rebounds , while Jimmy Butler chipped in 13 points ( 6 - 14 FG ) , five rebounds and six assists , in 33 minutes . The Bulls shot 49 percent from the field and 32 percent from three - point range , while the Jazz shot 41 percent ( 30 - 59 ) from the floor and 30 percent from long range . The Jazz were led by Derrick Favors , who finished with 24 points ( 11 - 18 FG ) and six rebounds , along with two blocked shots , in 36 minutes . Shelvin Mack was the only other Jazz player in double figures , as he finished with 15 points , eight assists and five rebounds . Rodney Hood added 14 points ( 5 - 17 FG , 3 - 10 3PT ) , three rebounds and one assist , in 38 minutes . Rudy Gobert was held to just two points ( 1 - 4 FG , 0 - 2 FT ) , seven rebounds , one assist and one steal , in 27 minutes . Next up , the Bulls will head to Milwaukee to take on the Bucks on Friday , in what will be the second half of a back - to - back for both teams . Utah , on the other hand , will stay home and go up against the Brooklyn Nets on Friday .
The Houston Rockets ( 38 - 17 ) defeated the Orlando Magic ( 20 - 34 ) 128 - 104 on Wednesday at the Toyota Center in Houston . The Rockets were the superior shooters in this game , going 49 percent from the field and 42 percent from beyond the arc , while the Magic finished at 48 percent shooting from the floor and just 24 percent from deep . This was a wire - to - wire win for the Rockets , as they led for the majority of the game . In fact , they led by at least 12 points for the entirety of the second half , as the Magic never led by more than seven points in the entire game . James Harden led the Rockets in scoring , as he finished with 25 points ( 6 - 21 FG , 3 - 10 3Pt , 10 - 14 FT ) , to go along with six rebounds and 13 assists , in 36 minutes . Trevor Ariza finished with 20 points ( 7 - 15 FG , 4 - 9 3PT , 2 - 3 FT ) and seven rebounds , while Clint Capela chipped in 17 points and nine rebounds , in 28 minutes . Eric Gordon came off the bench and went 5 - for - 10 from the three - point line to score 18 points , while also adding three rebounds , two assists and one block , in 30 minutes . For the Magic , Serge Ibaka led the way with 28 points ( 13 - 20 FG ) , eight rebounds and one blocked shot , in 41 minutes . Evan Fournier was the only other Magic player in double figures , finishing with 21 points , three rebounds and three assists , while Nikola Vucevic recorded a double - double with 14 points and 19 rebounds , along with four assists and three steals , in 29 minutes . Up next , the Rockets will stay home to take on the Timberwolves on Friday , in what will be their second game in as many nights . The Magic will look to get back on track Friday , when they play the Clippers in Los Angeles .
The Denver Nuggets ( 30 - 42 ) defeated the Philadelphia 76ers ( 9 - 63 ) 104 - 103 on Wednesday at the Pepsi Center in Denver . The Nuggets got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Sixers 24 - 10 in the first quarter and 29 - 10 the rest of the way . They were able to hold the lead for the majority of the game , but the Sixers battled back in the fourth quarter to make it a one - possession game with just over a minute to go . However , Emmanuel Mudiay was able to hit a clutch three - pointer at the buzzer to seal the win for the Nuggets . He finished with a game - high of 27 points ( 10 - 23 FG , 3 - 5 3Pt , 4 - 5 FT ) , to go along with 11 rebounds , four assists and one blocked shot , in 42 minutes . Nikola Jokic added 18 points ( 5 - 6 FG , 8 - 12 FT ) and eight rebounds of his own , in 27 minutes . Gary Harris chipped in 18 points and five rebounds , while Darrell Arthur added 11 points , seven rebounds and two steals , in 32 minutes . For the 76ers , it was Carl Landry who led the way with 16 points ( 6 - 11 FG ) and seven rebounds , in 24 minutes . Hollis Thompson added 14 points , three rebounds and one block , in 33 minutes , while the only other player to score in double digits for Philadelphia was Jahlil Okafor , who finished with 17 points ( 7 - 10 FG ) , five rebounds and five assists , in 20 minutes off the bench . The 76ers shot just 39 percent from the field and 41 percent from three - point range , as they were out - rebounded 46 - 46 . Up next , the Nuggets will stay home to take on the Timberwolves on Friday , in what will be the second half of a back - to - back for both teams . The Sixers will head home to go up against the Kings on Friday .
The Dallas Mavericks ( 21 - 10 ) defeated the Los Angeles Lakers ( 9 - 21 ) 102 - 98 on Wednesday at the American Airlines Center in Dallas . The Mavericks were able to hold off the Lakers in this one , as they out - scored the Lakers 30 - 20 in the fourth quarter to secure the victory . The Lakers were the superior shooters in this game , going 36 percent from the field , while the Mavericks went 51 percent . The assist - to - turnover ratio was the difference in the game , with the Mavericks recording 20 assists to just 13 turnovers and the Lakers committing 16 turnovers to just 20 assists . Rajon Rondo led the Mavericks in scoring , as he finished with a team - high of 21 points ( 10 - 17 FG , 1 - 1 3Pt , 0 - 2 FT ) , to go along with eight rebounds and seven assists , in 35 minutes . Tyson Chandler recorded a double - double with 15 points and 12 rebounds , while Dirk Nowitzki finished with 14 points ( 5 - 13 FG ) and eight rebounds , in 24 minutes . Monta Ellis chipped in 15 points ( 6 - 12 FG ) , seven assists and three steals , in 34 minutes . For the Lakers , it was a disappointing night for them , as the team shot just 36 percent ( 36 - 38 FG , 38 percent from three - point range ) , while giving up 16 turnovers . Nick Young led the team in scoring off the bench with 18 points , while also adding eight assists and five rebounds . Ed Davis was the only other starter in double figures , with 10 points ( 1 - 6 FG , 8 - 10 FT ) and 11 rebounds . Jordan Hill finished with 12 points and 10 rebounds in 27 minutes . Up next , the Mavericks will stay home to take on the 76ers on Friday , in what will be their second game in as many nights , while Los Angeles will head home to play the Suns on Friday .
The Los Angeles Clippers ( 10 ) defeated the Oklahoma City Thunder ( 0 - 2 ) 93 - 90 on Wednesday at the Staples Center in Los Angeles . The Clippers got off to a quick start in this game , out - scoring the Thunder 22 - 13 in the first quarter . The Thunder were able to make a run in the second quarter , but were unable to hold off the Clippers in the third quarter , where they out - scored the Thunder 28 - 24 . With Russell Westbrook struggling to find his shot , the Thunder were out - shot by the Clippers , who shot 39 percent from the field and 23 percent from three - point range . The assist - to - turnover ratio was the difference in the game , with the Clippers recording 11 assists to just 11 turnovers , while the Thunder committed 22 turnovers to just 23 assists . Chris Paul led the way for the Clippers with 22 points ( 9 - 18 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 3 - 7 FT ) , seven assists , four rebounds , three steals and one block , in 38 minutes . Blake Griffin finished with 23 points , seven rebounds and three assists , while DeAndre Jordan recorded a double - double with eight points and 10 rebounds , in 35 minutes . Marreese Speights chipped in 16 points ( 5 - 15 FG , 2 - 8 3PT , 4 - 4 FT ) and three steals , in 27 minutes off the bench . For the Thunder , it was a big night for Perry Jones , who scored a game - high 32 points on 10 - 17 shooting , including 3 - 6 from deep and 9 - 11 from the free throw line , in 42 minutes . Serge Ibaka finished with 17 points and nine rebounds , while Enes Kanter added 11 points ( 2 - 9 FG ) and seven assists . The only other player to score in double figures for the Thunder was Andre Roberson , who finished with nine points , six rebounds and four assists , in 37 minutes . Up next , the Clippers will travel to San Antonio to take on the Spurs on Friday , while Oklahoma City will stay home and play the Trail Blazers on Friday .
The Boston Celtics ( 10 ) defeated the Philadelphia 76ers ( 0 - 1 ) 112 - 95 on Monday at the TD Garden in Boston . The Celtics got off to a quick start in this game , out - scoring the Sixers by 12 in the first quarter , but the Sixers battled back to make it a two - point game heading into the fourth quarter . However , the Celtics were able to out - score the Sixers 33 - 28 in the final period to seal the win and take a 10 - point lead in the season series . Jahlil Okafor led the way for the 76ers with 26 points ( 10 - 16 FG , 6 - 6 FT ) and seven rebounds in 38 minutes . Nerlens Noel recorded a double - double with 14 points and 13 rebounds , while Isaiah Canaan added 18 points ( 6 - 14 FG , 4 - 10 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) , seven rebounds and two assists . The 76ers shot just 41 percent from the field and 32 percent from three - point range , while the Celtics shot 46 percent ( 33 - 96 ) from the floor and 33 percent from long range . Isaiah Canaan was the high - point man for the Sixers with 18 points , to go along with seven rebounds , two assists and one steal , in 37 minutes . The Sixers will look to get back on track on Wednesday when they play the second game of a back - to - back when they host the New York Knicks . Meanwhile , Marcus Smart and Kelly Olynyk led the Celtics in scoring with matching 13 - point efforts . Smart added five assists , two rebounds , and two steals , in 32 minutes . Jae Crowder chipped in 14 points ( 4 - 7 FG ) , six rebounds and three assists , in 31 minutes . Avery Bradley struggled shooting the ball , going 2 - for - 6 on his way to four points , in 33 minutes . Marcus Smart was the only other Boston player to score in double figures , as he finished with 13 points ( 3 - 8 FG , 3 - 6 3PT ) , along with two rebounds and five assists . Marcus Thornton led the team in scoring off the bench with 27 points , while also adding seven assists , three steals and one block , in 29 minutes . Jared Sullinger also had a solid game , with 15 points , seven boards , one assist and two blocks , in 20 minutes . Boston 's next game will be on the road against the New Orleans Pelicans on Wednesday . Both teams will be in action again on Wednesday , as the Celtics will travel to Charlotte to take on the Hornets and the Sixers will play the Charlotte Hornets in Charlotte .
The Los Angeles Lakers ( 4 - 21 ) defeated the Milwaukee Bucks ( 10 - 16 ) 113 - 95 on Wednesday at the Staples Center in Los Angeles . The Lakers got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Bucks 30 - 25 in the first quarter . They were able to hold on to that lead for the rest of the way , as they went on to finish the game shooting 46 percent from the field and 37 percent from three - point range , while the Bucks finished at 47 percent shooting from the floor and 31 percent from beyond the arc . Kobe Bryant led the Lakers in scoring with 22 points ( 7 - 15 FG , 3 - 7 3Pt , 5 - 5 FT ) , to go along with six assists and three rebounds , in 27 minutes . He 's now averaging 23 points and 8 assists on the season . Lou Williams was the other starter to reach double figures in points , as he finished with 16 points , while also adding four assists , three rebounds and one steal , in 32 minutes . Jordan Clarkson chipped in 12 points , six rebounds , three assists and two steals , in 33 minutes . Roy Hibbert recorded a double - double , with 12 points ( 5 - 9 FG , 2 - 3 FT ) and 11 rebounds , along with two assists and one blocked shot , in 24 minutes . Nick Young was huge off the bench for the Lakers , with 19 points , seven assists , four rebounds and three steals . The Bucks were led by the duo of Giannis Antetokounmpo and Malcolm Brogdon , who finished with 15 points ( 6 - 11 FG ) and 19 points ( 9 - 18 FG ) , in 35 minutes . It was their second game in a row with at least 20 points , after combining for 40 points on Sunday . Khris Middleton was the only other starter in double figures , finishing with 16 , while Jabari Parker added 12 points and four rebounds . The only other player to score in double digits for the Bucks was Mirza Teletovic , who added 10 points , eight rebounds and two assists , in 23 minutes off the Milwaukee bench . The loss snapped a three - game winning streak for the team , and they 'll look to get back on track on Friday , when they play host to the New Orleans Pelicans . Despite the loss , the Lakers ' bench did a great job , as Lou Williams , Jordan Clarkson and Nick Young all reached double figures . Clarkson finished with 14 points and 14 rebounds , while Young added 14 points , 14 rebounds and an assist , in 25 minutes . With this win the Lakers have now won three of their last four games , while they 've won their last three games overall . They 'll be off until Sunday when they host the Portland Trail Blazers for their next game .

The Wizards were the superior shooters in this game , going 49 percent from the field and 31 percent from three - point range , while the Jazz went just 39 percent from beyond the arc and 29 percent from long range . The Jazz were also out - rebounded by the Wizards 41 - 41 , giving them just enough of an advantage to pull out the victory . For the Jazz , Alec Burks was the high - point man , with 19 points , in 35 minutes . Gordon Hayward was the only other starter in double figures , as he went 4 - 14 from the floor and 0 - 3 from three point range to score 16 points , while also adding seven rebounds , three assists , one steal and one block , in 34 minutes . Up next , the Wizards will stay home to take on the 76ers on Friday , in what will be the second half of a back - to - back , while Utah will head home to play the Clippers on Friday .

The Pelicans got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Nets 16 - 16 in the first quarter . They went on to go on to out - score the Nets 34 - 15 in the second quarter , giving them enough of an advantage to coast to a much - needed victory in front of their home crowd . They shot 46 percent from the field and 41 percent from beyond the arc , while the Nets finished at 48 percent shooting from the floor and 45 percent from three - point range . Anthony Davis led the Pelicans in scoring with 20 points ( 9 - 22 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt ) , to go along with 16 rebounds and two blocked shots , in 40 minutes . Jrue Holiday came up big off the bench , as he finished with 24 points ( 8 - 15 FG , 5 - 9 3PT , 3 - 4 FT ) , six rebounds , five assists , two steals and one block , in 26 minutes . Joe Johnson finished with 10 points ( 4 - 10 FG , 2 - 6 3PT ) and seven rebounds , along with five assists and one steal , in 35 minutes . Up next , the Pelicans will look to extend their win streak to three games , as they play the second game of a back - to - back , when they travel to Memphis to take on the Grizzlies on Friday night . Meanwhile , the Nets will head home to play the Trail Blazers on Saturday night .
The Atlanta Hawks ( 34 - 28 ) defeated the Los Angeles Lakers ( 12 - 51 ) 106 - 77 on Wednesday at the Staples Center in Los Angeles . The Hawks were the superior shooters in this game , going 54 percent from the field and 46 percent from three - point range , while the Lakers finished at just 34 percent shooting from the floor and a meager 19 percent from beyond the arc . Atlanta also dominated the assist - to - turnover ratio , recording 31 assists to 10 turnovers , while committing only 10 turnovers to the Lakers ' 19 . Kyle Korver led the Hawks in scoring with 15 points ( 5 - 6 FG , 4 - 4 3Pt , 1 - 1 FT ) , while also adding five rebounds and three assists . He 's now averaging 16 points and 5 rebounds on the season . Jeff Teague was the other starter to reach double figures in points , finishing with 12 points ( 4 - 11 FG , 0 - 4 FT ) and eight assists . It was his second double - double in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 17 points and 8 assists per game . Paul Millsap and Kent Bazemore were the only other starters in double figures , as they each finished with 11 points and 10 points respectively . The Lakers were led by Julius Randle , who finished with 16 points ( 7 - 14 FG ) and 10 rebounds in 28 minutes . Randle has now scored 20 or more points in three of his last four games , as he continues to be one of the most consistent players on the Lakers . D'Angelo Russell struggled shooting the ball , going just 3 - for - 16 on his way to seven points , but he did add five assists and two rebounds in 30 minutes of action . Nick Young struggled shooting , going 1 - of - 9 from three point range and finishing with five points in 25 minutes . The only other Lakers player to score in double digits was Jordan Clarkson , who chipped in 12 points off the bench . Up next , the Hawks will head to San Antonio to take on the Spurs on Friday , while Los Angeles will stay home and go up against the Clippers on Friday .

Tucker chipped in 14 points and four rebounds , in 30 minutes , while Tyson Chandler added seven points and 13 rebounds , to go along with two steals , in 27 minutes . The host Oklahoma City Thunder defeated the Atlanta Hawks , 107 - 94 , at Chesapeake Energy Arena on Wednesday . The Thunder ( 14 - 8 ) have been dominant at home this season , and Wednesday 's win over the Hawks was no different . Oklahoma City shot 49 percent from the field and 53 percent from three - point range , while holding Atlanta to 45 percent shooting overall and 36 percent from long range . All five members of the Thunder 's starting five scored in double figures , with Kevin Durant leading the way with a 25 - point , 12 - rebound , 10 - assist double - double . Russell Westbrook followed up with 23 points , 10 assists , six rebounds and three steals . Serge Ibaka added 23 points and 10 rebounds , while Steven Adams chipped in 11 points and seven rebounds . The Hawks ( 14 9 ) , meanwhile , saw their three - game winning streak come to an end with the loss . The team shot just 45 percent and hit only six three - pointers on the night . Al Horford and Paul Millsap combined for just nine points on 3 - of - 14 shooting , with the former adding seven rebounds , four assists , two blocks and one steal , and the latter dishing out just four assists . Dennis Schroder led the team in scoring with 22 points off the bench , while Jeff Teague added 18 points , five rebounds and four assists of his own . Thabo Sefolosha and Kyle Korver each added 11 points , and Tim Hardaway , Jr. provided a bench - leading eight points . Up next , the Thunder will stay home to take on the 76ers on Friday , while the Hawks will travel to Memphis to play the Grizzlies on Saturday .

The Raptors came into this game as a double - digit favorite and they did n't disappoint , as they held the Pacers to just 39 percent shooting from the field and 29 percent from the three - point line . George Hill was the only other Pacer to score in double figures , as he added 18 points , two rebounds and two assists , in 41 minutes . For the Raptors , Kyle Lowry led the way with 28 points ( 8 - 21 FG , 4 - 11 3PT , 8 - 9 FT ) and eight assists , while DeMar DeRozan added 28 points of his own , in 44 minutes . Bismack Biyombo finished with 16 points and 25 rebounds , while Jonas Valanciunas added eight points , three rebounds , two assists and two steals , in 21 minutes . The Portland Trail Blazers ( 14 - 20 ) defeated the Denver Nuggets ( 12 - 21 ) 110 - 103 on Wednesday at the Moda Center in Portland . The Trail Blazers came into this game as a double - digit favorite and they did n't disappoint . In fact , they led for the entirety of the second half , as they outscored the Nuggets 26 - 20 in the third quarter to pull away for the win . The Blazers shot 47 percent from the field and 38 percent from beyond the arc , while the Nuggets shot 43 percent and 44 percent , respectively . The Nuggets were led by Jamal Murray , who scored a game - high of 31 points off the bench . He went 12 - for - 22 from the floor and 4 - of - 6 from the three - point line to score 31 points , while also adding five rebounds and four assists . It was a season - high in points for him , as he 's now averaging 17 points and 5 rebounds on the year . Gary Harris also had a nice game , scoring 19 points ( 6 - 11 FG , 4 - 6 3Pt , 3 - 4 FT ) , to go along with four rebounds , two assists and two steals . He 's had a very strong stretch of three games , combining for 40 points and 12 rebounds over that span . Jameer Nelson had a solid showing as well , scoring 14 points and dishing out eight assists . The only other Nugget to reach double figures in points was Kenneth Faried , who finished with eight points ( 4 - 12 FG , 0 - 3 3PT ) , 12 rebounds and two blocked shots . C.J . McCollum led the way for the Trail Blazers , scoring a team - high 29 points , to along with three rebounds , four assists and one steal , in 36 minutes . Allen Crabbe was the other Blazer to reach the 20 - point mark , finishing with 20 points ( 8 - 14 FG ) , five rebounds , one assist , two steals and one block , in 32 minutes . Mason Plumlee was solid in his second game back after missing two games with a knee injury . He finished with 13 points and seven rebounds , while Al-Farouq Aminu chipped in with 14 points , nine rebounds and five assists , in 33 minutes . With Damian Lillard sitting out with an ankle injury , the Blazers got a lot of production from their bench . Meyers Leonard was the most productive of the bunch , scoring 12 points ( 5 - 12 ) and grabbing five rebounds in 26 minutes . It marked his second double - double in a row , after posting 11 points and five rebounds against the Golden State Warriors on Monday . Next up , the Nuggets will head to San Antonio to take on the Spurs on Friday , while Portland will travel to Los Angeles to play the Lakers on Friday .
The Portland Trail Blazers defeated the Los Angeles Clippers , 98 - 84 , at Moda Center on Saturday . The Trail Blazers ( 2 - 2 ) were expected to win this game easily and they left no doubt with this lopsided result . In fact , Portland led for the entirety of the second half , as they held a double - digit lead for the majority of the game . Shooting was the key difference , with the Blazers shooting 41 percent from the field and 42 percent from three - point range , while holding the Clippers to just 36 percent shooting and 28 percent from long range . The assist - to - turnover ratio was decisive as well , with Portland recording 27 assists to just 15 turnovers , while Los Angeles committed 16 turnovers to just 16 assists . The Clippers ( 2 2 ) have now lost three of their last four games , as this was easily their worst loss of the season . Blake Griffin led the team in scoring , as he tallied 17 points , seven rebounds and two assists . Chris Paul finished second on the team , with 16 points , four assists and three steals . DeAndre Jordan was the only other Clipper in double figures , totaling seven points , 15 rebounds , two steals and four blocks . Jamal Crawford led the bench with 17 points and five rebounds . On deck for the Clippers is a road matchup against the Utah Jazz on Monday . The Blazers were led by Al-Farouq Aminu , who dropped a career - high 30 points on 11 - of - 20 shooting . He also added 10 rebounds and three blocks in the win . C.J . McCollum finished with 19 points and three rebounds of his own . Mason Plumlee recorded yet another double - double , totaling two points , 14 rebounds and 10 assists . Damian Lillard finished with 12 points , six rebounds , six assists , one steal and one block . Maurice Harkless and Allen Crabbe each scored 12 points a piece . Portland will look to build off this win on Monday in their next game , when they host the New Orleans Pelicans .
The San Antonio Spurs ( 27 - 16 ) defeated the Denver Nuggets ( 18 - 24 ) 109 - 99 on Wednesday at the Pepsi Center in Denver . The Spurs were the superior shooters in this game , going 45 percent from the field and 41 percent from beyond the arc , while the Nuggets finished at 47 percent from both the floor and 36 percent from deep . The Nuggets were able to force the Spurs into 16 turnovers , while committing just 16 of their own , but it was n't enough to keep the Nuggets from getting their first road win of the season . Kenneth Faried was the high - point man for the Nuggets , finishing with 26 points ( 9 - 17 FG , 8 - 12 FT ) , to go along with 14 rebounds and one assist , in 37 minutes . Arron Afflalo finished with 21 points ( 6 - 11 FG , 3 - 6 3Pt , 6 - 8 FT ) of his own , while Jusuf Nurkic chipped in 10 points ( 5 - 9 FG ) and nine rebounds , in 26 minutes . The only other player to score in double digits for Denver was Wilson Chandler , who finished with 11 points . Despite the loss , the Nuggets were still able to out - rebound the Spurs 42 - 42 and out - assist them 26 - 27 . Kawhi Leonard led the way for the Spurs , as he finished with a double - double of 17 points and 15 rebounds , while Tony Parker finished with 18 points ( 8 - 16 FG , 1 - 1 3PT ) , four rebounds and seven assists , in 32 minutes . Tim Duncan finished with 16 points , five rebounds , two assists , two steals and one block , in 29 minutes , while Manu Ginobili added 15 points ( 3 - 3 FG , 9 - 9 FT ) and four rebounds in 15 minutes off the bench . Up next , the Spurs will head home to take on the Trail Blazers on Friday , in what will be the second game of a back - to - back for San Antonio , while Denver will stay home and go up against the Timberwolves on Friday .
The San Antonio Spurs ( 56 - 16 ) defeated the New York Knicks ( 27 - 46 ) 106 - 98 on Wednesday at the AT & T Center in San Antonio . The Spurs were the superior shooters in this game , going 46 percent from the field and 40 percent from beyond the arc , while the Knicks finished at 47 percent shooting from the floor and 30 percent from deep . Tony Parker finished with 10 points ( 5 - 12 FG , 0 - 1 3 Pt ) , three rebounds , three assists and two steals , in 22 minutes . The Knicks were led by Derrick Rose , who finished with 24 points ( 10 - 22 FG ) and five rebounds . He also had five assists and five steals , while Willy Hernangomez added 24 points and 13 rebounds , as he was the only other player to score in double figures for the Knicks . The only other players to score double digits for New York were Mindaugas Kuzminskas , who added 19 points , and Kristaps Porzingis , who chucked in 12 points , five boards , two assists and one block , in 25 minutes . Up next , the Spurs will stay home to take on the Timberwolves on Friday , while New York will head home to go up against the Pacers on Friday .

The Bucks were able to hold off the Knicks in this one , despite being out - scored 29 - 16 in the first quarter . The Knicks were down 21 - 21 at the half , but came out strong in the third quarter , out - scoring the Bucks 26 - 18 to take a 54 - 48 lead heading into the fourth . However , the Bucks came back in the fourth quarter and took a nine - point lead , which would prove to be the difference in the game . Giannis Antetokounmpo led the Bucks in scoring with 23 points ( 7 - 14 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt , 9 - 11 FT ) , to go along with nine rebounds , one assist and one block , in 31 minutes . Quincy Acy started at small forward and finished with seven points and six rebounds , while Kyle O'Quinn had a double - double with 10 points and 11 rebounds , as well as two blocked shots , two steals and two blocks , in only 25 minutes of action . Despite the loss , the Knicks remain in last place in the Eastern Conference 's Atlantic Division . They 're home again on Wednesday , when they 'll take on the Toronto Raptors .

The Nuggets got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Nets 30 - 25 in the first quarter alone . They went on to out - score the Nets 37 - 22 in the second quarter , giving them the cushion they needed to coast to an easy victory in front of their home crowd . They shot 51 percent from the field and 45 percent from beyond the arc , while the Nets shot 49 percent from both the field , but struggled from the three - point line , going 33 percent from deep , compared to the Nuggets who went 11 - for - 28 from deep . Despite being out - rebounded 51 - 42 , the Nuggets were able to force the Nets into 19 turnovers , while committing only 13 of their own . Gary Harris was the high - point man for the Nuggets , finishing with 25 points on 9 - of - 15 shooting , while Danilo Gallinari added 20 points ( 8 - 13 FG , 3 - 6 3Pt , 1 - 2 FT ) and eight rebounds . He 's now averaging 16 points and 8 rebounds on the year . He was able to get to the free throw line 21 times , converting on 11 - of those attempts . He had a very impressive 12 points and 12 rebounds in just 23 minutes . Lopez finished with 17 points ( 7 - 11 FG ) , three assists and one rebound , while Hollis -Jefferson added 15 points , eight rebounds and four assists . Lopez has now scored 20 or more points in three of his last four games , as his offensive output has really picked up over that stretch . Hollis Jefferson was the only other starter in double figures , as the bench player who reached double figures . He finished with 15 points and five rebounds . The bench was led by Quincy Acy , who went 6 - for- 11 from three point range and scored 15 points in just 22 minutes . He also added six rebounds and two blocked shots . The other three bench players that reached double - digit points for the Nets were Trevor Booker , Joe Harris and Sean Kilpatrick , who all finished with 12 points each . With the win , the Nets have now won two straight and three of their last four . They 're currently in fourth place in the Eastern Conference 's Atlantic Division , and have a hold of the eighth seed in the conference as well . They head to San Antonio to take on the Spurs on Friday night .

Kevin Durant led the way for the Thunder , with 37 points ( 13 - 26 FG , 7 - 11 3PT , 4 - 4 FT ) and 12 rebounds , in 39 minutes . Russell Westbrook finished with 26 points ( 10 - 29 FG , 0 - 6 3PT . 6 - 7 FT ) of his own , along with 13 assists and seven rebounds , while Serge Ibaka chipped in 15 points ( 7 - 12 FG ) and 20 rebounds . The only other player to score in double digits for Oklahoma City was Steven Adams , who finished with 10 points ( 4 - 6 FG ) . Up next , the Warriors will head home Wednesday to take on the 76ers , while the Thunder will stay home Wednesday and play the Nuggets .
The Atlanta Hawks ( 33 - 26 ) defeated the Boston Celtics ( 38 - 22 ) 114 - 98 on Wednesday at the TD Garden in Boston . The Hawks were the superior shooters in this game , going 48 percent from the field and 24 percent from beyond the arc , while the Celtics finished at 39 percent shooting from the floor and 29 percent from deep . The Celtics were also out - rebounded 55 - 40 , giving the Hawks even more of an advantage . Dennis Schroder led the Hawks with 21 points ( 9 - 14 FG , 0 - 3 3Pt , 3 - 3 FT ) , while also adding five assists and four rebounds in 30 minutes . He 's now averaging 21 points and 5 assists on the season . Dwight Howard recorded a double - double with 17 points ( 6 - 11 FG , 5 - 9 FT ) and 12 rebounds in 27 minutes . It was his third double - digit rebound game in a row , as he continues to be a force on the boards for the Hawks . Paul Millsap recorded his second triple - double of the season as well , finishing with 17 ( 7 - 18 FG ) , 10 rebounds and four assists in 32 minutes . The only other player to score in double digits for Atlanta was Kent Bazemore , who chipped in 15 points ( 5 - 6 FG , 2 - 2 3PT ) in 26 minutes . Isaiah Thomas struggled shooting the ball for the Celtics , going 4 - 21 ( 19 percent ) , but still finished with 19 points , seven rebounds and seven assists . He did have seven turnovers though , so it was n't all good for the All-Star point guard . Jae Crowder started in place of Avery Bradley , who sat out with an ankle injury . Crowder finished with six points ( 2 - 9 FG , 1 - 5 3 Pt ) , four rebounds and one assist in 31 minutes . Marcus Smart was the high - point man off the bench for Boston , finishing second on the team with 16 points . He also had four rebounds , one assist , one steal and one block in 28 minutes . Jonas Jerebko was the only other Celtic to reach double figures in points with 15 , while Al Horford had six points , six rebounds , five assists , a steal and a block . The loss snapped a three - game winning streak for Boston . Up next , the Hawks will head home Friday to take on the Pistons , while Boston will head to New York to play the Knicks on Friday .
The San Antonio Spurs ( 38 - 11 ) defeated the Philadelphia 76ers ( 18 - 31 ) 102 - 86 on Wednesday at the AT & T Center in San Antonio . The Spurs got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Sixers 24 - 21 in the first quarter . They were able to hold off the Sixers for the rest of the way though , as they held them to just 34 percent shooting from the field and 36 percent from the three - point line , while the Sixers shot 34 percent from beyond the arc . The assist - to - turnover ratio was the difference in the game , with the Spurs recording 26 assists to just 19 turnovers and the Sixers committing 21 turnovers to just 21 assists . Ersan Ilyasova was the high - point man for the Sixers , as he finished with 25 points ( 8 - 17 FG , 2 - 6 3Pt , 7 - 8 FT ) , to go along with nine rebounds , four steals , two assists and one block , in 39 minutes . Dario Saric finished with 14 points and eight rebounds , while Jahlil Okafor chipped in nine points , nine rebounds and three assists , in 25 minutes . Kawhi Leonard led the way for the Spurs , with 19 points , eight rebounds and five assists , while Dewayne Dedmon recorded a double - double , with 13 points and 10 rebounds , in 22 minutes . Danny Green finished with 12 points , four rebounds and two steals , in 29 minutes , while Manu Ginobili added 12 points and four assists off the bench , in 18 minutes . The 76ers have now lost five of their last six games , as this marks their fifth loss in a row . Up next , the Spurs will stay home to take on the Timberwolves on Friday , in what will be their second game in as many nights . Meanwhile , the 76ers will head home to go up against the Kings on Friday .
The Chicago Bulls ( 24 - 16 ) defeated the Detroit Pistons ( 22 - 19 ) 111 - 101 on Wednesday at the Palace of Auburn Hills . The Bulls were able to hold off the Pistons in this one , as they outscored them 27 - 22 in the fourth quarter to secure the victory in front of their home crowd . Pau Gasol led the way for the Bulls , as he recorded a game - high of 31 points ( 13 - 18 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 4 - 5 FT ) , to go along with 12 rebounds , three assists , three blocks and one steal , in 36 minutes . Derrick Rose was n't far behind , finishing with 20 points ( 9 - 17 FG ) , four assists and one rebound , in 27 minutes , while Jimmy Butler chipped in 16 points ( 5 - 13 FG , 6 - 8 FT ) and nine assists , along with three rebounds , two steals and one assist , in 37 minutes . The only other player to score in double digits for Chicago was Taj Gibson , who finished with eight points ( 4 - 9 FG ) and 10 rebounds , in 35 minutes . For the Pistons , they were led by the duo of Reggie Jackson and Ersan Ilyasova , who each finished with 19 points ( 8 - 16 FG , 3 - 8 3PT ) , while Andre Drummond recorded a double - double , with 13 points and 16 rebounds . The Pistons shot 44 percent from the field and 19 percent from beyond the arc , while the Bulls shot 52 percent ( 43 - 70 ) from the floor and 43 percent from long range . Up next , the Bulls will head home Friday to take on the 76ers , while Detroit will stay home Friday and go up against the Heat .
The New York Knicks defeated the Charlotte Hornets , 102 - 94 , at Madison Square Garden on Wednesday . The Hornets ( 5 - 6 ) were expected to win this game easily and they did just that , but it took a late run to pull out the victory . In fact , the Knicks outscored the Hornets , 34 - 22 , in the fourth quarter to pull away and secure the win . The key for New York was their shooting , as they went 40 percent from the field and 50 percent from three - point range , while holding Charlotte to just 44 percent shooting and 25 percent from long range . The Knicks also dominated the rebounding , winning that battle , 45 - 42 . Charlotte was led by Kemba Walker , who tallied 31 points , four rebounds , three steals and one assist . Al Jefferson was the only other starter in double figures , as he totaled 10 points , five rebounds , two assists and three steals . Marco Belinelli was a nice spark off the bench , providing 13 points and five rebounds in 28 minutes of action . Lance Stephenson also scored 14 points , adding five rebounds and one block to his tally . The only other player to score in double digits for the Hornets was Jeremy Lamb , who finished with 12 points , three rebounds and three assists . Charlotte will look to get out of this rut on Friday in a road matchup against the Philadelphia 76ers . New York ( 6 - 5 ) has now won three of their last four games , as Kristaps Porzingis continues to grow as one of the best young players in the league . He led the team with 29 points and 11 rebounds on 10 - of - 17 shooting . Carmelo Anthony finished with 18 points , 11 rebounds , five assists and two blocks . Arron Afflalo was second on the team in scoring , dropping 16 points , while Jose Calderon started in place of the injured Joakim Noah ( ankle ) and accrued eight points and three rebounds in 31 minutes . Justin Holiday led the bench in scoring with 10 points and four assists , while Kyle O'Quinn provided nine points , six rebounds and five assists off the pine as well . On deck for the Knicks is a home matchup with the Los Angeles Clippers on Friday .
The Cleveland Cavaliers ( 16 - 10 ) defeated the Memphis Grizzlies ( 21 - 6 ) 105 - 91 on Wednesday at Quicken Loans Arena in Cleveland . The Cavaliers got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Grizzlies 22 - 19 in the first quarter . They went on to out - score the Grizzlies 28 - 19 the rest of the way , allowing them to coast to an easy victory in front of their home crowd . LeBron James led the way for the Cavaliers , scoring 25 points ( 9 - 15 FG , 3 - 5 3Pt , 4 - 6 FT ) , to go along with 11 assists and one block , in 38 minutes . He 's now averaging 25 points and 11 assists on the year . Kyrie Irving was also a big factor in the win , as he finished with 17 points ( 8 - 13 FG , 1 - 1 3PT , 0 - 1 FT ) and a team - high of 11 assists , in 37 minutes . It was his second double - double in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 16 points and 10 assists . Coming off the bench , Tristan Thompson had a big game as well , with 21 points ( 7 - 16 FG , 2 - 5 2Pt ) , two rebounds , one assist and one steal , in 28 minutes . Anderson Varejao chipped in 18 points and seven rebounds , in 27 minutes . The Grizzlies were led by Marc Gasol , who finished with 23 points ( 10 - 17 FG ) , 11 rebounds and five assists , while Jon Leuer added 16 points , seven rebounds and two steals , in 30 minutes . Mike Conley finished with 11 points , five assists and two rebounds in 25 minutes , while Zach Randolph was the only other Memphis player to score in double figures , with 12 points ( 5 - 9 FG ) in 20 minutes . Up next , the Cavaliers will stay home to take on the Timberwolves on Friday , while the Grizzlies will head home to go up against the Heat on Friday .

The Lakers were the superior shooters in this game , going 51 percent from the field and 52 percent from beyond the arc , while the Grizzlies finished at just 39 percent shooting from the floor and 32 percent from three - point range . It was his second double - double in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 17 points and 12 rebounds per game . Up next , the Lakers will travel to San Antonio on Friday to take on the Spurs , while Memphis will head home to play the Clippers on Friday .

The Bulls were able to hold the Cavaliers to just 40 percent shooting from the field and 31 percent from three - point range , but were still able to out - rebound and out - assist Cleveland 50 - 50 , giving them just enough of an advantage to pull out the win . The Cavaliers were led by LeBron James , who finished with 25 points ( 12 - 22 FG , 1 - 5 3Pt , 0 - 3 FT ) , 10 rebounds and five assists in 36 minutes . Kevin Love added 18 points , eight rebounds , four assists and two blocks in 35 minutes , while Mo Williams chipped in 19 points ( 7 - 15 FG , 3 - 7 3PT ) , seven assists , four rebounds , one steal and one block in 37 minutes . Nikola Mirotic added 19 points and nine rebounds in 25 minutes . Jimmy Butler finished with 17 points ( 6 - 14 FG , 5 - 5 FT ) and Jimmy Butler added 11 points ( 5 - 8 FG ) and three rebounds in 14 minutes off the bench . Pau Gasol was held to just two points on 1 - for - 7 shooting , but he did grab six rebounds and blocked six shots . The Cavs will look to get back on track in Game 2 on Tuesday , when they host the Pacers . Chicago will have a quick turnaround , as they play the second game of a back - to - back set in Indiana on Tuesday . Game 2 will take place in Cleveland .
