The Milwaukee Bucks defeated the host Chicago Bulls , 95 - 69 , at United Center on Wednesday . The Bulls ( 13 - 13 ) were expected to win this game easily and they left no doubt with this lopsided result . In fact , the Bucks led for the entirety of the second half , as they led by at least 12 points for the final 20 minutes . The shooting was terrible , as the Bucks shot 46 percent from the field and 40 percent from three - point range , while the Bulls shot just 30 percent on their end . The assist - to - turnover ratio was decisive as well , with Milwaukee recording 26 assists to 11 turnovers , while Chicago committed 12 turnovers to just 17 assists . The Bucks bench was the difference in the game , outscoring the Bulls bench , 53 - 26 . Giannis Antetokounmpo carried the load for Milwaukee , as he tallied 22 points , seven rebounds and 11 assists in the win . Jabari Parker finished second on the team , totaling 12 points and seven rebounds . Malcolm Brogdon was huge off the bench , providing 13 points and eight rebounds on 5 - of - 10 shooting . John Henson and Tony Snell were the only other Bucks to score in double figures , totaling 10 points and 10 points , respectively . On deck for the Bucks is a home matchup against the Orlando Magic on Friday . This was a tough loss for the Bulls , as it marked their third - straight loss at home . Dwyane Wade led the team in scoring , dropping 12 points , five rebounds and one assist . Rajon Rondo finished with seven points , four rebounds and four assists , while Jimmy Butler went just 3 - for - 14 from the floor to score seven points . Nikola Mirotic and Doug McDermott were the lone bright spots for Chicago , as McDermott scored 10 points to go along with eight rebounds and eight assists in 19 minutes , while Rondo scored seven points and dished out four assists in 26 minutes . Chicago will look to bounce back on Friday , when they host the New York Knicks for their next game .
The Atlanta Hawks defeated the Miami Heat , 114 - 103 , at Phillips Arena on Saturday . The Hawks ( 5 - 3 ) have been dominant at home this season , and they did n't disappoint against a shorthanded Heat team . Atlanta shot 56 percent from the field and 39 percent from three - point range , while holding Miami to 47 percent shooting and 48 percent from beyond the arc . They also outrebounded the Heat by a 36 - 32 margin and outscored them in the paint , 60 - 32 . The Heat ( 5 4 ) were led by Tyler Johnson 's 23 - point , 11 - rebound double - double off the bench . Shawne Williams was second on the team with 21 points , six rebounds , an assist , a steal and a block . Chris Bosh was next with 20 points , eight rebounds , two assists , two steals and one block . Luol Deng supplied 19 points , four rebounds and an assist . James Ennis III started at point guard in place of Dwyane Wade , but only provided one point , one rebound and one assist in six minutes . Tyler Johnson led the bench with 19 points and six assists . Al Horford led the Hawks in scoring and rebounding , posting a team - high 19 points on 8 - of - 10 shooting . Paul Millsap was right behind him with a full stat line of 19 points ( 7 - 15 FG , 2 - 5 3Pt , 3 - 6 FT ) , nine rebounds and two steals . Jeff Teague tallied 16 points , nine assists , a rebound and a steal . Thabo Sefolosha and Kyle Korver turned in matching 12 - point efforts , with the former adding six rebounds and three blocks , and the latter providing seven assists and six rebounds . Tim Hardaway , Jr. led the second unit with 12 points , two rebounds and a pair of assists . Dennis Schroder was productive in a reserve role as well , registering 10 points , five assists and two rebounds . Miami heads back home to face off with the Philadelphia 76ers on Monday night , while the Hawks remain home to tangle with the Charlotte Hornets on Monday evening as well .
The San Antonio Spurs ( 29 - 6 ) defeated the Houston Rockets ( 16 - 19 ) 121 - 103 on Wednesday at the AT & T Center in San Antonio . The Spurs were the superior shooters in this game , going 52 percent from the field and 54 percent from beyond the arc , while the Rockets finished at 50 percent from both the floor and 41 percent from deep . They also out - rebounded the Rockets 37 - 37 , giving them just enough of an advantage to pull out the victory in front of their home crowd . Kawhi Leonard and LaMarcus Aldridge led the way for the Spurs . Leonard finished with 22 points ( 8 - 12 FG , 2 - 2 3Pt , 4 - 5 FT ) , six rebounds and two assists , while Aldridge finished with 24 points ( 10 - 16 FG ) and nine rebounds . It was Aldridge 's second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 54 points and 20 rebounds over those two games . Danny Green was the other starter to reach double figures in points . He went 6 - for - 8 from the three - point line and 6 - of - 7 from the free throw line to score 18 points , while also adding four rebounds and three steals . He 's now averaging 16 points and 5 rebounds on the year . Tony Parker struggled shooting the ball , going 0 - for 6 from the floor , but still finished with two points and 10 assists , giving him his third double - digit scoring game of the season . Patty Mills came off the bench to record 20 points and eight rebounds in 25 minutes . The Rockets were led by Dwight Howard and James Harden . Howard finished with a team - high of 22 points and 12 rebounds , while Harden finished with 17 points ( 6 - 10 FG ) , two rebounds , three assists and one steal . Harden has now scored 20 or more points in three of his last four games , as the Rockets are starting to find their groove . Patrick Beverley was the only other starter in double figures . He finished with 10 points ( 3 - 8 FG , 1 - 1 3 Pt , 3 - 6 FT ) and seven assists . The only other player to score in double digits for the Rockets was Trevor Ariza , who chipped in 10 points . Up next , the Spurs will stay home to take on the Timberwolves on Friday , while Houston will head home to go up against the Clippers on Friday .
The Phoenix Suns ( 20 ) defeated the San Antonio Spurs ( 1 - 1 ) 94 - 89 on Wednesday at the US Airways Center in Phoenix . The Suns got off to a quick start in this game , out - scoring the Spurs 11 - 11 in the first quarter . The Spurs were able to make a run in the second quarter though , as they out - scored the Suns 26 - 11 , but it was n't enough to keep the Suns off the free - throw line , as the Suns finished at 85 percent from the charity stripe , while the Spurs finished at 74 percent . With the win , the Suns have now won their first game of the season , as this marks the first time they 've won their season opener . Up next for the Spurs is a matchup against the Golden State Warriors on Friday , in what will be the second game of a back - to - back for both teams . This will be a great opportunity for San Antonio to prove themselves as one of the best defensive teams in the Western Conference this season . They 'll look to continue their winning ways against the Warriors in their next game on Friday .

The Oklahoma City Thunder ( 36 - 13 ) defeated the Houston Rockets ( 25 - 24 ) 116 - 108 on Wednesday at Chesapeake Energy Arena in Oklahoma City . The Rockets came into this game as a double - digit favorite , but the Thunder had other ideas . They out - scored the Rockets 34 - 25 in the fourth quarter , giving them just enough of an advantage to pull out the win . The Thunder were the superior shooters in this game , going 48 percent from the field , while the Rockets went just 38 percent . The assist - to - turnover ratio was the difference in the game , with the Thunder recording eight more assists than the Rockets , while committing five less turnovers . Despite being out - rebounded 57 - 40 , the Rockets were able to force 18 turnovers from the Thunder , which may have been the difference maker in this one . James Harden led the Rockets in scoring , as he tallied 33 points ( 8 - 22 FG , 2 - 7 3Pt , 15 - 17 FT ) , seven rebounds and seven assists . Corey Brewer was second on the team , finishing with 17 points ( 7 - 15 FG , 0 - 5 3PT , 3 - 4 FT ) and two rebounds . He 's now averaging 17 points and 5 rebounds on the season . Dwight Howard was the only other Rocket to reach double figures in points . He finished with eight points ( 2 - 6 FG ) , eight rebounds , two steals and one block in 21 minutes . The only other player to score in double figures for the Rockets was Eric Gordon , who finished with 12 points ( 5 - 7 FG ) and three rebounds in 23 minutes off the bench . Russell Westbrook did all he could to keep the Thunder 's playoff hopes alive . He went 9 - for - 21 from the floor to score 26 points , to go along with 10 rebounds and 14 assists . It was his third triple - double in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 27 points , 11 rebounds and 10 assists . Kevin Durant was n't far behind , finishing the game with 33 points , 12 rebounds , three assists , one steal and one blocked shot in 40 minutes . Dion Waiters and Enes Kanter were the other two players to reach the 20 - point mark , as they scored 16 and 22 points respectively . Westbrook also recorded a career - high in assists with 14 , while adding 10 rebounds , one block and one steal to his game - high scoring total . Kanter added 10 rebounds in just 26 minutes , while Waiters added two rebounds and two steals in 32 minutes . With this win the Thunder have now won four of their last five games , and they 'll look to keep that streak going against the Memphis Grizzlies on Friday . Despite the loss , James Harden continues to be the league 's best player . He has now recorded at least 20 points , seven assists and seven rebounds in each of his last four games .

The Houston Rockets ( 42 - 18 ) defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves ( 23 - 36 ) 142 - 130 on Wednesday at the Toyota Center in Houston . The Timberwolves came out strong in this one , out - scoring the Rockets 35 - 28 in the first quarter , but the Rockets were able to out - score the T-Wolves 40 - 30 in the second quarter and finish the game shooting 47 percent from the field and 38 percent from three - point range . The Rockets were also able to force the Timberwolves into 23 turnovers , while committing just 13 of their own , which may have been the difference in the game . Karl-Anthony Towns was the star of the show for the Timberwolves , as he led the team with 37 points ( 16 - 24 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) , 22 rebounds and three assists in 37 minutes . Andrew Wiggins followed up with 30 points ( 11 - 22 FG , 7 - 8 FT ) of his own , while also adding two rebounds , three steals and two assists . He 's now averaging 22 points and 8 rebounds on the season . Gorgui Dieng recorded a double - double with 16 points ( 7 - 10 FG , 0 - 1 3PT ) and 13 rebounds , while Ricky Rubio chipped in 14 points ( 3 - 8 FG , 2 - 5 3PT , 6 - 7 FT ) and 11 assists in 32 minutes . James Harden led the way for the Rockets with 24 points ( 6 - 15 FG , 5 - 11 3 Pt ) , 10 assists , five rebounds and two steals in 35 minutes . He also had seven turnovers , so it was n't all good for the MVP candidate . Ryan Anderson was the other starter to reach double figures in points with 18 . He was able to get to the free throw line a game - high 13 times , converting on four of those attempts to finish with 18 points . Clint Capela was also a big factor in the win , recording 16 points and nine rebounds in 22 minutes . Patrick Beverley finished with 15 points , seven assists , four rebounds , and three steals in 29 minutes . Coming off the bench , Josh Smith had a solid showing , scoring 17 points ( 4 - 11 FG ) and grabbing four rebounds in 26 minutes . The Wolves ' next game will be on the road against the New Orleans Pelicans on Friday , while the Rockets will travel to San Antonio to play the Spurs on Friday .

McCollum chipped in 14 points and three assists , in 21 minutes off the bench . On deck for Portland is a road matchup against the New York Knicks on Friday . They out - scored the Timberwolves 39 - 26 in the fourth quarter to pull out the win . The Lakers were the superior shooters in this game , going 50 percent from the field , while the Timberwolves went just 57 percent . The assist - to - turnover ratio was decisive as well , with the Lakers recording nine more assists than the Timberwolves , while committing five less turnovers . The Wolves were led by Andrew Wiggins , who finished with 30 points ( 13 - 20 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt , 3 - 6 FT ) , four rebounds , one assist , two blocks and one steal , in 41 minutes . Gorgui Dieng finished with 19 points ( 6 - 9 FG , 7 - 9 FT ) and six rebounds , in 37 minutes . Karl-Anthony Towns recorded his first double - double of the season , with 14 points and 10 rebounds , along with two assists and two blocks , in 32 minutes . Ricky Rubio finished with 10 points ( 4 - 10 FG ) and 15 assists , in 29 minutes . Kobe Bryant led the way for the Lakers , as he went 10 - 21 from the floor and 7 - 11 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 38 points , to go along with five rebounds , five assists and three steals , in 33 minutes . Lou Williams finished with 20 points and four assists , while Jordan Clarkson chipped in 16 points ( 8 - 13 FG ) , three rebounds and two assists . Julius Randle finished with 15 points and 12 rebounds , while Lou Williams added 18 points , in 28 minutes off the bench . Up next , the Lakers will look to extend their win streak to four games on Friday , when they host the New Orleans Pelicans . Meanwhile , the Timberwolves will head to San Antonio to take on the Spurs on Friday .
The Philadelphia 76ers ( 1 - 7 ) defeated the Indiana Pacers ( 4 - 5 ) 109 - 105 on Wednesday at the Wells Fargo Center in Philadelphia . Joel Embiid led the way for the Sixers with 25 points ( 6 - 18 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 12 - 14 FT ) , to go along with seven rebounds , two assists and two blocks , in 26 minutes . It was a season - high in points for the rookie , as he 's now averaging 17 points and 7 rebounds on the year . The 76ers shot 42 percent from the field and 34 percent from three - point range , compared to the Pacers who shot 44 percent and 26 percent , while the 76ers out - rebounded the Pacers 54 - 40 . The Pacers were led by Paul George , who finished with 26 points ( 9 - 20 FG ) , eight rebounds and four assists , in 40 minutes . Jeff Teague added 13 points ( 5 - 10 FG ) four assists and three steals , in 35 minutes , while C.J . Miles chipped in 13 points , four rebounds , one assist and one steal , in 30 minutes . Thaddeus Young recorded a double - double with 11 points and 10 rebounds , in 34 minutes . The only other player to score in double digits for the Pacers was Rodney Stuckey , who added 19 points ( 8 - 19 FG , 0 - 2 3PT ) , six rebounds , five assists , four steals and four blocked shots , in 36 minutes off the bench . The Sixers got 14 points and 11 rebounds from Nerlens Noel and 14 points from Jahlil Okafor , in 24 and 24 minutes , respectively . Sergio Rodriguez had seven points ( 3 - 7 FG ) and nine assists , while Robert Covington added 10 points , three rebounds , three assists , two steals and one block , in 39 minutes . Up next , the Sixers will stay home to take on the Nets on Friday , while Pacers will head home to play the Kings on Friday .

The Hawks got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Thunder 31 - 21 in the first quarter . They were able to hold on to that lead for the rest of the way , as they went on to out - score the Thunder 27 - 22 in the second quarter and 26 - 26 in the third quarter to secure the victory in front of their home crowd . Up next , the Hawks will stay home to take on the 76ers on Friday , while the Thunder will head home to play the Nuggets on Friday .
The Washington Wizards ( 39 - 24 ) defeated the Denver Nuggets ( 29 - 35 ) 123 - 113 on Monday at the Pepsi Center in Denver . The Wizards came out firing on all cylinders in this one , out - scoring the Nuggets 57 - 48 in the first half alone . They were able to hold on to the lead for the majority of the second half , as they were up by as many as 26 points in the third quarter . The Nuggets made a run late in the fourth quarter though , cutting the Wizards lead to just three points with just over a minute to go , but John Wall answered with a game - winning jumper at the buzzer to seal the deal for the Wizards . Wall finished with 30 points ( 12 - 19 FG , 2 - 6 3Pt , 4 - 5 FT ) , 10 assists and three rebounds in 35 minutes . Bradley Beal added 23 points ( 9 - 15 FG , 5 - 7 3PT ) and five assists of his own , while Otto Porter , Jr. finished with 22 points ( 10 - 15 ) and three assists in 34 minutes . Marcin Gortat recorded a double - double with 11 points ( 5 - 10 FG , 1 - 4 FT ) and 15 rebounds , while Markieff Morris added 11 points and six rebounds in 26 minutes . Gary Harris led the way for the Nuggets , as he went 10 - for - 15 from the field to score 26 points , while also adding four assists and two steals in 37 minutes . Mason Plumlee finished with 19 points ( 7 - 13 FG ) and 10 rebounds in 31 minutes , while Wilson Chandler chipped in 21 points , three rebounds , three assists , two steals and one blocked shot . Jameer Nelson struggled shooting the ball , going 2 - of - 6 from the floor , but finished with five points , six assists and four rebounds in 24 minutes . Up next , the Wizards will head home Wednesday to take on the Trail Blazers , while the Nuggets will stay home Wednesday and go up against the Kings .

They were able to hold on to that lead for the rest of the way though , as they went on to out - score the Nuggets 33 - 25 in the second half to secure the victory in front of their home crowd . It was a tight game throughout , as there were 10 ties and 10 lead changes in total , with neither team leading by more than 12 points . The Nuggets were led by Jameer Nelson , who went 9 - for - 20 from the field and 4 - of - 7 from the three - point line to score a team - high of 23 points , while also adding seven assists and four steals . The only other Knicks player to score in double figures was Willy Hernangomez , who added nine points in 23 minutes off the bench . Up next , the Warriors will head home to take on the 76ers on Friday , in what will be the second half of a back - to - back for both teams . New York will stay home and go up against the Nets on Friday .

The Nuggets got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Rockets 30 - 23 in the first quarter . They were able to hold on to that lead for the rest of the way , as they went on to out - score the Rockets 75 - 48 in the second half to secure the victory in front of their home crowd . The Detroit Pistons defeated the Orlando Magic , 115 - 89 , at Palace of Auburn Hills on Wednesday . The Pistons ( 19 - 16 ) have been dominant at home this season , and they did n't disappoint in this blowout win . In fact , they held a double - digit lead for the entirety of the second half , as they led by at least 12 points for the final 30 minutes . Detroit shot 49 percent from the field and 47 percent from three - point range , while holding Orlando to just 44 percent shooting and 30 percent from long range . The assist - to - turnover ratio was decisive as well , with the Pistons recording 25 assists to 10 turnovers , while the Magic committed eight turnovers to just 17 assists . The Magic were led by Victor Oladipo , who tallied 18 points , seven rebounds and five assists . Nikola Vucevic finished second on the team with 16 points , three rebounds and three assists . Tobias Harris was the only other starter with more than 11 points , as he totaled 11 points and three rebounds . D.J . Augustin led the bench with 14 points and 12 rebounds . Denver was led by the duo of Danilo Gallinari and Jusuf Nurkic , who combined for 29 points , 12 rebounds and 11 assists . Jamal Murray was the only other starter to score in double figures , as he finished with nine points and four assists in 27 minutes . Jameer Nelson came off the bench to record a double - double of 16 points and 11 rebounds in just 16 minutes . Wilson Chandler also had a nice game off of the bench , scoring eight points and grabbing 11 rebounds . Andre Drummond led the Pistons in scoring with 19 points ( 6 - 11 FG , 7 - 11 FT ) , to go along with 19 rebounds , three blocks and one steal , in 34 minutes . Marcus Morris finished with 15 points ( 5 - 10 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) and six rebounds , while Ish Smith chipped in 11 points , eight assists , five rebounds and three steals , in 28 minutes . Tobias Harris and Kentavious Caldwell-Pope each scored nine points , while Jon Leuer and Ish Smith added 12 and 11 points respectively , in 19 and 20 minutes of action . Detroit 's next game will be on the road against the Charlotte Hornets on Friday . Denver will be at home against the New York Knicks on Friday , in what will be the second game of a back - to - back .

Andre Drummond finished with 16 points on 7 - 11 shooting , along with six rebounds and four steals , in 24 minutes . The only other player to score in double digits for the Pistons was Marcus Thornton , who added nine points , in 23 minutes off the bench . Ish Smith finished with six points on 3 - 10 shooting , while Kentavious Caldwell-Pope added four points on 2 - 9 shooting , in 39 minutes . Up next , the Raptors will stay home to take on the Wizards on Tuesday , while Detroit will head home to play the Pacers on Wednesday .
The Cleveland Cavaliers ( 45 - 22 ) defeated the Utah Jazz ( 43 - 26 ) 91 - 83 on Wednesday at Quicken Loans Arena in Cleveland . LeBron James led the way for the Cavaliers , as he finished with a game - high of 33 points ( 13 - 20 FG , 2 - 5 3Pt , 5 - 10 FT ) , to go along with 10 rebounds , six assists , two steals and one blocked shot , in 38 minutes . He 's now averaging 33 points , 10 rebounds and 6 assists on the season . Kyrie Irving was also a big factor in the win . He finished with 21 points ( 8 - 19 FG , 1 - 2 3PT , 4 - 5 FT ) and four assists , in 30 minutes . Kevin Love finished with 10 points ( 5 - 9 FG , 0 - 3 3PT ) and nine rebounds , in 20 minutes . The Cavaliers shot 42 percent from the field and 27 percent from beyond the arc , while the Jazz went 42 percent ( 24 - 71 ) from the floor and only 24 percent from deep . The Jazz were led by Rudy Gobert , who finished with 20 points ( 10 - 13 FG ) and 19 rebounds in 37 minutes . It was his second double - double in a row , after scoring 20 points and grabbing 19 rebounds against the Bulls on Sunday . Gordon Hayward finished with 13 points ( 4 - 14 FG ) , five rebounds , four assists and one steal , in 35 minutes . Joe Johnson chipped in 12 points , four rebounds and three assists , while Joe Ingles added 12 points and four rebounds . The only other player to score in double digits for the Jazz was Trey Burke , who added eight points in 21 minutes off the bench . Up next , the Cavaliers will stay home to take on the Raptors on Friday , while Utah will head home to play the Kings on Friday .
The Sacramento Kings ( 27 - 50 ) defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves ( 16 - 61 ) 116 - 111 on Wednesday at Sleep Train Arena in Sacramento . The Kings were the superior shooters in this game , going 53 percent from the field and 38 percent from beyond the arc , while the Timberwolves finished at 48 percent from both the floor and 32 percent from deep . The Timberwolves were also out - rebounded 49 - 36 , but were able to force the Kings into 14 turnovers , which may have been the difference in the game . Kevin Martin led the Timberwolves in scoring with 37 points ( 13 - 31 FG , 3 - 11 3Pt , 8 - 11 FT ) , to go along with eight assists and five rebounds , in 44 minutes . Andrew Wiggins followed up with 26 points ( 11 - 20 FG , 4 - 5 FT ) and eight rebounds , while Zach LaVine chipped in 21 points ( 9 - 18 FG , 1 - 5 3PT , 2 - 4 FT ) with 11 assists , five rebounds and one steal , in 41 minutes . The only other player to score in double digits for the Timberwolves was Shabazz Muhammad , who finished with 13 points ( 5 - 8 FG ) , in 34 minutes off the bench . Ray McCallum added 13 points , nine rebounds , four assists , two steals and two steals , in 36 minutes . Darren Collison was the only other Kings player in double figures , as he finished with 18 points ( 8 - 12 FG , 0 - 2 3PT ) , eight rebounds and a blocked shot , in 31 minutes . Up next , the Kings will look to extend their win streak to three games , as they travel to Denver to take on the Nuggets on Friday . The Wolves will head home to play the Trail Blazers on Friday , in what will be the second half of a back - to - back .
The Atlanta Hawks ( 10 ) defeated the Brooklyn Nets ( 0 - 1 ) 99 - 92 in Game 1 of the Eastern Conference first - round playoffs Sunday at Philips Arena to take a 1 - 1 series lead over the Nets . The Hawks came out strong in the first half , out - scoring the Nets 32 - 20 , but Brooklyn battled back in the second half to make it a two - point game heading into the fourth quarter . However , the Hawks were able to out - score the Nets 25 - 17 in the final 12 minutes to seal the win . Atlanta shot 43 percent from the field and 33 percent from three - point range , while holding the Nets to 46 percent shooting and 25 percent from long range . Kyle Korver led the Hawks in scoring with 21 points ( 6 - 12 FG , 5 - 11 3Pt , 4 - 5 FT ) , to go along with seven rebounds , three assists , two steals and one block , in 37 minutes . DeMarre Carroll chipped in 17 points and eight rebounds , while Al Horford recorded a double - double with 10 points and 10 rebounds , along with two assists and one blocked shot , in 34 minutes . Jeff Teague finished with 17 points , while the only other player to score in double digits for the Hawks was Tim Hardaway Jr. , who added 13 points , in 24 minutes off the bench . The Nets were led by Brook Lopez , who finished with a team - high 17 points on 6 - of - 7 shooting , to along with 14 rebounds and two steals , in 36 minutes . Thaddeus Young added 15 points , 10 rebounds and one steal , in 40 minutes , while Joe Johnson finished with 16 points , six rebounds and six assists , in 42 minutes . Deron Williams added 13 , four rebounds , two assists , one steal and two three - pointers , in 33 minutes . Up next , the Nets will head to Miami to take on the Heat on Tuesday , while Atlanta will stay home and go up against the Pistons on Tuesday .

The Hawks were the superior shooters in this game , going 53 percent from the field and 36 percent from three - point range , while the Magic finished at 35 percent shooting from the floor and 26 percent from long range . They also out - rebounded the Magic 48 - 33 , giving them even more of an advantage in this one . He was able to get to the free throw line 10 times , converting on a perfect 8 - of - 10 . They 're home again on Friday , when they 'll take on the Miami Heat in a matinee matchup . The Heat , on the other hand , have now lost four of their last five games , as they continue to slide down the standings .
The Toronto Raptors ( 34 - 16 ) defeated the Portland Trail Blazers ( 24 - 27 ) 110 - 103 on Wednesday at the Moda Center in Portland . The Raptors came into this game as a double - digit favorite and they left no doubt who the better team was . In fact , the Raptors led for the majority of the game , as they led by double - digits for the final 30 minutes . The Trail Blazers were held to 47 percent shooting from the field and 40 percent from three - point range , while the Raptors shot 47 percent from the floor and 63 percent from beyond the arc . The assist - to - turnover ratio was decisive as well , with the Raptors recording 23 assists to 14 turnovers and the Trail Blazers committing 14 turnovers to just 21 assists . Kyle Lowry led the Raptors in scoring , as he tallied 30 points ( 10 - 19 FG , 7 - 10 3Pt , 3 - 5 FT ) , six rebounds , eight assists , two steals and two blocks . DeMar DeRozan was n't far behind , finishing with 29 points ( 11 - 25 FG ) , five rebounds and four assists . Jonas Valanciunas recorded his first double - double of the season , totaling 14 points ( 5 - 10 FG , 4 - 4 FT ) and 11 rebounds . The only other player to score in double figures for the Raptors was Terrence Ross , who finished with 12 points and three rebounds in 30 minutes off the bench . For the Blazers , Damian Lillard did all he could to keep Portland in this game . He finished with 27 points ( 8 - 20 FG , 2 - 7 3PT , 9 - 10 FT ) to go along with 11 assists and five rebounds . C.J . McCollum was second on the team in scoring with 21 points , while adding six rebounds and two assists . Meyers Leonard was the only other Blazer to reach double figures in points , totaling 17 points ( 6 - 9 FG , 1 - 3 3PT ) , three rebounds , one assist and two steals . The Blazers will look to get out of this slide on Friday in a road matchup against the Los Angeles Clippers . For Toronto , they 'll look to extend their winning streak to three games on Friday against the Sacramento Kings .

The assist - to - turnover ratio was decisive as well , with Miami recording 30 assists to just 12 turnovers and the Hawks committing 10 turnovers to just 14 assists .
